# language_name:        Gorantalo
# closest ISO 639-3:    gor
# ISO_15924:            Latn
# year_short:           2010
# year_long:            2010-2014
# vernacular_title:     
# english_title:        The New Testament in Gorantalo
# URL:                  http://alkitab.mobi/tb/Mrk/1/4/
# copyright_short:      © Alkitab.SABDA.org 2010-2014
# copyright_long:       Alkitab.mobi © 2010-2014 Alkitab.SABDA.org<br>SABDA.mobi
# notes:                
40001001	Uti-utieelo daputali nenemoya li Isa , wali mai lei Dauda , wali mai lei Abraham . Monto olei Abraham demola olei Dauda , tataa-nggulaalo nenemoya li Isa odie mola :
40001002	Abraham , Isihaka , Yako , Yehuda wau mongo wutatio , Peres wolei Jera ( tiilo limongolio tanggulio ti Tamar ) , Hejron , Ram , Aminadab , Nahason , Salmon , Boas ( tiilolio ti Rahab ) , Obed ( tiilolio ti Rut ) , Isai , wau Olongia Dauda .
40001003	
40001004	
40001005	
40001006	Monto olei Dauda demola maasa bangusa lo Isirai̒lu piloyahu ode Babel tulatuladu tataa-nggulaalo odie mola : tei Salomo ( tiilolio yito bakasi dile lei Uria ) , Rehabeam , Abia , Asa , Yosapat , Yoram , Ujia , Yotam , Ahasa , Hijikia , Manase , Amon , Yosia , Yekonya wau mongo wutatio .
40001007	
40001008	
40001009	
40001010	
40001011	
40001012	Monto bangusa lo Isirai̒lu pilolayahu ode Babel demola pilotutua li Isa tulatuladu tataa-nggulaalo odie mola : Yekonya , Sealtiel , Jerubabel , Abihud , Eliyakim , Ajur , Jadok , Akhim , Eliud , Eleajar , Matan , Yako , Yusu dile li Maria . Wau monto oli Maria boi-boitolo pilotutulio mai ti Isa tai̒luntelio Almasi .
40001013	
40001014	
40001015	
40001016	
40001017	Oditolio monto olei Abraham demola olei Dauda , ngoa̒amila woluo mopulaa pato wali . Monto olei Dauda demola maasa bangusa lo Isirai̒lu pilolayahu ode Babel woluo mopulaa pato wali olo . Monto maasa bangusa lo Isirai̒lu pilolayahu ode Babel demola pilotutua li Isa woluo poli mopulaa pato wali .
40001018	Odie mola hikaayati pasali u pilotutua mai li Isa Almasi . Tiilo-Lio yito ti Maria titiilantahe wolei Yusu . Bo tou̒ timongolio diipo lonika lopatatai ti Maria mai̒lombodaa̒ . Diila otaawa lei Yusu deu̒ ti Maria mai̒lombodaa̒ sababu kawasa lo Rohullah .
40001019	Tei Yusu , tilantahio boito , deu̒yito-yito ngotaalio talaito modungohe butoo̒ lo agama . Oditolio patujulio mabuntoolio tilantahio boito wolo poo̒-poo̒oyo , alihu ti Maria diila moolito totalu lotaa dadaata .
40001020	Tou̒ tei Yusu donggo hemo timbangi mola sua̒li boito , tio maloo̒ tohiilopo . Todelomo tohiilopio boito , tio loo̒onto malai̒kati ngota lo Eeya lotahuda mai olio , " Yusu , wali lei Dauda diila oohe monika woli Maria ; sababu tau̒kikiia̒ tabanta-bantala olio boito lowali tokawasa lo Rohullah .
40001021	Ti Maria mamotutu mai talolai̒ kikiia̒ ngota . Talolai̒ boito musi unteemu mao̒ Isa , sababu Tio mamopoa̒ahu umati-Lio monto duduu-sawaalo limongolio . "
40001022	Ngoa̒amilalo boito motoduo mai odito alihu pohupohutu wolo u matilahuda mai lo Eeya lotimbulude tonabi-Lio , odie ,
40001023	" Tadulahu ngota mao̒mbodaa̒ wau mopotutu mai talolai̒ kikiia̒ ngota . Tau̒kikiia̒ boito mau̒nteelio ' Immanuel ' . " ( Immanuel bahasa lo Ibrani u bolilio mao̒ , " Allahu Taa̒ala mai wolanto " ) .
40001024	Lapatao̒ tei Yusu malobongu mola , pilohutulio mao̒ wolo utilahuda Malai̒kati lo Eeya boito to olio . Tio malonika woli Maria .
40001025	Bo ngotilonggadu ti Maria diipo lopotutu mai lo walai̒o boito , tei Yusu diila lou̒lauwa woli Maria . Wau tou̒ walao̒ boito mapilo tutulio mai , tei Yusu longunte mao̒ o-Lio Isa .
40002001	Ti Isa pilotutulio tokota Betlehemu tolipu lo Yudea tomaasa li Olongia Herodes hemomalenta . Tou̒ boito dengolo lota ahali lopoliyama lonto tiimulu lonao̒ mai ode Yerusalemu .
40002002	Timongolio helohintu ode utoonulalo mao̒ , " Tou̒toonu Walao̒ boito , tamaa potutuolio mai mowali olongia taulo Yahudi ? Ami maloo̒onto poliyama-Lio lobutu mai towimbihu tiimulu , wau ami lonao̒ mai molubo o-Lio . "
40002003	Tou̒ ti Olongia Herodes loo̒dungohe sua̒li boito , tio iloohea daa̒ , odito olo ngoa̒amila tau to Yerusalemu .
40002004	Yi tio malei̒nao̒ mai ngoa̒amila iimamu tau̒wa wau guguu-ruwaalo agama bangusa lo Yahudi lotia̒mbu . Tulusi tio lohintu mao̒ olimongolio , " Tou̒toonu u mapotutualio mai li Olongia tadilanti lo Allahu Taa̒ala ? "
40002005	Timongolio lolametao̒ , " Tokota Betlehemu tolipu lo Yudea . Sababu odie mola u tiluladio mai ngotaalio lonabi ,
40002006	' Yio̒ Betlehemu , tolipu lo Yehuda , yio̒ sama-samaata diila pulito ukikiio̒ towolota lo kokoo-tawaalo upolohuna daa̒ to Yehuda . Sababu monto olemu mamei dungga mai tau̒wa ngota tamamo titau̒wa to umati-U̒ Isirai̒lu . ' "
40002007	Lapatao̒ loo̒tapu mao̒ katalangani boito , tei Herodes malei̒ tiangai tahi ahalia lopoliama lonto tiimulu boito lou̒ poo̒-poo̒oyo . Lapatao̒ yilintulio mao̒ olimongolio omolua patatio poliyama boito bohulo iloontonga .
40002008	Lapatao̒ uito ilahulalio mola timongolio ode Betelehemu wau lolahuli mao̒ utie , " ponao̒lo , mola lolohe mai Walao̒ boito wolo ulintapo . Wau wonu timongoli moo̒dungga o-Lio , pohabaria mai olau̒ , alihu wau̒ olo mamonao̒ mola molubo o-Lio . "
40002009	Tulusi timongolio malonao̒ . Timongolio luli loo̒onto poliyama u iloontonga limongolio omoo̒omolu to ambahu tiimulu . Donggo boli wengahi mongolio loo̒onto poliyama boito ! Poliyama boito mulomulo limongolio wau malo huheli pasipasi toitaato tambati lo Walao̒ boito .
40002010	
40002011	Timongolio tilumuwoto ode bele boito wau loo̒onto Walao̒ boito woli Maria , tiilo-Lio . Timongolio malo sujudu wau lolubo Walao̒ boito , tulusi lomuo̒ tambati lohalata limongolio wau lopodewo mao̒ o-Lio hulawa , alama wau damahu moonu .
40002012	Allahu Taa̒ala malo poe̒elai olimongolio todelomo tohiilopo alihu diila mao̒ mohualinga mola odelei Herodes . Oditolio timongolio malo hualingo lolibaya dalalo wewo .
40002013	Tou̒ tahi ahalia lopoliama boito malo monggato , malai̒kati lo Eeya luli lopo bilohei batanga odelei Yusu todelomo tohiilopo . Malai̒kati boito malo tahuda , " Tei Herodes omakasudu mololohe Walao̒ boito wau pateelio mate-mateelo mao̒ . Sababu uito pobongulo , delowalo Walao̒ boito woliilo-Lio momonggata mola ode Masiri . Potibiluo̒po mola teto tunggula Wau̒ mamuli motahuda mai olemu . "
40002014	Tei Yusu malobongu , wau tou̒ huilo boito tio lodelo Walao̒ boito woliilo-Lio lomonggata mola ode Masiri .
40002015	Timongolio malo tibiluloa̒ mola teto tunggula tei Herodes yilate . Odi-odieelo mola malo toduo wolo u tilahuda lo Eeya lotimbulude tomongo nabii-Lio , odie , " Tio motianga Walau̒u-U̒ monto Masiri . "
40002016	Tou̒ ilotaawa lei Herodes tahi ahalia lopoliama lonto tiimulu boito longaakali olio , maloingo daa̒ tio . Tulusi tio malei̒ pate yila-yilateelo mao̒ ngoa̒amila mongo lolai̒ kekeei̒ taa umululio totibawa dulo taunu to Betelehemu wau topalitio . Uito lotuuu̒de wolo katalangani u lotapulio lonto tahi ahalia lo poliyama boito tomimbihu saaa̒tilio poliyama boito iloontonga .
40002017	Odi-odieelo mola lotoduo mai lou̒ wolo u mapee̒enta yiloi̒ya li Nabi Yeremia , odie ,
40002018	" To Rama dungo-dungohei suala hilimuta yinggile wau hiyongo , Hiliyonga li Rahel mongo walai̒o ; tio diila mohuto liyangolo sababu timongolio madiduu̒ . "
40002019	Lapatao̒ tei Herodes yilate mao̒ , wau tou̒ tei Yusu donggo to Masiri malai̒kati ngota lo Eeya luli lotibilohei to tohiilopio .
40002020	Malai̒kati boito malo tahuda , " Tau-tauwalo tao̒hilaa momate mateelo mao̒ to Walao̒ boito mailate . Sababu uito pobongulo , delowalo Walao̒ boito woliilo-Lio wau pohualingolo mola ode Isirai̒lu . "
40002021	Tei Yusu malobongu , wau lodelo Walao̒ boito woli Maria luli lohualinga mola ode Isirai̒lu .
40002022	Bo lapatao̒ tei Yusu loo̒dungohe deu̒ tei Arkelau , walae̒e Herodes talolai̒ malo buulota woliyamolio lowali olongia tolipu lo Yudea . Oditolio tei Yusu mailoohe lonao̒ mola . Lapatao̒ tio loo̒toduo mai potuhata lo Eeya u wumbutio mola todelomo tohiilopo , tio lonao̒ ode madala lo Galilea . Mota teto tio lotibiluloa̒ tokota u ilunte Najaret .
40002023	Lou̒ odito malo toduo mai wolo uiloi̒ya lomongo nabi pasali lo Walao̒ boito : " Tio mau̒nteelio Taulo Najaret . "
40003001	Tou̒ boito malonao̒ mai tei Yahya Tamopolihua ode huta hungayo u luasi daa̒ to Yudea wau malo lumulo lohutuba .
40003002	" Polilihulo monto duduu-sawaalo limongoli , " ualio mao̒ " sababu Allahu Taa̒ala mahua̒a momalenta odelo Olongia ! "
40003003	Tei Yahya botieelo tamila-kusudu li Nabi Yesaya todelomo uiloi̒yaalio botie , " Woluo tawuwa-wuwaatia̒ to huta hungayo u luasi daa̒ , ' Podapato mao̒ dalalo ode Eeya ; poo̒payade mao̒ dalalo o-Lio . ' "
40003004	Tei Yahya pakepake boo̒ lolambuto unta . Bintolo lo wohutalio walito , wau ua̒alolio bulita wau hula lotiia̒ lo oa̒ayua .
40003005	Dadaata tau lonto Yerusalemu , lonto ngoilanggubu lipu lo Yudea wau lonto mamaa-dalawaalo topalito Dutulaa Yordan lonao̒ mai odelei Yahya .
40003006	Timongolio mai longaku duduu-sawaalo limongolio wau tei Yahya helo polihu olimongolio to Dutulaa Yordan .
40003007	Dadaata olo taulo Parisi wau Saduki lonao̒ mai odelei Yahya mai lei̒lihu . Bo tou̒ tio loo̒onto olimongolio lonao̒ mai malo loi̒ya tio olimongolio , " Timongoli tau moleeto ! Tatoonu talo loi̒ya deu̒ timongoli moo̒lahi monto hukuumani lo Allahu Taa̒ala u mamei dungga mai ?
40003008	Pobilohe mao̒ wolo huhutuumu deu̒ timongoli malo lilihu lonto duduu-sawaalo limongoli .
40003009	Diila mao̒ polantobu u timongoli moo̒lahi monto hukuumani wolo moloi̒ya deu̒ tei Abraham yito tinenemoya limongoli . Poo̒toloma mao̒ , monto boboo-tuwaalo botie olo Allahu Taa̒ala mambo mohutu mai wali odelei Abraham !
40003010	Bulingo malei dapato u poluwodela ayu demola wuwa-wuwaaa̒tio lomao̒ . Timii̒du ayu udiila momungo u mopiohe maluwodulo wau pomahulio ode delomo tulu .
40003011	Watia mopolihu olimongoli wolo taluhu u mopo biloheo̒ deu̒ timongoli malo lilihu lonto duduu-sawaalo limongoli ; bo tamamei dunga mai lapatao̒ Watia , mamo polihu olimongoli wolo Rohullah wau tulu . Tio lebe udaa̒ mao̒ wolaatia . Penu bo modelo sapatu-Lio watia diila paatuti .
40003012	To uluu̒-Lio otiitihe polaapalo ngoa̒amila pale-Lio tunggula belesi . Pale maimoo̒-Lio ode delomo yibungo , bo ngoa̒amila taapo lopale mapobuo-Lio todelomo tulu udiila mowali mate . "
40003013	Tou̒ boito ti Isa lonao̒ lonto Galilea ode Dutulaa Yordan . Mola teto Tio lonao̒ mai odelei Yahya wau lei̒lihu .
40003014	Bo tei Yahya lohimontala diila lololimo hihiile-Lio boito , wau loloi̒ya mao̒ , " wawaatiyalo tapatutilio lihua li Paaa̒ . Botia tumbao̒ ti Paaa̒ tamalonao̒ mai ode laatia . "
40003015	Boti Isa lolametao̒ , " Huliaalo mao̒ bo tosaaa̒ti botie . Sababu lou̒ odito ito mamohutu mao̒ ngoa̒amila u kahandakio lo Allahu Taa̒ala . " Oditolio mailihua lei Yahya ti Isa .
40003016	Lapatao̒ yilihualio , ti Isa hua̒a yilumualai lonto taluhu todutulaa boito . Debolo hulungo lohuo̒olo mola wau ti Isa loo̒onto Rohullah lotuhutai debo odelo bulungi poombo ode yitaa-Tio .
40003017	Lapatao̒ dungo-dungohei suala lo Allahu Taa̒ala lotahuda mai , " Tabotieelo walau̒u-U̒ tapilonu-U̒ . Tio moo̒sanangi hilaa-U̒ . "
40004001	Lapatao̒ ti Isa dilelo lo Rohullah ode huta datahu u luasi daa̒ wau delita alihu mola yimontala lo Ibilisi .
40004002	Wopato pulu hui ti Isa diila lolamela . Lapatao̒ Tio mapilolango .
40004003	Ibilisi lonao̒ mai ode o-Lio wau loloi̒ya mao̒ , " Yio̒ botie Walao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala , diila odito ? Nte ahuli mao̒ boboo-tuwaalo botie mowali roti . "
40004004	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Todelomo Kitabi tulatulade : Manusia diila moo̒tumulo bo wolo roti wambao̒ , bo olo monto motii̒du pilimani u pilotahuda mai lo Allahu Taa̒ala . "
40004005	Lapatao̒ uito ti Isa dilelo lo Ibilisi ode Yerusalemu , tokota mantali , wau pilopo tihulio Tio tobilinga Bele lo Eeya .
40004006	Lapatao̒ Ibilisi loloi̒ya mao̒ o-Lio , " Yio̒ botie Walao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala , diila odito ? Wonu odito potidehulo mola ode walungo ; sababu todelomo kitabi woluo tulatulade odie , ' Allahu Taa̒ala mamopoa̒hu mai mamaa-lai̒kati-Lio moduo̒la ole-Mu , timongolio mamo langgomo ole-Mu wolo uluu̒ limongolio , alihu oa̒atu-Mu diila meiteduo̒ tobotu . ' "
40004007	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Bo todelomo Kitabi tulatulade olo , ' Diila mowali yio̒ mohimontala Allahu Taa̒ala Eeyaamu . ' "
40004008	Lapatao̒ Ibilisi luli lodelo mola li Isa ode hui̒dee molanggato daa̒ wau lopobilohe o-Lio ngoa̒amila bele biluloa̒ saaha li olongia todunia wolo okokayalio .
40004009	Lapatao̒ loloi̒ya mao̒ Ibilisi odeli Isa , " Ngoa̒amila botie mawohiu̒ mai ole-Mu , wonu Yio̒ mosujudu molubo olau̒ . "
40004010	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Pohinggi mao̒ yio̒ , wuu Tamoo-heingawa ode dusa ! Todelomo Kitabi tulatulade : Tubowa mola Allahu Taa̒ala Eeyaamu , wau pomayaalo to Eeya wambao̒ ! "
40004011	Mapulitio Ibilisi lololaa mao̒ li Isa , wau mamaa-lai̒katiyalo lonao̒ mai lohinta li Isa .
40004012	Tou̒ loo̒dungohe deu̒ tei Yahya mapilo tuwotio ode delomo tutupa , ti Isa malolahi ode Galilea .
40004013	Tilolaa-Lio mao̒ Najaret , tulusi mola lotibiluloa̒ to Kapernaum tobiihu lo Bulalo Galilea tomadala Jebulon wau Naputali .
40004014	Sababu ti Isa lohutu mao̒ suali boito , malo toduo wolo uiloi̒ya li Nabi Yesaya :
40004015	" Huta lei Jebulon wau huta lei Naputali , todalalo ode bulalo , to ngotuwali lo Dutulaa Yordan , Galilea huta lotaa diila Yahudi !
40004016	Bangusa tatumu-tumula todelomo u modio̒lomo maloo̒onto tinelo ulaba-labaalo motinelo ! Duo̒lo tapoo̒-poo̒oyo todelomo lipu lomautu malobutu mai tinelo u mobaango ! "
40004017	Tumulalo mai tou̒ boito ti Isa lolumula lopo habari , " Polilihulo monto duduu-sawaalo limongoli , sababu Allahu Taa̒ala mahua̒a momalenta odelo Olongia ! "
40004018	Tou̒ ti Isa donggo nao̒nao̒ topentadu lo Bulalo Galilea , Tio loo̒onto duulota tamoohalawa , deu̒ito-yito tei Simon ( tai̒lunte olo Petrus ) wolo wutatio , tei Andreas . Timongolio donggo hipoheu̒pa tola tobulalo boito wolo pajala .
40004019	Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ olimongolio , " Dulo dudui̒ mai Wau̒ . Wau̒ mamo ngaajali mai olimongoli momajala tau . "
40004020	Tulusi timongolio malo lolaa mao̒ pajala limongolio wau loduduo̒ li Isa .
40004021	Ti Isa lonao̒ tulusi , lapatao̒ loo̒onto poli taduulota mohutato wewo , deu̒ito-yito tei Yakobus wolei Yahya , mongo walae̒e Jebedeus . Timongolio pee̒-pee̒nta woliyamo limongolio donggo hemo poo̒piohe pajala todelomo bulotu . Ti Isa olo lotianga olimongolio ,
40004022	wau timongolio hua̒a lololaa mao̒ bulotu woliyamo limongolio , lapatao̒ loduduo̒ li Isa .
40004023	To Galilea , ti Isa lomalito ngoilanggubu lipu wau helo ngaajali to bebee-leyaalo u potabiaalo . Tio helo pohabari Habari Mopiohe deu̒ Allahu Taa̒ala mamomalenta . Wau Tio olo helo poo̒luli tahi ngongota wau tahi o aibua .
40004024	Habari pasali li Isa boito malo loladu to ngoilanggubu lipu lo Siria , tilinggula dadaata taa lonao̒ mai ode o-Lio . Timongolio lodelo mai tau-tauwalo tahi duutola totoonulalo ngongoto u hidala-dalaala wau tahi suusawa . Tau-tauwalo tai̒lo tuanga lorohu u moleeto , tahe dudeetolo , didu mowali monao̒ , ngoa̒amilalo piloo̒luli li Isa .
40004025	Ngohuntua daa̒ tau talo duduo̒ li Isa tou̒ boito . Woluo talonto Galilea , woluo talonto Mopuulo Kota , lonto Yudea , wau woluo olo talonto lipu to ngotuwali lo Yordan .
40005001	Tou̒ ti Isa loo̒onto taa dadaata boito , Tio lotao̒dee mola ode huludu . Lapatao̒ Tio malo tihuloa̒a , tahidudua̒ o-Lio lonao̒ mai ode o-Lio ,
40005002	tulusi Tio lolumulao̒ longaajali olimongolio :
40005003	" Potisanangilo tutu tamolaasa diilalo okawasa wau bolo wambao̒ hemo tiwunela mola to Allahu Taa̒ala ; timongolio yito pongawaa̒ umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala !
40005004	Potisanangilo tutu taa hisuukalia lohilao ; Allahu Taa̒ala mamoliyango olimongolio !
40005005	Potisanangilo tutu taa hidupapawa lohilao ; Allahu Taa̒ala mamo poo̒polu mai danti-Lio ode limongolio !
40005006	Potisanangilo tutu taa mooloolo mohutu kahandaki lo Allahu Taa̒ala ; Allahu Taa̒ala mamohutu molaasa sanangi hilaa limongolio !
40005007	Potisanangilo tutu taa u motolia̒ngo taawewo ; Allahu Taa̒ala mamomonu mai olimongolio olo !
40005008	Potisanangilo tutu taa mantali hilaalio ; Timongolio mamoo̒onuhe Allahu Taa̒ala .
40005009	Potisanangilo tutu tamopo toduo dame towolota lomanusia ; Allahu Taa̒ala mamomasisi mai olimongolio odelo mongo wala-I̒o !
40005010	Potisanangilo tutu taa modutolo poloa̒linaya sababu hemohutu kahandaki lo Allahu Taa̒ala ; timongolio yito pongawaa̒ umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala !
40005011	Potisanangilo tutu timongoli wonu henteo̒lio , alinayalio wau pitanaalio domi Wau̒ .
40005012	Mongo nabi tahitumula tou̒ dipo-dipolulio mai limongoli maa ilalinayalio olo debo odelo uito . Potiwengahulo wau potisanangilo , sababu udaa̒ pahala tosologa upilopo dapato lo Allahu Taa̒ala olimongoli . "
40005013	" Timongoli watingo lodunia . Wonu watingo diilalo olamita , wolo donggo mowali poo̒ panggelolo ? Diduluo mao̒ hunalio , bo mapomahulio wau podudutaa̒ lotau .
40005014	Timongoli yito baango dunia . Kota toitaato huludu diila mowali tuuo̒lo .
40005015	Diaaluo tamopo lei̒ita tohe , lapatao̒ molau̒be tohe boito wolo tombe . Tio tumbaa̒ mamopodutu mao̒ tohe boito totambati lotohe , alihu moo̒baango motii̒du tau todelomo bele .
40005016	Odito olo baangumu wajibu tinetinela totalu lotau , alihu timongolio moo̒onto totoonulalo huhutuumu u mopiohe , tulusi mamomuji mola Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli tosologa . "
40005017	" Diila mao̒ ponganggapu deu̒ Wau̒ dungga-dungga mai moluluta butoe̒e Musa wau pongaajali lomongo nabi . Wau̒ dungga-dungga mai diila molulutao̒ uito , bo mai mopoi̒laalo mao̒ bolilio u otutuulio mao̒ .
40005018	Poo̒toloma mao̒ ! Ngotilonggadu hulungo wau dunia donggo woluo , boli hulupu ngotahe meaalo bontoo̒ u pulito kikiio̒ todelomo butoo̒ boito , diila talulutolo , wonu ngoa̒amilalo diipo motoduo mai !
40005019	Masababu uito , titaalo tita tamo lambanga tala tuwau lo papaa-lentaalo boito , penu boli pulito ukikiio̒ wau mongaajali mao̒ taawewo mohutu olo u odito , mamowali tapulito ukikiio̒ towolota umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala . Bolii̒o mao̒ , titaalo tita tamoponao̒ papaa-lentaalo boito wau mongaajali taawewo mohutu u odito olo , mamowali udaa̒ towolota umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala .
40005020	Oditolio eelai mao̒ : Timongoli diila pongalo aakali mowali umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala , wonu diila mongilabotao̒ guguu-ruwaalo agama wau tau-tauwalo Parisi todelomo sua̒li moponao̒ kahandaki lo Allahu Taa̒ala ! "
40005021	" Otaawa limongoli deu̒ toli nenemoyanto , woluo pongaajali debo odelo utie : Diila mao̒ pomate mate-mateelo mao̒ ; titaalo tita tamomate mate-mateelo mao̒ , musi adiliyolo .
40005022	Bo botia potahuda-U̒ mai olimongoli , titaalo tita tamoingo taawewo , maa adiliyolo ; wau titaalo tita tamomuayo taawewo , maa adiliyolo totalu lo Mahakama Agama . Wau titaalo tita moloi̒ya taawewo , ' Mohulodu ' , paatuti tapilola ode delomo tulu lonalaka .
40005023	Masababu uito , wonu tala ngota towolota limongoli donggo hemo podewo wowohilio ode Allahu Taa̒ala , tulusi loo̒e̒ela mola deu̒ woluo taa mongongoto hilaa to olio ,
40005024	mamusi tolaaliopo dewolio boito totalu lotambati podewowalo , tulusi monao̒opo mota modameya wolo tau boito . De lapatio mao̒ uito , bolo tio mowali mohualingai mopodewo wowohilio ode Allahu Taa̒ala .
40005025	Humayaalio woluo taa mopodulohe olimongoli ode mahakama , podameyapo wolio ngotilonggadu timongoli donggo owakutu tou̒ diipo meidungga mota ode mahakama . Wonu diila , tau boito mamohudu olimongoli ode hakimu , tamamohudu mao̒ olimongoli ode pulisi . Lapatao̒ pulisi mamopo tuwoto olimongoli ode delomo tutupa .
40005026	Wau poo̒toloma mao̒ : Tantu timongoli diila tamoo̒ lualai monto tutupa boito , tou̒ diipo moo̒bayali sama-samaata ngoa̒amila dintamu boito . "
40005027	" Otaawa limongoli deu̒ woluo pongaajali debo odelo utie : Diila mao̒ pojina .
40005028	Bo botia Wau̒ motahuda mai olemu : titaalo tita molontongo taabua ngota wau lohuo̒ hilaalio , yi tau boito malojina wolo taabua boito todelomo hilaalio .
40005029	Wonu matomu olowala moo̒sababu olemu mohutu dusa , luo̒heelo wau tapilalo botu lomato boito ! Lebe mopioheo̒ oolia tala tuwau lo pongawaa̒mu lou̒ ngangaawaa̒lo mao̒ matapilo-Lio ode delomo nalaka .
40005030	Wonu uluu̒mu olowala moo̒sababu olemu mohutu dusa , putua mao̒ tapilalo uluu̒ boito ! Lebe mopioheo̒ oolia lo uluu̒mu ngotuwali lou̒ ngangaawaa̒lo mao̒ tumuwoto ode nalaka . "
40005031	" Woluo olo pongaajali debo odelo utie : motii̒du taa u motalaki dilelio tabua , patuti mongohi mao̒ tuladu talaki olio .
40005032	Bo botia potahuda-U̒ mai olemu : titaalo tita tamo talaki dilelio lebe-lebe pomao̒ taabua boito diila lohama pipia , moo̒sababu dilelio boito mojina , wonu dilelio boito muli monika . Wau titaalo tita tamonika wolo taabua tatilalaki boito , yi tio olo malojina . "
40005033	" Otaawa limongoli deu̒ toli nenemoyanto woluo pongaajali debo odelo utie : diila mao̒ pomalonga danti . Wolo u mapilo dantimu wolo tadia totalu lo Allahu Taa̒ala , musi pohutuwomu mao̒ .
40005034	Bo botia potahuda-U̒ mai olemu : diila mao̒ potadia sama-samaata , mopio domi hulungo , sababu hulungo yito tambati huhuloa̒ lo Allahu Taa̒ala ,
40005035	meaalo domi dunia , sababu dunia yito wapidu oa̒a-Tio ; meaalo domi Yerusalemu , sababu ui-uitolo kota li Olongia daa̒ .
40005036	Diila mao̒ potadia olo domi lunggongumu , sababu yio̒ lohihilao diila mowali mohutu huwou̒mu mowali hula meaalo mowali moitomo , penu boli ngopata mao̒ .
40005037	Loi̒yaalo mao̒ wambao̒ , ' Ooo̒ ' meaalo ' Diila ' -- lebe mao̒ leeto dudunggalio mai monto ibilisi . "
40005038	" Otaawa limongoli deu̒ woluo olo pongaajali debo odelo utie : mato tuloa̒ala lomato , dungito tuloa̒ala lodungito .
40005039	Bo botia potahuda-U̒ mai olimongoli : diila mao̒ poniyati totaau hipohutua u moleeto to olemu . Bolii̒o mao̒ wonu woluo tau molambali putongimu olowala polulia mao̒ tio molambali olo putongimu oloihi .
40005040	Wau wonu woluo tau mopodulohe olimongoli ode butoo̒ wau mohile wolo moo̒ohuu̒ boo̒mu , wohia mao̒ jumbamu olo to olio .
40005041	Wonu ngotaalio takawa-kawasa momakusa olimongoli momota balangilio ngokilo lamingio , potaala mao̒ tunggula dulo kilo lamingio .
40005042	Wonu tau mohile u hitua-tuawua to olemu , wohia mao̒ tio . Wau diila mao̒ potoulia olo taa motohilaa mobulota u hitua-tuawua monto olemu . "
40005043	" Otaawa limongoli deu̒ woluo olo pongaajali debo odelo utie ; tolia̒nga mao̒ mongo sahabatimu wau oingoi mao̒ mongo satulumu .
40005044	Bo botia potahuda-U̒ mai olimongoli : tolia̒nga mao̒ mongo satulumu , wau dua̒i mola tau-tauwalo tahipo ngalinayawa olimongoli ,
40005045	Alihu timongoli mowali mongo walao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli tato sologa . Sababu Allahu Taa̒ala mopobutu mai mato lodula-Hio ode taa u mopiohe wau ode taa u moleeto olo . Allahu Taa̒ala mopo tuhutai didi ode taa hipohutua u otutu wau ode taa hipohutua umoleeta olo .
40005046	Sababu wonu timongoli motolia̒ngo bo taa motolia̒ngi mongoli wambao̒ , pongola Allahu Taa̒ala musi molontuli mai huhutuumu boito ? Diila odito olo u hepilohutu lo tahipo tagia beya ?
40005047	Wau wonu timongoli mongohi mao̒ salamu bo tomongo sahabatimu wambai̒o , wolo hebatilio ? Tau-tauwalo tadiila hitotaawa to Allahu Taa̒ala olo hipohutua odito !
40005048	Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli tosologa momonu mai ngoa̒amila tau wolo wimu-wimumuto ngoa̒milalo . Timongoli olo musi odito . "
40006001	" Eelai mao̒ , diila pohutua limongoli u pilopo wajibu lo agama totalu lotaa dadaata alihu oontonga lotau . Wonu timongoli mohutu u odito , yi timongoli diila tawohia lo Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli wuupa monto sologa .
40006002	Oditolio , wonu timongoli mongohi sadaka ode taa mosikini diila mao̒ pololade sua̒li boito debo odelo u hepohutuo lotau-tauwalo tahi munapikia . Timongolio yinao mohutu u odito todelomo bele potabiaalo wau to dalala daa̒ alihu pujio lotau . Eelai mao̒ , timongolio malo lolimo wuupalio .
40006003	Bo timongoli , wonu timongoli mongohi sadaka , wohia mao̒ wolo poo̒-poo̒oyo , tilinggula diaaluo tamotota .
40006004	Huliaalo mao̒ huhutuumu boito diila otaawa boli lotatoonu , ngopohia Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli tosologa . Allahu Taa̒ala moo̒onto mai huhutuumu u tuutuo̒ boito wau mamongohi mai wuupa olemu . "
40006005	" Wonu timongoli modua̒ , diila mao̒ potihutu debo odelo tahi munapikia . Timongolio motohilaa modua̒ hitihula tobele potabiaalo wau topotanga lodalalo alihu oontonga lotau . Eelai mao̒ , ui-uitolo wuupa u matilolimo limongolio .
40006006	Bo wonu timongoli modua̒ , tuwotao̒ ode huwali wau heu̒ti mai huhebu , wau podua̒alo mola ode Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli tadiila oontonga boito . Yi Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli tamoo̒onto huhutuumu u tuutuo̒ boito mamongohi mai wuupa olemu .
40006007	Wonu timongoli modua̒ , diila mao̒ wulita wuwuulia tilinggula diaaluo bungolio wau huudio debo odelo tau-tauwalo tadiila hitooawa to Eeya . Timongolio hipo lantobua deu̒ hihiie limongolio madungohe-Lio sababu dua̒ limongolio u hayahayaa̒ boito .
40006008	Diila mao̒ potihutu debo odelo timongolio . Mai̒lotaawa lo Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli wolo upalaluo limongoli , tou̒ diipo pohile mola limongoli .
40006009	Oditolio podua̒alo mola odie , ' Allahu Taa̒ala lo mongowatotia to Sologa : Eeyaalo Allahu Taa̒ala tabo Tuwa-tuwaulo . Pohileaala dua̒ Eeya tuboolo wau hulumatiolo .
40006010	Eeyaalo Olongia lo mongowatotia . Pohileaala dua̒ Eeya momalenta todunia wau kahandaki lo Eeya dungohelio debo odelo tosologa .
40006011	Wuduwalo mai todulahee botie ua̒alo u palaluo lo mongowatotia .
40006012	Ambungua mai mongowatotia monto totala lo mongowatotia , debo odelo mongowatotia malo ngambungu taa u ototala to mongowatotia .
40006013	Diila mao̒ polulia mai mongowatotia oolia lo palacaya tou̒ mongowatotia yimontalalio bo lopatalo mai mongowatotia monto kawasa lo Ibilisi . [ Eeyaalo Olongia tao̒kawasa wau molamahu u ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ . Amien . ] '
40006014	Wonu timongoli mongambungu tao̒totala tolimongoli , Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli tosologa olo mamo ngambungu mai totalamu .
40006015	Bo wonu timongoli diila mongambungu totala lotaa wewo , Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli tosologa olo diila mongambungu mai totalamu . "
40006016	" Wonu timongoli mopuasa , diila mao̒ potihutoo̒ debo odelo tahi munapikia . Timongolio molomelo baya limongolio alihu ngoa̒amila tau motota deu̒ timongolio hipuasawa . Eelai mao̒ , ui-uitolo wuupa u matilolimo limongolio .
40006017	Bo wonu timongoli mopuasa , polimamutao̒ wau heidi mola huwou̒mu ,
40006018	alihu diaaluo tamotota deu̒ timongoli hipuasawa , ngopohia Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli tadiila oontonga boito wambao̒ . Allahu Taa̒ala moo̒onto huhutuumu u tuutuo̒ boito wau mamongohi mai wuupa olemu . "
40006019	" Diila mao̒ pohimoa̒a halata ode batangamu todunia , tou̒toonu wale wau taato mowali mopolusa wau tamootao̒wa monao̒ mai motao̒ mao̒ .
40006020	Bolii̒o mao̒ , pohimoo̒lo halata tosologa , tou̒toonu diaaluo wale wau taato u mopolusa wau tamootao̒wa diila monao̒ mai u motao̒ mao̒ .
40006021	Sababu tou̒toonu halatamu teto olo hilaamu ! "
40006022	" Mato yito tohe lobatanga . Wonu matomu mobaango , ngoa̒amila batangamu mobaango daa̒ .
40006023	Bo wonu matomu pulauwolo ngoa̒amila batangamu modio̒loma daa̒ . Oditolio wonu tohe todelomo batangamu boito modio̒lomo , donggo boli tontoyoo̒mo odio̒loma boito ! "
40006024	" Diaaluo penu boli ngota mao̒ tamowali mokalaja ode tuani duulota . Sababu tio maalebe motolia̒ngo ngotaalio wolo tawewo . Meaalo tio maalebe tatapu wau molotolo hilao toli tuani ngota wolo tawewo . Odito olo wolimongoli . Timongoli diila mowali mokalaja duo̒lo Allahu Taa̒ala wau duo̒lo halata upango olo .
40006025	Sababu uito poo̒toloma mao̒ : diila mao̒ polawalo pasali lou̒ potumulumu , deu̒ito-yito wolo umaa polameli mongoli wau uilumolo , meaalo wolo u mapomake limongoli . Diila matutumulo boito mongilabotao̒ wolo ua̒alo wau batanga boito wolo boo̒ ?
40006026	Pomilohe mola bulungi to dulente . Bubuu-lungiyalo boito diila hipomuloa , diila hipolipua , wau diila olo hipohimoa̒ tilapula lou̒ pilomulolio todelomo yibungo . Penu boli odito Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli tosologa helo laalao̒ bubuu-lungiyalo boito ! Wolo timongoli diila lebe ohalaga wolo bulungi ?
40006027	Tatoonu monto olimongoli tawolo ololawalio mowali mopohayaa̒ tutumulio penu boli ngoi̒di mao̒ ?
40006028	Yilongola timongoli molawalo pasali lou̒ pomakemu ? Poo̒tuoti mota bubuu-ngawaalo baakungi u hibutua tohuta datahu wau luasi . Bubuu-ngawaalo boito diila hipo kalajawa wau diila hipo hewola ;
40006029	Boti Olongia Salomo penu boli odito kayalio , diila helomake boo̒ debo odelo piohio lo bubuu-ngawaalo boito !
40006030	Huo̒yoto tohuta datahu wau luasi mobutu mai todulahee botie wau loombulio mola pobuolio tunggula maahu . Bo Allahu Taa̒ala helo podadai huo̒yoto boito odito piohio . Tidiyolo mao̒ timongoli ! Bo timongoli diila boti palacaya .
40006031	Diila mao̒ polawalo wau moloi̒ya , ' Wolo umaa lamelonto ' , meaalo ' wolo u mailumonto ' , meaalo ' wolo umaa pomakento ' ?
40006032	Susuu-aliyaalo boito laito heilapita lotaa diila hitooawa lo Allahu Taa̒ala . Lebe-lebe pomao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli tato sologa motota deu̒ timongoli momalalu ngoa̒amilalo boito .
40006033	Oditolio , potolo anipo meimulo alihu Allahu Taa̒ala momalenta mai tutumulumu wau pohutua mao̒ kahandaki-Lio . Yi , ngoa̒amila u wewolio mawohi mai lo Allahu Taa̒ala olo olemu .
40006034	Masababu uito , diila mao̒ polawalo pasali lou̒ loombu . Sababu uloombu olo woluo ololawalio lohihilao . Dulahee otie malo tuuu̒de osuusalio , diilalo mao̒ duhengi . "
40007001	" Diila mao̒ pomutoo̒ taa wewo , alihu timongoli lohihilao olo diila butoo̒ lo Allahu Taa̒ala .
40007002	Sababu woloololio mola timongoli momutoo̒ taawewo , odito olo Allahu Taa̒ala momutoa̒i olimongoli . Wau tuuu̒du u pomake limongoli ode taawewo , mapomake lo Allahu Taa̒ala olo ode limongoli .
40007003	Yilongola timongoli moo̒onto pulingo ayu todelomo mato lo wutatumu , hiambola balaki todelomo matomu lohihilao diila poo̒tuoti mongoli ?
40007004	Woloolo mola timongoli mowali moloi̒ya mao̒ to wutatumu , ' Dulo mainggilou̒ mai pulingo ayu todelomo matomu ' , hiambola todelomo matomu lohihilao obaalaki ?
40007005	Wuu munapiki ! Yinggilapo baalaki monto matomu lohihilao , deu̒ito yio̒ mamoo̒onto wolo mopatato , wau moo̒ poinggi mao̒ pulingo ayu monto mato lo wutatumu .
40007006	Diila mao̒ wohia balangi u mantali ode apula , alihu apula boito diila tamobale mai wau moluhu olemu . Wau diila mao̒ wohia mutiala ode boi , alihu boi boito diila mao̒ molumbe-lumbetaa̒ mutiala boito . "
40007007	" Pohile , yi timongoli mamo olimo . Pololohu , yi timongoli mamoo̒tapu . Pongokoo̒ , yi huhebu mahuo̒walio olemu .
40007008	Sababu taa u mohile mamololimo ; taa u mololohu mamoo̒tapu ; wau taa u mongokoo̒ , mahuo̒walio to huhebu .
40007009	Towolota limongoli botie tingga woluo tiyamo ngota mongohi botu to walai̒o , wonu tio mohile roti ?
40007010	Meaalo mongohi tulidu , wonu tio mohile uponula ?
40007011	Penu boli timongoli moleeto , timongoli debo motota olo mongohi mao̒ u mopiohe ode mongo walai̒ mongoli . Tidiyolo mao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli tosologa ! Eeya lebe mao̒ leeto mamongohi mai u opiohe totaa u mohile mola to Eeya .
40007012	Pohutua mao̒ taawewo debo odelo u otohilaa limongoli u pohutuo mai limongolio . Ui-uitolo bungo lo butoe̒e Musa wau pongaajali lomongo nabi . "
40007013	" Tuwotolo moli huhebu u meepito , sababu huhebu wau dalalo udulu-ulunga ode nalaka udaa̒ wau motanggalo , wau dadaata tau molibaya mao̒ .
40007014	Bo meepito wau mototolo huhebu wau dalalo u modelo tau ode tutumulo . Wau bo ngoi̒di taa u moo̒tapu mao̒ . "
40007015	" Poo̒daha-dahaalo mao̒ tomongo nabi paluti . Timongolio monao̒ mai ode limongoli motihutu debo odelo himba , bo tutuulio tutu timongolio debo odelo saligala mongantau .
40007016	Timongoli mamoo̒onuhe olimongolio monto huhutu limongolio . Diu̒to u oduhi diila mongohi mai hungo lo angguru wau diu̒to u oduhi diila mongohi mai hungo lo ar .
40007017	Monto bungo lo ayu u molomiodu poo̒tapulalo hungo u mopiohe , wau monto bungo lo ayu udiila molomiodu hungo u moleeto .
40007018	Bungo lo ayu u molomiodu diila moo̒wohi hungo u moleeto , wau bungo lo ayu udiila molomiodu diila moo̒wohi hungo u mopiohe .
40007019	Timii̒du bungo lo ayu udiila moo̒wohi hungo u mopiohe , luwodulo wau pobuwolo .
40007020	Odito olo mongo nabi paluti . Timongoli mamoo̒onuhe olimongolio monto huhutu limongolio . "
40007021	" Diila ngoa̒amila taa u mongibode ola-U̒ , ' Eeya , Eeya , ' mamowali pongawaa̒ umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala , bo wambao̒ taa u hipohutua kahandaki li Paapa-U̒ tosologa .
40007022	Todulahu Kiama ngohuntua tau mamo loi̒ya to ola-U̒ , ' Eeya , Eeya , diila maawolo tanggulo Eeya mongowatotia helo potunggulao̒ tahuli lo Allahu Taa̒ala ? Wau diila maawolo tanggulo Eeya olo mongowatotia helo hinggi roroo-huwaalo moleeto wau helohutu dadaata moo̒linggolabu ? '
40007023	Bo Wau̒ mamolametai , ' Wau̒ diila moo̒taawa woli mongoli ! Pohinggi mao̒ monteea , timongoli tahi pohutua u moleeto ! ' "
40007024	" Naa , taa u modungohe tahuda-U̒ botie , wau modudua̒ao̒ , tutuuwauwa debo odelo taa molinepo momongu belelio toitaato botu .
40007025	Tou̒ modehu didi , wau taluhu modaa̒ mai wau dupoto moo̒huu̒ molemba bele boito , bele boito diila molohubu sababu mabilongu toitaato botu .
40007026	Wau taa u modungohe tahuda-U̒ botie , bo diila modudua̒ao̒ , tio tutuuwauwa debo odelo taa mohulodu momongu belelio to hungayo .
40007027	Tou̒ modehu didi , wau taluhu modaa̒ mai dupoto moo̒huu̒ molemba bele boito , bele boito molohubu . Wau antululio polu-polutuo̒ ! "
40007028	Pulitio ti Isa yilapato longaajali , wau tau-tauwalo tawoluo teto lolinggolabe daa̒ loo̒dungohe pongaajali-Lio .
40007029	Sababu Tio helo ngaajali wolo tilihula , diila debo odelo guguu-ruwaalo agama limongolio .
40008001	Ti Isa lotuhutai lonto huludu , wau dadaata tahelo dudua̒ o-Lio .
40008002	Tou̒ boito lonao̒ mai ngotaalio tao̒ngongoto lo alipo u moo̒tihela hapato . Tio malo tibonggohuu̒ totalu li Isa , tulusi loloi̒ya " Paaa̒ , wonu ti Paaa̒ mohuto , ti Paaa̒ mowali mopoo̒luli mai olaatia . "
40008003	Ti Isa lodedeta tau boito wau lotahuda mao̒ , " Wau̒ mohuto . Poluliilo ! " Tou̒ boitolo ngongotio maloluli .
40008004	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda olio , " Eelai mao̒ ! Diila mao̒ wunggulia penu boli olo tatoonu . Bo ponao̒lo mota odeli iimamu , wau pohilea mao̒ olio u molantu mai deu̒ yio̒ maloluli . Lapatao̒ uito podewowalo bake upilo malentai lei Musa , odelo bukuti ode tau-tauwalo deu̒ yio̒ otu-otutuulo mao̒ maloluli ! "
40008005	Tou̒ ti Isa tilumuwoto ode Kapernaum , ngotaalio polowila lo Roma lonao̒ mai lodunggaya wo-Lio , wau lei̒ tulungi o-Lio .
40008006	" Paaa̒ , " ualo polowila boito , " wato lowatia mongongoto tobele . Tio balabalata didu mowali mobongu monto potulehelio wau sikisaa daa̒ . "
40008007	Tahuda mao̒ li Isa , " Wau̒ mamonao̒ mota mopoo̒luli olio . "
40008008	" Sambelolo Paaa̒ , " tametao̒ lo polowila boito , " watia diila paatuti mololimo li Paaa̒ tobele lowatia . Palentailo li Paaa̒ . De wato lowatia boito mamoluli .
40008009	Sababu watia olo mamusi taa̒aluku topalenta lo tatoitaato lowatia . Wau totibawa lowatia woluo olo mongo pajule tamusi taa̒aluku topalenta lowatia . Wonu watia mopoa̒hu pajule ngota , ' Poonao̒ ! ' tio olo monao̒ . Watia moloi̒ya mao̒ ode tawewo , ' Odia mai ! ' tio olo monao̒ mai ; wau wonu watia momalenta wato lowatia , ' Pohutua mao̒ utie ! ' tio poli mamohutu uito . "
40008010	Tou̒ ti Isa loo̒dungohe wolo uiloi̒ya lo polowila boito , Tio lolinggolabe daa̒ . Lapatao̒ Tio malo tahuda ode tau-tauwalo tadonggo hidudua̒ o-Lio , " Hebati daa̒ tau botie . Boli towolota taulo Isirai̒lu diipo pee̒enta mao̒ Wau̒ loo̒dungga iimani debo odelo utie udaa̒lio !
40008011	Otutu ! Dadaata tau mamonao̒ mai monto tiimulu wau otolopa u motiwengahe pee̒-pee̒enta wolei Abraham , Isihaka , wau wolei Yako todelomo Dunia Bohu lo Allahu Taa̒ala .
40008012	Lebe-lebe pomao̒ tau-tauwalo tawajibulio mowali umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala mapomahulo ode u modio̒lomo to bulemengio . Mota teto timongolio mahumoyongo wau modutolo . "
40008013	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ ode polowila boito , " Pohualingolo , wolo u pilalacayamu boito mamotoduo . " Wau tou̒ boitolo watolio maloluli .
40008014	Ti Isa lonao̒ mota ode bele lei Petrus . Mota teto Tio loo̒onto tiilo moluhengo lei Petrus donggo he polipitolo to potuluhelio .
40008015	Ti Isa lolontalao̒ uluu̒lio , tulusi polipitio yiloole . Tio malo bongu wau lohinta mao̒ li Isa .
40008016	Tou̒ malo laangai , hedilelo mai lotau odeli Isa dadaata tamaa ilotuanga lorohu u moleeto . Wau bo wambao̒ lou̒ ngotahe pilopo hinggi mao̒ li Isa roroo-huwaalo u moleeta boito wau helo poo̒luli olo ngoa̒amila tahi ngongota .
40008017	Ti Isa lohutu mao̒ ngoa̒amilalo boito , wau woleeto lotoduwolo mola wolo uiloi̒ya li Nabi Yesaya , deu̒ito-yito " Tio momanta dudutolonto wau mopoo̒luli ngongotonto . "
40008018	Dadaata daa̒ tau hipalita toli Isa . Tou̒ ti Isa loo̒onto olimongolio ngoa̒amila , Tio malo poa̒hu tahidudua̒ o-Lio lobalango bulalo .
40008019	Lapatao̒ ngotaalio guru lo agama lonao̒ mai ode o-Lio wau loloi̒ya , " Paaa̒ Guru , watia ohilaa modudua̒ li Paaa̒ boli ode utoonu ! "
40008020	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Saligala oliyango , wau bulungi obeelealio , bo Walao̒ Manusia diila otambati u poti balatalo . "
40008021	Lapatao̒ ngotaalio lomuri-Lio uwewo loloi̒ya , " Paaa̒ , polulia mai watia mohualingopo mota molobunga oliyamo lowatia . "
40008022	Boti Isa lolametao̒ , " Dudui̒ mai Wau̒ , wau hulia mao̒ taamate molobungao̒ taa matelio lohihilao . "
40008023	Ti Isa malo titae̒ tobulotu wau tahidudua̒ o-Lio lodudua̒ pee̒-pee̒enta wo-Lio .
40008024	Debolo dutala daa̒ tutu lolemba mai bulalo tilinggula bulotu hepilo-pilomai̒lio lobuo̒olo . Tou̒ boito ti Isa donggo tuutuluhu .
40008025	Yi tahidudua̒ o-Lio malo himbideo̒ o-Lio wau lopobungu mao̒ o-Lio . " Paaa̒ ! Tulungi mai ! Ito mamoa̒humo ! " wuwaatii̒ mongolio .
40008026	" Yilongola timongoli moohe ? " tahuda mao̒ li Isa . " Timongoli diila boti palacaya ola-U̒ ! " Lapatao̒ ti Isa matilimihula mola wau longantinga dupoto wau bulalo boito . Tulusi bulalo mailoole daa̒ .
40008027	Tahidudua̒ li Isa hilinggolabe . Uali mongolio , " Tatoonu Tio botie , tunggula dupoto wau buo̒olo moduduo̒ palentaa-Lio ! "
40008028	Ti Isa malei dungga mola ode ngotuwali lobulalo tomadala lo Gadara . Mola teto taduulota tamaa ilotuanga lorohu u moleeto lonao̒ mai ode o-Lio . Taduulota boito hileeta daa̒ , tilinggula diaaluo penu boli ngotaa mao̒ tabuheli lumaodeo̒ teto .
40008029	Timongolio yilumualai lonto gowa lokuubulu wau hiwuwaatia̒ , " Walao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala , mapongola-Mu ami ? Wolo Yio̒ ohilaa mai mopo sikisa olami penu boli diipo wakutuulio ? "
40008030	Diila molamingo monteeto , woluo boi dadaata daa̒ donggo hipopeehuma ua̒alolio .
40008031	Roroo-huwaalo umoleeta boito lomolohone mao̒ li Isa , " Wonu Yio̒ mamopoa̒hu olami lumualao̒ , ahulilo mai ami tumuwoto mota ode delomo bobooiyaalo boito " .
40008032	" Pohinggilo mao̒ ! " tahuda li Isa . Roroo-huwaalo umoleeta boito mailumualo lonto taduulota boito , tulusi tilumuwota mota ode delomo bobooiyaalo boito . Wau bobooiyaalo boito olo tilumeteo̒ wau lotidehulo mola lonto biihu pangato ode delomo bulalo , tulusi yilumoduo̒ .
40008033	Tahipo dahawa boi boito tilumeteo̒ ode kota , wau mota lohungguli ngoa̒amila u lotoduo boito , wau olo tomimbihu wolo u lotoduo to taduulota tai̒lo tuanga lorohu u moleeto boito .
40008034	Yi ngoa̒amila taa tokota boito olo malonao̒ mola lodunggaya woli Isa . Tou̒ timongolio loo̒onto li Isa , timongolio lomolohone tio̒otutua alihu Tio mololaa mao̒ lipu limongolio .
40009001	Ti Isa malo titae̒ tobulotu , tulusi lobalango bulalo , wau lohualingo ode tambati pilohuluta loduhu-Lio .
40009002	Mota teto tau lodelo mao̒ ode o-Lio ngotaalio tadidu mowali monao̒ balabalata to amongo . Tou̒ ti Isa loo̒onto malo odito udaa̒ iimani lotau-tauwalo boito , Tio malo tahuda ode tadidu mowali monao̒ boito , " Posabalilo , walau̒u-U̒ ! Duduu-saamu mai̒lambungu . "
40009003	Dengolo lota guru lo agama tawoluo teto mahipo loi̒yawa todelomo hilaa limongolio , " Tau botie hemohina Allahu Taa̒ala ! "
40009004	Otaawa li Isa pikiilangi limongolio , oditolio Tio malo tahuda , " Yilongola pikiilangi limongoli malo odito leetio ?
40009005	Toonu ulebe gambangi : motahuda mao̒ , ' Dusamu mai̒lambungu ' , meaalo motahuda mao̒ , ' Pobongulo wau ponao̒lo ' ?
40009006	Bo botia Wau̒ mamopo bukuti mai olemu deu̒ todunia botie Walao̒ Manusia okawasa mongambungu dusa . " Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ ode taa didu mowali monao̒ boito , " Pobongulo , bintaa̒lo amongumu wau pohualingolo ! "
40009007	Taa didu wowali monao̒ boito malobongu wau lohualinga ode belelio .
40009008	Tou̒ tau-tauwalo loo̒onto mao̒ ulotoduo boito , timongolio mailoohe wau helomuji Allahu Taa̒ala , sababu Allahu Taa̒ala malongohi mai kawasa u odito udaa̒lio ode manusia .
40009009	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lololaa mao̒ tambati boito . Tou̒ donggo nao̒nao̒ , Tio loo̒onto ngotaalio tamootagia beya , tai̒lunte Matiusi , donggo hulohuloa̒a tokantoli lobeyalio . Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ olio , " Dulo dudui̒ mai Wau̒ ! " Yi tei Matiusi matilimihulo wau loduduo̒ li Isa .
40009010	Tou̒ ti Isa donggo hemo lamela tobele lei Matiusi , malonao̒ mai ngohuntua tamootagia beya wau tau-tauwalo tahe anggapuo diila mopiohu lo ulipu , lodudua̒ lolamela pee̒-pee̒enta woli Isa wau tahidudua̒ o-Lio .
40009011	Woluo tau-tauwalo Parisi taloo̒onto mao̒ sua̒li boito . Wau timongolio malohintu to tahidudua̒ li Isa , " Wolo sababuulio gurumu hemo lamela pee̒-pee̒nta wolo tamootagia beya wau tau-tauwalo tadiila hipiohe ? "
40009012	Ti Isa loo̒dungohe yiyintu limongolio boito tulusi lolametao̒ , " Taa seehati diila momalalu dokuteli , bo taa u mongongoto wambao̒ .
40009013	Tuletea mao̒ wolo boliilo ayati lokitabi botie : ' Wau̒ mokahandaki odehu hilao , wau diila bake lo binatangi ' . Sababu Wau̒ dungga-dungga mai diila mai motianga taa u monganggapu batangalio malopiohe , bo totaaa anggapuolio hina . "
40009014	Lapatao̒ uito tahidudua̒ olei Yahya Tamopolihua lonao̒ mai odeli Isa . Tulusi timongolio malohintu , " Yilongola amiaatia wau tau-tauwalo Parisi hemo puasa hiambola tahidudua̒ li Paaa̒ diila ? "
40009015	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Woloolo mola huhama limongoli ? Tingga mowali tahe tiloduo to potihunggu lonika boito motisuukali lohilao wonu tibulentiti lai̒ donggo woluo pee̒-pee̒enta woli mongolio ? Tantu diila ! Bo mamei dungga wakutuulio tibulentiti lai̒ boito mahamaalio monto olimongolio . Tou̒ boito deu̒ito timongolio mamo puasa .
40009016	Diaaluo tau u momambola boo̒ u madeedelo wolo kaingi ngopita udonggo bohu . Sababu kaingi pomambola boito mamowali umonggolongo wau mongedenga boo̒ boito tilinggula mamoo̒ sababu kaidingio lebe mao̒ motanggalo .
40009017	Odito olo diaaluo taa u moluango angguru bohu todelomo bututu lowalito u deedelo . Sababu bututu boito mamobutao̒ wau molusa , tulusi anggurulio mamohua̒yadu . Angguru bohu musi tuangola tobututu bohu olo , alihu duduluolo debo mopiohu . "
40009018	Tou̒ ti Isa donggo hemo tahuda ode tahidudua̒ olei Yahya Tamopolihua , malonao̒ mai tau̒wa ngota lobele potabiaalo . Tio malo tibonggohuu̒ totalu li Isa wau loloi̒ya mao̒ , " Walao̒ watia taabua boheli yilate mola . Bo , ambunguolo potala ti Paaa̒ monao̒ mota modedeta olio alihu tio muli tumumulai . "
40009019	Ti Isa lato tilimihulao̒ wau pee̒-pee̒enta wolo tahidudua̒ o-Lio malonao̒ mota wolo tau boito .
40009020	Tohuungo dalaalo taabua ngota tamaa mopulaa dulo taunu hiheolio mongongoto hepobaa̒ta loduhu u aa̒aita wolo dulahio , lohimbideo̒ loli wulea li Isa . To pikiilangilio , " Asali wau̒ bo moo̒ dedeta jumba-Lio , wau̒ mamoluli . " Tulusi tio malo dedeta biihu jumba li Isa .
40009021	
40009022	Tou̒ boito ti Isa loili mao̒ wau loo̒onto taabua boito tulusi lotahuda olio , " Posabalilo , walau̒u-U̒ ! Kalana yio̒ walau̒u-U̒ palacaya ola-U̒ , yio̒ mamoluli ! " Tou̒ boitolo mola taabua boito loluli .
40009023	Lapatao̒ ti Isa leidungga mota ode tau̒wa lobele potabiaalo boito . Tou̒ ti Isa loo̒onto tahi poitoheya muusiki polo tilimi wau dadaata tau hibuluhuta ,
40009024	yi ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ olimongolio , " Lualao̒ timongoli ngoa̒amila ! Walao̒ botie diila yilate ; tio bo tuutuluhu . " Ti Isa bo heilii̒ya limongolio ngoa̒amila .
40009025	Tou̒ tau-tauwalo boito mailumualo , ti Isa tilumuwoto ode delomo huwali lo walao̒ boito wau lodihu mao̒ uluu̒lio . Tulusi walao̒ taabua boito malobongu .
40009026	Habari boito lololadu lomola ode ngoilanggubu madala boito .
40009027	Ti Isa malonao̒ lonteeto wau tohuungo dalalo tapitoo̒ duulota lodudua̒ o-Lio . Timongolio hiwaatia̒ , " Walae̒e Dauda , ponua mai amiaatia ! "
40009028	Tou̒ ti Isa tilumuwoto ode delomo bele , tapitoo̒ duulota boito lonao̒ mai ode o-Lio . Ti Isa lohintu mao̒ olimongolio , " Wolo timongoli palacaya deu̒ Wau̒ mowali mopoo̒luli mao̒ olimongoli ? " " Palacaya , Paaa̒ ! " tametao̒ limongolio .
40009029	Lapatao̒ ti Isa malo dedeta mato limongolio wau lotahuda mao̒ , " Kalana timongoli palacaya , motoduwolo mai wolo u hehalapuo limongoli . "
40009030	Yi timongolio malowali loo̒onto . Ti Isa malo poe̒elao̒ olimongolio wolo pintalo , alihu timongolio diila mopoo̒taa sua̒li boito penu boli olo tatoonu .
40009031	Bo timongolio malonao̒ wau helo pololadu lomola habari pasali li Isa ode ngoilanggubu madala .
40009032	Tou̒ taduulota boito malonao̒ , taabubu ngota takiluwasa lorohu u moleeto dilelolio mai odeli Isa .
40009033	Ti Isa lopolahi mao̒ rohu u moleeto boito wau tosaaa̒tilo boito tau boito malowali lobisala . Taa dadaata boito malo linggolabe wau hipo loi̒yawa , " Diipo pee̒enta mao̒ ami heloo̒onto ulotoduo mai debo odelo utie to Isirai̒lu ! "
40009034	Bo tau-tauwalo Parisi hipo loi̒yawa , " Tau̒wa lo roroo-huwaalo u moleeto boitolo tahe longohi kawasa o-Lio u mopolahi roroo-huwaalo u moleeto boito . "
40009035	Odi-odieelo mola ti Isa helo lontale lonto madala tuwau ode madala uwewo wau lonto kambungu tuwau ode kambungu uwewo . Tio helo ngaajali to bebee-leyaalo potabiaalo , wau helo pololadu Habari Mopiohe pasali lou̒ woloolo mola Allahu Taa̒ala momalenta odelo Olongia . Tio helo poo̒luli tau-tauwalo tahi duutola longongoto u hidala-dalaala wau tao̒ aibu batanga .
40009036	Tou̒ ti Isa loo̒onto taa dadaata boito , malodehu hilaa-Lio olimongolio , sababu didu tantu hilaa limongolio wau didu olootolo , debo odelo himba u diilalo odiiti .
40009037	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ to tahidudua̒ o-Lio . " Tilapulio dadaata , bo taa u mongotolo mao̒ bo ngoi̒di .
40009038	Sababu uito pohilea mao̒ totaa ohuu̒wo lo ilengi boito alihu molao mai tamongotolo duo̒lo tilapulio . "
40010001	Todulahee tuwau ti Isa malo tiangai mopulaa duulota tahidudua̒ o-Lio lotia̒mbu . Lapatao̒ Tio longohi ma̒o kawasa olimongolio mopolahi roroo-huwaalo u moleeto wau mopoo̒luli ngongoto u hidala-dalaala wau aibu lobatanga u hidala-dalaala .
40010002	Tanggulo lo tamopulaa duulota rasulu boito yito : Bohulio , Simon ( tai̒lunte olo Petrus ) wolo wutatio tei Andreas , tulusi tei Yakobus wolo wutatio tei Yahya , uitolo mongo walae̒e Jebedeus .
40010003	Lapatao̒ tei Pilipus wau Bartolomeus , wolei Tomas , wau Matiusi , tamootagia beya wolei Yakobus walae̒e Alpeus , wau Tadeus ;
40010004	tulusi pulitio tei Simon Tamoo-duluwa huta pilohuluta loduhu wau tei Yudas Iskariot talo hiyanati li Isa .
40010005	Tamopulaa duulota rasulu boito lapatao̒ yilao li Isa wolo loo̒tapu popoo-tuhatawalo utie , " Diila mao̒ ponao̒ ode madala lotau-tauwalo tadiila Yahudi . Diila mao̒ olo ode kokoo-tawaalo taulo Samaria .
40010006	Bo ponao̒lo ode tau-tauwalo Isirai̒lu , tolomodu toli mongolio tamailapalo .
40010007	Pohabaria mao̒ olimongolio deu̒ Allahu Taa̒ala mahua̒a momalenta odelo Olongia .
40010008	Poo̒lulia mao̒ tau-tauwalo tahi ngongota ; potumula mao̒ tau-tauwalo tahelo poowate ; poo̒lulia mao̒ tau-tauwalo tao̒ngongoto lo alipo u moo̒tihela hapato , wau yinggila mao̒ roroo-huwaalo u moleeto . Timongoli malo lolimo ngoa̒amilalo boito lou̒ beebasi . Oditolio , pongohi mao̒ olo wolo beebasi .
40010009	Diila podelo doi hulawa , doi talaa̒ , meaanto doi tambaha .
40010010	Diila podelo olo bututu losadaka , meaanto dulo pata boo̒ todelomo nonao̒mu , meaanto sapatu , meaanto tunggudu . Sababu taa u mokalaja mawajibulio powoluwolo u palaluolio .
40010011	Wonu timongoli meidungga tokota meaanto kambungu , lolohe mao̒ ngotaalio tamohuto mololimo olimongoli . Poti biluloo̒po wolio tunggula timongoli muli momonggato .
40010012	Tou̒ timongoli tumuwoto ode bele , loi̒yawa mao̒ , " Pohileaala dua̒ Eeya mobalakati mai olimongoli . "
40010013	Wonu tau-tauwalo tobele boito mololimo olimongoli , huliaalo mao̒ salamu boito debo toli mongolio . Bo wonu timongolio diila mololimo olimongoli , muli pongulia mai salamu boito .
40010014	Wonu woluo bele meaanto kota udiila mohuto mololimo olimongoli , meaanto diila mohuto modungohe olimongoli , tolailo tambati boito wau pongee̒ya mao̒ peaahuo̒ monto paladu oa̒atumu .
40010015	Eelai mao̒ ! To Dulahu Kiama , tau-tauwala lokota Sodom wau Gomora malebe gambangi ambunguo lo Allahu Taa̒ala , wonu pobandingiolo wolo tau-tauwala tokota boito ! "
40010016	" Poo̒tuoti mao̒ utie : Wau̒ molao olimongoli debo odelo himba udiila olootolo ode huungo saligala u mongantau . Timongoli musi mopoo̒daha mao̒ debo odelo tulidu wau tulusi lohilao debo odelo bulungi poombo .
40010017	Poo̒daha-dahaalo mao̒ , sababu timongoli mawau̒polio wau mapo taaluolio wolo mahakama . Timongoli masikisaalio to bebee-leyaalo potabiaalo .
40010018	Timongoli madeloolio mota motaalua wolo tahi kawasawa wau ode mongo olongia sababu timongoli muri-U̒ . Wau ui-uitolo hiyangio olimongoli u mongohi sakusi pasali ola-U̒ olimongolio wau totau-tauwalo tadiila hitootawa lo Allahu Taa̒ala .
40010019	Bo wonu timongoli deloolio u adiliyolio , diila mao̒ polawalo pasali wolo u musi loi̒ya limongoli , meaalo woloolo mola timongoli musi mobisala . Sababu wolo umusi loi̒ya limongoli boito mapoo̒taa mai olemu to wakutuulio .
40010020	Sababu tamamo bisala towakutu boito diila timongoli , bo Rohullah tato sologa , motimbuludei olimongoli .
40010021	Mamotoduo mai deu̒ tau mamohudu wutatio lohihilao pateelio mate-mateelo mao̒ . Wau uitolo u mamotoduo towolota lotiyamo wolo walai̒o . Tau̒kekeei̒ mamoluwali tiilo tiyamolio wau mohudu mao̒ olimongolio u pateelio mate-mateelo mao̒ .
40010022	Timongoli malonuo̒ lotaa ngoa̒amila sababu timongoli muri-U̒ . Bo taa u moo̒taahangi tunggula pulitio mapo aahuwolo .
40010023	Wonu timongoli alinayaalio tokota tuwau , teteo̒lo ode kota uwewo . Poo̒taa-U̒ mai olemu : Tou̒ diipo ilonao̒wa limongoli ngoa̒amila kota to Isirai̒lu , Walao̒ Manusia malei dungga mai .
40010024	Muri diila lebe udaa̒ wolo gurulio , wau wato diila lebe udaa̒ woli tuanilio .
40010025	Malo tuuu̒de wonu muri ngota mowali debo odelo tigurulio , wau wato ngota debo odelo tituanilio . Wonu tau̒wa lou̒ ngaalaa̒ mailohialio tanggulo Beeljebul , tidiyolo mao̒ ngotuango belelio . Timongolio mawohialio tanggulo ulebe moleetao̒ ! "
40010026	" Diila mao̒ oohe tomanusia . Diaaluo utuutuo̒ , udiila oontonga , wau diaaluo u hitua-tuawua u milakusudu hetuuo̒lo diila tamo bonggali .
40010027	Wolo upilo tahuda-U̒ mai olemu todelomo modio̒lomo musi wulia mao̒ limongoli tou̒ mobaango lodulahu . Wau wolo u pilolohuma tobulonga , pomala-lumualo mota uito boli tou̒toonu .
40010028	Diila mao̒ oohe to limongolio tamomate batanga mate-mateelo mao̒ , bo diila okawasa momate nyawa . Ooheelo Allahu Taa̒ala tao̒kawasa mopobinasa mai batanga wau nyawa todelomo nalaka .
40010029	Dinggota mohelu duluo wowali taliyolo wolo mato lodoi ngopita upulito kikiio̒ . Penu boli odito diaaluo mao̒ penu tuwau modehu ode huta wonu diila kahandakio lo Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli .
40010030	Daata lohuwoo̒ to lunggongumu olo mailia̒apa ngoa̒amilalo .
40010031	Sababu uito , diila mao̒ oohe ! Timongoli lebe ohalaga wolo bulungi dinggota ! "
40010032	" Titaalo tita tamo masisi totalu lo taa dadaata deu̒ tio muri-U̒ , Wau̒ olo mamo masisi olio totalu li Paapa-U̒ tosologa .
40010033	Bo titaalo tita tamomaahe totalu lotaa dadaata deu̒ tio muri-U̒ , Wau̒ olo mamomaahe olio totalu li Paapa-U̒ tosologa ! "
40010034	" Diila mao̒ polantobu deu̒ Wau̒ modelo mai polodame ode dunia botie . Wau̒ diila modelo mai polodame , bo pololawani .
40010035	Wau̒ dungga-dungga mai mamoo̒ sababu walao̒ talolai̒ moluwali oliyamolio , walao̒ taabua moluwali oliilolio , wau walao̒ moluhengo bua moluwali oliilo moluhengio .
40010036	Ooo̒ , tamamo luwali musu upulito udaa̒ , deu̒ito-yito pongawaa̒ ngalaa̒lio lohihilao .
40010037	Taa u motolia̒ngo oliyamolio meaanto oliilolio lebe mao̒ wola-U̒ diila patuti mowali muri-U̒ . Odito olo taa u motolia̒ngo walai̒o talolai meaalo taabua lebe mao̒ wola-U̒ .
40010038	Wau taa u diila mohuto momota salipulio wau modudua̒ ola-U̒ diila patuti mowali muri-U̒ .
40010039	Taa u momintengi tutumulio , mao̒olia lo tutumulio , bo tao̒olia lo tutumulio sababu tatapu wau molotolo hilao to ola-U̒ , mamoo̒tapu tutumulio . "
40010040	" Taa u mololimo olimongoli , mamo lolimo ola-U̒ . Wau taa u mololimo ola-U̒ , mamo lolimo o-Lio talolao mai ola-U̒ .
40010041	Taa u mololimo nabi sababu tio nabi , mamo lolimo wuupa odelo ngotaalio lonabi . Wau tatoonu tamo lolimo ngotaalio tamopiohu sababu tio mopiohu , mamo lolimo wuupa odelo ngotaalio lo tamopiohu .
40010042	Titaalo tita tamongohi uilumolo , penu bo taluhu mohuhulo ode tala ngota lotaa hehiinawa daa̒ botie , sababu tio muri-U̒ , pomalacayalo , deu̒ tio maatantu mololimo wuupalio ! "
40011001	Lapatao̒ ti Isa longohi mao̒ totoonulalo potuhata ode tamopulaa duulota muri-Lio , Tio lololaa mao̒ tambati boito . Tio mota longaajali wau lopo loladu tahuli lo Allahu Taa̒ala to kokoo-tawaalo u totili mao̒ leeto .
40011002	Tei Yahya Tamopolihua tadonggo to tutupa maloo̒ dungohe pasali lokalaja li Almasi . Tulusi tio lopoa̒hu dengolo lota tahidudua̒ olio odeli Isa mola lohintu ,
40011003	" Ti Paaa̒alo tamamei dungga mai modudua̒ danti lo Allahu Taa̒ala , meaanto amiaatia musi mohima mai taawewo ? "
40011004	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Pohualingolo mola odelei Yahya wau polelea mao̒ wolo u mai̒lo dungohe wau iloontonga limongoli :
40011005	Taa pitoo̒ maloo̒onto , taa didu mowali monao̒ malowali lonao̒ , tao̒ngongoto lo alipo u moo̒tihela hapato maloluli ; taa bungolo maloo̒ dungohu , taa yilate maa tilumumulai , wau Habari Mopiohe monto Allahu Taa̒ala pilo habariilio ode tau-tauwalo tahi mosikinia .
40011006	Potisanangilo tutu taa diila o alaasani diila mololimo ola-U̒ ! "
40011007	Lapatao̒ mongo utolia lei Yahya boito malonao̒ , ti Isa lolumulo lotahuda totaa dadaata pasali lei Yahya , tahuda-Lio , " Timongoli ode huta datahu u luasi daa̒ wau delita mola loo̒onto wolo ? Huo̒yoto ngopata upilo tomboto dupoto ?
40011008	Timongoli lonao̒ mola loo̒onto wolo ? Ngotaalio tapake pake lou̒ mopiohu ? Tau-tauwalo tahipakea odito hibiluloa̒wa tobele biluloa̒ saaha li olongia !
40011009	Oditolio yilongola timongoli monao̒ mola ode huta datahu u luasi daa̒ wau delita ? Mola momilohe nabi ngota ? Otutu , tumbao̒ lebe udaa̒ mao̒ lonabi ngota .
40011010	Sababu tei Yahya boitolo tamila kusudu todelomo ayati lo Kitabi botie , ' Tabotieelo utoliya-U̒ , tahuda lo Allahu Taa̒ala , Wau̒ lolao mai olio leimulo wole-Mu alihu tio momuo̒ dalalo ole-Mu . '
40011011	Poo̒toloma mao̒ ! Todunia botie diipo pee̒enta woluo taa lebe udaa̒ mao̒ wolei Yahya Tamopolihua . Penu boli odito , tapulito u kikiio̒ towolota umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala lebe udaa̒ mao̒ wolei Yahya .
40011012	Tumulalo mai tei Yahya helo pohabari habariilio tunggula tosaaa̒ti botie , umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala hetilehengi lotau-tauwalo tahipo tolopania motolo kawasa olio wolo palangi .
40011013	Tunggula pilodungga mai lei Yahya , ngoa̒amila butoe̒e Musa wau pongaajali lomongo nabi hipo nubuwatia susuu-aliyaalo umusi motoduo mai .
40011014	Wau wonu timongoli mohuto palacaya , matei Yahya boitolo tei Elia , u podunggaalio mai manilu-buwati .
40011015	Wonu obulonga , podungohulo !
40011016	Wolo tatoonu Wau̒ musi mopo ngilaboto tau-tauwala tojamani botie ? Timongolio debo odelo tau̒kekeei̒ tahi huloa̒a topaatali . Tangopo ambua hipo ngiibode ode taa wewo ,
40011017	' Ami hemo polahu mola lahu wengahe ode limongoli , bo timongoli diila mohuto mongelungo ! Ami hemo polahu mola lahu ilopatea wau timongoli diila mohuto humoyongo ! '
40011018	Tei Yahya leidungga mai -- tio helo puasa wau diila longilu angguru ; wau tau-tauwalo hipo loi̒yawa , ' Tio mai̒lo tuanga lolati ! '
40011019	Botia Walao̒ Manusia , dungga-dungga mai -- Tio helo lamela wau longilu ; tulusi tau-tauwala hipo loi̒yawa , ' Bilohe tau boito ! Olaloa , tahe huwoa̒alo , waito lo tamootagia beya wau waito lotaa odusa . ' Penu boli odito , tinepo lo Allahu Taa̒ala obukuti monto hahaa-siliilio . "
40011020	Lapatao̒ ti Isa malo hentea̒ kokoo-tawaalo , tambati tou̒toonu hepilo hutua-Lio dadaata daa̒ u moo̒linggolabu . Sababu tau-tauwala to kokoo-tawaalo boito diila lohuto lolilihu lonto duduu-sawaalo limongolio .
40011021	" Matopotala timongoli , Korajim ! Wau matopotala olo timongoli , Betsaida ! Humayaalio totoonulalo moo̒linggolabu u pilohutu tohuungi mongoli mapilohutu to Tirus wau Sidon , yi tantu tau-tauwalo mola teto malohiheo lolilihu lonto duduu-sawaalo limongolio wau helomake boo̒ lomilate wau helo podutu peaahuo̒ to lunggongi mongolio .
40011022	Poo̒toloma mao̒ , to Dulahu Kiama , tau-tauwalo Tirus wau Sidon malebe gambangi ambunguo lo Allahu Taa̒ala wolimongoli .
40011023	Wau timongoli , Kapernaum ! Wolo timongoli mapolaio̒-Lio demola sologa ? Diila ! Tumbao̒ timongoli matapiloolo ode nalaka ! Sababu humayaalio totoonulalo moo̒linggolabe u pilohutu tohuungi mongoli boito mapilohutu to Sodom , Sodom boito donggo woluo tunggula botia !
40011024	Poo̒toloma mao̒ , to Dulahu Kiama , taulo Sodom lebe gambangi ambunguo lo Allahu Taa̒ala wolimongoli ! "
40011025	Tou̒ boito ti Isa lodua̒ , " Paapa , Eeya tamotolo kawasa hulungo wau dunia ! Watia mosukuru mola odeli Paapa sababu u ngoa̒amilalo boito hehuliyo li Paapa lonto tahi tootawa wau tao̒ ilimi bo pilopo bilohei li Paapa to tau-tauwalo ode tadiila hio̒o sikolawa .
40011026	Ui-uitolo umoo̒ sanangi hilaa li Paapa . "
40011027	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lobisala , " Totoonulalo u hitua-tuawua mailudu mai li Paapa ode laatia . Diaaluo penu boli ngotaa mao̒ tamotota to Walao̒ ngopohia li Paapa . Diaaluo olo tamotota li Paapa ngopohia Walao̒ , wau tau-tauwala ode tatoonu Walao̒ boito mopoo̒taa mao̒ pasali li Paapa .
40011028	Ponao̒lo mai timongoli ngoa̒amila ode ola-U̒ tahi woongola , wau tamolaasa mobuheto bantalio ; wau̒ mamopo nyamani mai hilaa limongoli .
40011029	Dudui̒ mao̒ palentaa-U̒ wau pobalaajali mai to ola-U̒ . Sababu Wau̒ botie ohilaa mopiohu wau dupadupapa lohilao , yi timongoli mamolaasa nyamani wau moheelo wawao̒ .
40011030	Sababu totoonulalo palentaa-U̒ moo̒sanangi , wau banta u pilopo banta-U̒ mai olimongoli moheelo . "
40012001	Todulahu Saabati tuwau , tou̒ ti Isa yilumaodeo̒ to halabolu lopale ngopita , tahidudua̒ o-Lio malolipu pale , tulusi pilolamelio sababu hipolaanga .
40012002	Tou̒ tau-tauwalo Parisi loo̒onto mao̒ uito , malo loi̒ya timongolio odeli Isa , " Bilohi ! tahidudua̒ ole-Mu malo lambanga butoo̒ lo agamanto lou̒ hipohutua u dinidini todulahu Saabati . "
40012003	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Diipo pee̒enta pilobaca limongoli tomimbihu wolo u pilohutu lei Dauda tou̒ tio wau taulio hipolaanga ?
40012004	Tio tilumuwoto ode delomo Bele lo Allahu Taa̒ala ; tulusi lolamela roti u mapilo dewolio ode Allahu Taa̒ala . Lebe-lebe pomao̒ modudua̒ butoo̒ lo agamanto , tio boli taulio diila mowali molamela roti boito -- bo mongo iimamu wambao̒ tamowali .
40012005	Meaalo diipo pee̒enta timongoli lopobaca mao̒ todelomo butoe̒e Musa u timii̒du dulahu Saabati mongo iimamu tahe otuugasia to Bele lo Eeya , hipo lambangawa wuu̒du lodulahu Saabati , bo diila pilopo talalio ?
40012006	Poo̒tuota mao̒ wolo u tilahuda-U̒ botie : teea woluo talebe udaa̒ mao̒ wolo Bele lo Eeya .
40012007	Todelomo Kitabi tulatulade : Odehu hilaolo u kahandakiyo-U̒ , diila bake lo binatangi . Wonu humayaalio timongoli otu-otutuulo mao̒ mongalati tahuda-U̒ boito , tantu timongoli diila tamo potala totau-tauwalo tadiila ototala .
40012008	Sababu Walao̒ Manusia okawasa todulahu Saabati . "
40012009	Ti Isa lololaa mao̒ tambati boito tulusi lonao̒ ode bele ngowale potabiaala .
40012010	Mota teto woluo tamailate uluu̒lio ngotuwali . Dengolo lota tao̒hilaa mololohe totala li Isa , lohintu mao̒ o-Lio , " Wolo mowali mopoo̒luli tau todulahu Saabati ? "
40012011	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Humayaalio woluo ngotaalio towolota limongoli ohimba tuwau , wau todulahu Saabati himba boito lodehu ode huango u modelomo ; wolo taa ohuu̒wo lohimba boito diila motolopani momatulai himba boito monto huango boito ?
40012012	Naa , manusia lebe ohalaga wolo himba ! Oditolio , wonu odito , mowali motulungi tau todulahu Saabati . "
40012013	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ ode tailate uluu̒lio ngotuwali boito , " Popotulude mai uluu̒mu . " Tau boito malo potulide uluu̒lio , wau uluu̒lio boito maloluli debo odelo uluu̒lio ngotuwali .
40012014	Bo tau-tauwalo Parisi lololaa mao̒ bele potabiaala boito , lapatao̒ loheeluma u momate li Isa mate-mateelo mao̒ .
40012015	Otaawa li Isa deu̒ tau-tauwalo Parisi boito opatuju u moleeto to batanga-Lio . Oditolio Tio malo lolaa mao̒ tambati boito wau dadaata tau lodudua̒ o-Lio . Lapatao̒ Tio malo poo̒luli ngoa̒amila tahi ngongota .
40012016	Bo Tio lodini olimongolio mopoo̒taa pasalii-Lio ode taawewo .
40012017	Lou̒ odito malo toduo wolo upilo tahuda mai lo Allahu Taa̒ala lotimbulude toli Nabi Yesaya ,
40012018	" Tabotieelo utoliya-U̒ Tatilulaotu-U̒ , tapilonu-U̒ wau tamotuuu̒de tohilaa-U̒ . Rohu-U̒ mawohi-U̒ mao̒ o-Lio , oa̒adili-U̒ mapo habario-Lio ode babaa-ngusawalo .
40012019	Tio diila tamo buutola meaanto monguatio̒ , meaanto mopidato todala-dalaalo daa̒ .
40012020	Talilo u putuputuo̒ diila tabolio-Lio , tohe u iyo-iyoopo diila tapatee-Lio . Tio mamohipate tunggula oa̒adili odungga ;
40012021	ngoa̒amila bangusa mamo tiwunela to o-Lio . "
40012022	Lapatao̒ dilelolio mai odeli Isa ngotaalio tapitoo̒ wau bubu sababu makiluwasa lorohu u moleeto . Ti Isa lopoo̒luli mao̒ tau boito tilinggula tio malowali loo̒onto wau lobisala .
40012023	Ngoa̒amila tau lolinggolabe wau hipo loi̒yawa , " Wolo maa Tio botie walae̒e Dauda tadilanti boito ? "
40012024	Tou̒ tau-tauwalo Parisi loo̒dungohe uito , timongolio lolametao̒ , " Tau botie bo mowali mohinggi rohu moleeto , sababu Beeljebul , tau̒wa lo roroo-huwaalo moleeto boito malongohi kawasa boito o-Lio . "
40012025	Ilotaawa li Isa pikiilangi lotau-tauwalo Parisi boito . Oditolio Tio malo tahuda ode limongolio , " Wonu lipu tuwau mopoo̒ mowali hipole-polemboa̒ wau mumuusua , lipu boito diila tamoo̒ taahangi . Wau kota tuwau meaanto ngaalaa̒ u mopoo-pooo̒ wau mumuusua ngota timongota mamoa̒ntulu .
40012026	Odito olo todelomo bele biluloa̒ saaha li olongia lolati ; wonu ungopo lemboa̒ mopohinggi ungopo lemboa̒ wewo , yi bele biluloa̒ saaha li olongia lolati boito malo poo-pooo̒ wau mamoa̒ntulu .
40012027	Timongoli hemoloi̒ya deu̒ Wau̒ helo pohinggi rohu u moleeto sababu kawasa lo Beeljebul . Wonu odito wolo kawasa lotatoonu tahidudua̒ olemu mopohinggi rohu u moleeto . Tahidudua̒ olemu lohihilao boitolo talopo bukuti deu̒ timongoli tilala !
40012028	Bo Wau̒ mopohinggi rohu u moleeto wolo kawasa lo Rohullah . Wau uito boliilio deu̒ Allahu Taa̒ala malo lumulo lomalenta tohuungi mongoli .
40012029	Woloolo mola tau moo̒ tuwotao̒ ode delomo bele ngotaalio tamolotolo molambata halataalio , wonu tio diila momungupo tamolotolo boito ? Lapatao̒ uito , deu̒ito tio moo̒ lambatao̒ halataalio .
40012030	Taa diila motiwambao̒ ode ola-U̒ tutuulio tutu motehengi ola-U̒ . Wau taadiila momantu ola-U̒ tutuulio tutu mongantulu kalajaa-U̒ !
40012031	Masababu uito , ototai mao̒ , wonu tau mohutu dusa wau moloi̒ya u mohina , tio mowali ambunguolo ! Bo wonu tio mohina Rohullah , tio diila mowali ambunguolo !
40012032	Wonu tau moloi̒ya u hitua-tuawua motehengi Walao̒ Manusia , tio mowali ambunguolo , bo wonu tio mohina Rohullah , tio diila mowali ambunguolo , mopio botia boli mola to ahiilari ! "
40012033	" U moo̒tapu mao̒ hungo u mopiohu , bungolio musi molomiodu . Wonu bungolio diila molomiodu hungolio olo diila mopiohu . Molomiodu meaalo diila bungo lo ayu ngobungo mao̒taawa monto hungolio .
40012034	Timongoli tau moleeto , diila pongalo aakali timongoli moo̒ loi̒ya susuu-aliyaalo u mopiohe , wonu timongoli moleeto ? Wolo uiloi̒ya lotunggilo ui-uitolo u molepatai monto hilao !
40012035	Taa mopiohu mobisala susuu-aliyaalo u mopiohu , sababu tio polupolu lou̒ mopiohu . Bo bolii̒o mao̒ taa moleeto mobisala susuu-aliyaalo lou̒ moleeto sababu tio polupolu lou̒ moleeto .
40012036	Oditolio , poo̒toloma mao̒ : to Dulahu Kiama , ngota-ngota musi momanta timii̒du uiloi̒yaalio udiila ohuna .
40012037	Sababu loi̒yamu lohihilao boitolo u pomake u molantu wolo yio̒ ototala meaanto diila . "
40012038	Lapatao̒ dengolo lota guru lo agama wau tau-tauwalo Parisi loloi̒ya mao̒ , " Paaa̒ Guru amiaatia ohilaa momilohe li Paaa̒ mohutu u moo̒linggolabu . "
40012039	" Donggo boli leetio wau juluhakalio tau-tauwala tojamani botie ! " tametao̒ li Isa , " Timongoli mei̒hutu ola-U̒ u moo̒lingolabu ? Timongoli diila tawohiya-U̒ penu boli tuwau mao̒ u moo̒lingolabu , ngopohia u moo̒linggolabu li Nabi Yunu .
40012040	Tei Yunu lotibiluloa̒ dulahio totolu wau huilio totolu todelomo ombongo tola leidaa̒ . Odito olo Walao̒ Manusia mamo tibiluloa̒ huilio totolu wau dulahio totolu todelomo ombongo huta .
40012041	To Dulahu Kiama , tuango lipu lo Niniwe mamobongu mai pee̒-pee̒enta wolo tau-tauwalo tojamani botie wau mamopo tuludu olimongolio . Sababu tau-tauwalo Niniwe boito malo lilihu lonto dusa limongolio , tou̒ tei Yunu lohutuba to limongolio . Bo teea botia woluo talebe udaa̒ mao̒ wolei Yunu !
40012042	To Dulahu Kiama , ti olongia taabua monto lipu lo Hulialio mamobongu mai pee̒-pee̒enta wolo tau-tauwalo tojamani botie wau mamopo tuludu olimongolio . Sababu u modungoheo̒ pongaajali lei Salomo tamolinepo , ti olongia taabua boito malo huwato ode u molaminga daa̒ lonto huudu dunia . Bo teea botia woluo talebe udaa̒ mao̒ wolei Salomo ! "
40012043	" Wonu bolo rohu u moleeto mololaa mao̒ tahingota-ngotaawa , rohu boito momalita tataa-mbatiyalo u mohengu mololohe tambati pohuhelialio , bo diila odunggaalio .
40012044	Masababu uito tio moloi̒ya , ' Wau̒ mamuli mohualinga mola ode bele u matilolaau̒ mai . ' Tou̒ tio leidungga mola odito , bele boito madidu otua , belesi wau aa̒atulu .
40012045	Lapatao̒ tio lonao̒ wau malodelo pitu rohu wewo ulebe moleetao̒ wolio . Lapatao̒ timongolio tilumuwoto ode delomo tau boito , tulusi lotibiluloa̒ teto . Wau pulitio mao̒ owowoluwoa lotau boito lowali lebe loleetao̒ wolo u bohulio mai . Ui-uitolo olo u mamotoduo mai totau-tauwalo hileeta tojamani botie . "
40012046	Tou̒ ti Isa donggo hemo bisala wolo taa dadaata boito , malonao̒ mai tiilo wau mongo wuta-Tio . Timongolio tilimihulao̒ to bulemengio sambela hipo tolopania alihu moo̒bisala wo-Lio .
40012047	Ngotaalio lotaa dadaata boito malo loi̒ya mao̒ odeli Isa . " Paaa̒ , tiilo wau mongo wutati Paaa̒ woluo to bulemengio . Timongolio ohilaa mobisala woli Paaa̒ . "
40012048	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Tatoonu tiilaU̒ ? Tatoonu mongo wutatu-U̒ ? "
40012049	Lapatao̒ Tio malolunu to tahidudua̒ o-Lio wau lotahuda mao̒ , " Tabotieelo tiila-U̒ wau mongo wutatu-U̒ .
40012050	Taa moponao̒ kahandaki li Paapa-U̒ tosologa , tio-tiolo wutatu-U̒ talolai̒ , wau wutatu-U̒ taabua , wau tiila-U̒ . "
40013001	To dulahulo boito ti Isa lololaa mao̒ bele boito tulusi lonao̒ mota ode biihu lobulalo wau lotihuloa̒a mota teto .
40013002	Ngohuntua daa̒ tau lotia̒mbu topalito li Isa , sababu uito Tio mota lotihuloa̒a tobulotu , hiambola taa dadaata boito hitihula topentadu .
40013003	Lapatao̒ ti Isa helo ngaajali mao̒ dadaata sua̒li to limongolio wolo lomake pohumaya . " Tamoo-mengia ngota lonao̒ mota lomua̒yade bili , " odi-odieelo mola ti Isa lolumulao̒ wungguli-Lio .
40013004	" Tou̒ donggo hemo mua̒yade , woluo bili u lobiihuto todalalo . Tulusi bulungi tilumombotai wau bili boito piloo̒ pulitio .
40013005	Woluo olo u lobiihuto totambati u hibotu-botua , u hutalio ngoi̒di . Bili boito lato lobutu mola sababu bo ngoi̒di hutalio .
40013006	Bo tou̒ mato lodulahu malo panggatai tutuu-mbui̒yo boito lato lololante , lapatao̒ lohengu wau yilate sababu waa̒atio diila tilumolodupo lodelomo .
40013007	Woluo olo bili u lobiihuto todelomo diu̒to oduhi . Diu̒to oduhi boito lobutu mola wau lohupetaa tutuu-mbui̒yo tunggula yilate .
40013008	Bo woluo olo bili lobiihuto tohuta u molomiodu , tulusi lomungo ; woluo u ngohetuto , woluo u wolomo pulu wau woluo olo u tolopulu piu̒wa . "
40013009	Lapatao̒ lohungguli mao̒ lo pohumaya boito ti Isa malo tahuda , " Wonu obulonga , podungohu ! "
40013010	Lapatao̒ tahidudua̒ li Isa lonao̒ mai wau lohintu o-Lio , " Yilongola ti Paaa̒ momake pohumaya wonu mobisala wolo taa dadaata boito ? "
40013011	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Sababu timongoli mailohia ponu u motota mao̒ hitua-tuawua u sangaja tiluuo̒ alihu diila otaawa pasali lou̒ woloolo mola Allahu Taa̒ala momalenta , hiambola timongolio diila .
40013012	Sababu taa u mailoluo , mawohiyalo poli , lebe dadaata mao̒ , wau tio mao̒lebealio . Bo taa diila owolo-wolo , yi ngoi̒di uwoluo to olio , tumbao̒ mahamaalo .
40013013	Uitolo sababuulio Wau̒ momake pohumaya wonu mobisala wolo taa dadaata , sababu timongolio momilohu , bo debo odelo taa udiila moo̒onto ; timongolio modungohu bo debo odelo taa udiila moo̒dungohu wau diila mongalati .
40013014	Woleeto lowalilo mola u nilubuwati mai li Nabi Yesaya , ' Allahu Taa̒ala lotahuda : Timongolio mamo dungohe tulusi bo diila mongalati ; timongolio mamo poo̒tuoto tulusi bo diila otaawa limongolio wolo u yilowali .
40013015	Sababu pikiilangi lotau-tauwalo botie malowali lopuntuhu , bulonga limongolio malowali bungolo wau mato limongolio maloheu̒to . Utie motoduo mai alihu mato limongolio diila mao̒ moo̒onto , bulonga limongolio diila mao̒ modungohe , pikiilangi limongolio diila mao̒ mongalati wau diila mao̒ mohualingai ode ola-U̒ , lapatao̒ Wau̒ mopoo̒luli mao̒ olimongolio . ' "
40013016	" Bo donggo boli untungilio timongoli , " tahuda mao̒ li Isa ode tahidudua̒ o-Lio , " Sababu timongoli otutu moo̒onto wau modungohu .
40013017	Poo̒toloma mao̒ , dadaata nabi wau taa u modungohe to Allahu Taa̒ala ohilaa momilohe u ilontonga limongoli masaatia botie , bo diila oontongalio . Timongolio ohilaa modungohe wolo u ilodungohe limongoli masaatia botie , bo timongolio diila moo̒ dungoheo̒ . "
40013018	" Dungohi mao̒ wolo boliilo pohumaya pasali lo tamoo-mua̒yadea boito .
40013019	Bili u lobiihuto todalalo debo odelo tau-tauwalo tahipo dungohe habari pasali woloolo mola Allahu Taa̒ala momalenta , bo diila mongalati . Ibilisi boito lonao̒ mai wau lolambata wolo umaa pilomua̒yadu todelomo hilaa limongolio .
40013020	Bili u lobiihuto totambati u hibotu-botua , debo odelo tau-tauwalo tahi podungohe habari boito wau hua̒a lololimo wolo hilaa sanangi .
40013021	Bo habari boito diila longuwaa̒to todelomo hilaa limongolio . Odito timongolio ilodungga lou̒ suusa meaanto ilalinayalio sababu habari boito , yi timongolio hua̒a lomaahe iimanilio .
40013022	Bili u lobiihuto tohuungo diu̒to oduhi debo odelo tau-tauwalao tahipo dungohe habari boito , bo lolawalo pasali lo tutumuli mongolio sababu ohilaa tumumulo dadaata ngoa̒amilalo . Sababu uito habari lonto Allahu Taa̒ala leihupeto todelomo hilaa limongolio tilinggula diila lomungo .
40013023	Wau bili u lobiihuto tohuta molomiodu debo odelo tau-tauwalo tahipo dungohe habari boito wau longalati daa̒ . Timongolio lomungo ngohuntua , woluo uwolomo pulu , wau woluo olo utolo pulu piu̒wa tilapulio . "
40013024	Ti Isa luli lohungguli mao̒ pohumaya tuwau totaa dadaata , tahuda-Lio , " Wonu bolo Allahu Taa̒ala momalenta owowoluwoalio debo odelo pohumaya botie : Ngotaalio lo tamoo-mengia lomua̒yade bili mopiohu to halabolulio .
40013025	Tou̒ huilio tuwau , tou̒ ngoa̒amila tau donggo hituluhe , musu lo tamoo-mengia boito lonao̒ mai lomua̒yadeo̒ bili lopadengo tohiyango pale boito , lapatao̒ tio malonao̒ .
40013026	Tou̒ pipii-lomulowalo boito lobutu mola wau duduualio lotumbingai , mao̒ontonga olo padengo boito .
40013027	Lapatao̒ tau-tauwalo tahe wuupa lo tamoo-mengia boito lonao̒ mai ode tamoo-mengia boito wau loloi̒ya mao̒ , ' Tuani , diila mati Tuani talo pomulo mao̒ bili u mopiohe to halabolu li Tuani ? Woloolo mola waliilio tunggula mapilo tumula lo papaa-dengowalo mola teto ? '
40013028	Tamoo-mengia boito lolametao̒ , ' Uito huhutu lomusu . ' Lapatao̒ tau-tauwalo tahe wuupa lo tamoo-mengia boito luli lohintu mao̒ , ' Mohuto ti Tuani mola bunggato lamiaatia papaa-dengowalo boito ? '
40013029	' Diila , ' tametio mao̒ , ' sababu wonu papaa-dengowalo boito bunggatolo , pale boito olo mao̒bunggata .
40013030	Huliaalo mao̒ papaa-dengowalo boito tumumulo pee̒-pee̒enta tunggula meidungga pongotolalo . De mapoleleu̒ mao̒ ode tau-tauwalo tamongotolo ; Yimoa̒po papaa-dengio boito , tihuta mao̒ , tulusi pobuwolo . Lapatao̒ yimoa̒alo palelio , tulusi tahua mao̒ todelomo yibungo . ' "
40013031	Ti Isa luli lohungguli mao̒ pohumaya tuwau totaa dadaata , tahuda-Lio , " Wonu bolo Allahu Taa̒ala momalenta owowoluwoalio debo odelo pohumaya botie : Sawi ngobotu hilama lo tahingota-ngotaawa , tulusi pilomulolio to halabolulio .
40013032	Bili losawi yito bili upulito kikiio̒ . Bo wonu malobutu mai , bili boito mowali upulito udaa̒ tohiyango lo pipii-lomuwaalo . Bili boito mowali bungo lo ayu , tilinggula bubuu-lungiyalo matumombotai motibeelea to tataa-ngolio . "
40013033	Woluo pohumaya tuwau uwewo yilungguli mao̒ li Isa totaa dadaata . " Wonu bolo Allahu Taa̒ala momalenta owowoluwoalio debo odelo ragi u hilama lotaabua ngota , tulusi ilulaulio wolo labu lotiligu wopato pulu loliiteli tunggula lolesi ngoa̒amilalo ! "
40013034	Ngoa̒amilalo hepilo ngaajali mao̒ li Isa ode taa dadaata wolo lomake pohumaya .
40013035	Lou̒ odito lotoduwolo mola uiloi̒ya lonabi , " Wau̒ momake pohumaya wonu mobisala woli mongolio ; Wau̒ mamopo habari susuu-aliyaalo u tuutuo̒ tumulalo mai dunia botie lowali ! "
40013036	Lapatao̒ uito ti Isa lololaa mao̒ taa dadaata boito , tulusi tilumuwoto ode bele . Tahidudua̒ o-Lio malonao̒ mai wau loloi̒ya , " Nte tombanga mai li Paaa̒ to olamiaatia boli lo pohumaya pasali lo papaa-dengowalo tohiyango pale boito . "
40013037	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Taa u momua̒yade bili umopiohe boito yito Walao̒ Manusia .
40013038	Halabolu boito yito dunia botie . Bili u mopiohu boito yito tau-tauwalo tamalowali umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala . Papaa-dengowalo boito yito tau-tauwalo tahelo tiwambao̒ to Ibilisi .
40013039	Musu talomulo papaa dengowalo boito yito Ibilisi . Sembo lo pongotolo yito Dulahu Kiama , wau tau-tauwalo tahi pongotola boito yito mamaa-lai̒katiyalo .
40013040	Debo odelo papaa-dengowalo yimoo̒lo wau tumbilalo todelomo tulu , de mao̒dito olo to Dulahu Kiama .
40013041	Walao̒ Manusia mamopoa̒hu mai mamaa-lai̒kati-Lio mongambu mao̒ monto wolota umati-Lio ngoa̒amila tamoo̒ sababu tau mohutu dusa , wau ngoa̒amila taa wewolio tahelohutu u moleeto .
40013042	Timongolio ngoa̒amila mapo mahulo-Lio ode delomo tihengo tulu uyinta-yintalabu ; mota teto timongolio mahumoyongo wau modutolo .
40013043	Wau tahi pohutua kahandaki lo Allahu Taa̒ala mamotinelo debo odelo mato lodulahu todelomo Dunia Bohu lo Allahu Taa̒ala , ti Paapa limongolio . Oditolio wonu obulonga , podungohu ! "
40013044	" Wonu bolo Allahu Taa̒ala momalenta , owowoluwoalio debo odelo pohumaya botie ; woluo halata u tuutuo̒ todelomo huta tulusi lotapulio lo tahingota-ngotaawa , wau luli pilopo tahulio mao̒ todelomo huta . Lapatao̒ kalana wengahio , tau boito mota lopotali ngoa̒amila milikiilio , tulusi luli lohualingai wau lotali huta boito . "
40013045	" Wonu bolo Allahu Taa̒ala momalenta , owowoluwoalio debo odelo pohumaya botie : Daahangi ngota hemo lolohe mumuu-tialaalo u ohalaga .
40013046	Tou̒ tio loo̒dungga mutiala ngobotu upolu-polutuo̒ gaagalio , tio hua̒a lonao̒ wau mota lopotali ngoa̒amilalo milikiilio , tulusi lotali mutiala u ngobutu boito . "
40013047	" Wonu bolo Allahu Taa̒ala momalenta , owowoluwoalio pilohumaya wolo pajala upilo loladu tobulalo , lapatao̒ loo̒tapu mai tola u hidala-dalaala .
40013048	Tou̒ pajala boito malopolu , pajala boito bilintaa̒i ode tudulio lo tahi pohalawa . Lapatao̒ timongolio malo tihuloa̒a wau lopowiwi mao̒ totoo-lawaalo boito : U mopiohe tilahu limongolio to bolinggo wau udiila mopiohe pilomahuli mongolio .
40013049	Odito olo sua̒liilio to Dulahu Kiama , mamaa-lai̒katiyalo mamonao̒ mai mopowiwi mao̒ tau-tauwalo tahileeta , monto tau-tauwalo tahi pohutua kahandaki lo Allahu Taa̒ala .
40013050	Lapatao̒ tau-tauwalo tahileeta boito mapo mahulolo ode delomo tihengo otulu . Mota teteetolo timongolio mahumoyongo wau modutolo . "
40013051	" Wolo timongoli mongalati lou̒ ngoa̒amilalo boito ? " tahuda mao̒ li Isa . " Mongalati Paaa̒ ! " uali mongolio .
40013052	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Uitolo sababuulio timii̒du guru lo agama tamalowali pongawaa̒ umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala , deu̒ito-yito debo odelo ngotaalio lituani lobele talo polualo monto tambati lo halataalio babaa-langiyalo bohu wau deedelo . "
40013053	Lapatao̒ ti isa yilapato lohungguli mao̒ popoo-humaayalo boito , Tio lololaa mao̒ tambati boito ,
40013054	tulusi luli lohualinga mola ode kambungu pilohuluta loduhu-Lio , mola teto Tio lonao̒ helo ngaajali tobele potabiaalo , wau tahelo dungohe o-Lio teto , hilinggolabe daa̒ . Timongolio hipoloi̒yawa , " Lonto utoonu tau botie loo̒toduo mai hikimati debo odelo uito ? Wau lonto utoonu Tio loo̒tapu kawasa u mohutu moo̒linggolabe ?
40013055	Diila maa Tio botie walao̒ pani lo ayu ? Diila mati Maria boito tiilo-Lio ; wau mongo wuta-Tio yito tei Yakobus , tei Yusu , tei Simon , walei Yudas ?
40013056	Wau diila mamongo wuta-Tio tahi biluloa̒wa tewe olo ? Lonto utoonu lotapu-Lio mai ngoa̒amilalo boito ? "
40013057	Yi timongolio diila lololimo li Isa . Lapatao̒ ti Isa malo tahuda olimongolio , " Nabi ngota hulumatiolio boli tou̒toonu , ngopohia to kambungu pilohuluta loduhulio wau tobelelio lohihilao . "
40013058	Masababu uito ti Isa diila helohutu dadaata u moo̒linggolabe mota teto sababu timongolio diila palacaya .
40014001	Tou̒ boito tei Herodes , tao̒kawasa tolipu lo Galilea , loo̒dungohe pasali li Isa .
40014002	Tei Herodes malo loi̒ya ode tahidihima pantungo lipulio , " Tantu utieelo tei Yahya Tamopolihua tamaa luli tilumumulai ! Uito sababuulio Tio okawasa helohutu u moo̒linggolabe . "
40014003	Sababu tou̒ dipo-dipolulio mai uito tei Herodes malei̒ wau̒pa olei Yahya wau lomungu olio wau lopotuwoto ode delomo tutupa . Tei Herodes lohutu mao̒ odito kalana sua̒li li Herodias , dile lowutatio lohihilao , deu̒ito-yito tei Pilipus .
40014004	Sababu pee̒enta tei Yahya loloi̒ya odie odelei Herodes , " Diila mowali yio̒ monika woli Herodias ! "
40014005	Otutuulio mao̒ tei Herodes ohilaa momate olei yahya mate-mateelo mao̒ , bo tio moohe totaa dadaata , sababu hea̒nggapuo limongolio tei Yahya boito nabi .
40014006	Tou̒ tei Herodes lopolame dulahe ilowaliilio mai , walao̒ taabua li Herodiasi longelungo totalu lotaa hetilo duwolio . Elungio boito loo̒sanangi daa̒ hilaa lei Herodes ,
40014007	tilinggula tei Herodes lodanti mao̒ olio wolo tadia deu̒ penu boli wolo u pohileelio , mawohilio olio .
40014008	Sababu pilopopatu mao̒ liilolio , tadulahu boito malo bisala , " Pohile lowatia lunggongee Yahya Tamopolihua to saaa̒tilo botia tanitani mai tobaki ! "
40014009	Loo̒dungohe hihiile boito , tei Herodes masiluukali daa̒ . Bo sababu tio malo tadia totalu lotaa hetilo duwolio , yi tio malo malentao̒ lei̒ poo̒polu mao̒ hihiile lo tadulahu boito .
40014010	Tio lopoa̒hu tau ode tutupa mota lolimadei lunggongee Yahya .
40014011	Lapatao̒ lunggongee Yahya boito dilelolio mai tobaki wau yilohilio mao̒ ode tadulahu boito . Tulusi tadulahu boito poli lodelo ode liilolio .
40014012	Lapatao̒ uito tahidudua̒ olei Yahya lonao̒ mai lohama milate lei Yahya wau yilobungio . Tulusi timongolio malonao̒ lopoo̒taa ulotoduo boito toli Isa .
