42012020	Bo Allahu Taa̒ala lotahuda mai olio , ' Wuu tamohulodu ! Tohuilo botie yio̒ maamate , lapatao̒ tatoonu tamaa moo̒tapu ngoa̒amila okokaya u mailimou̒mu ode batangamu boito ? '
42012021	Odieelo mola waliilio lou̒ timii̒du tahemo tolopani mowali kaya ode batangalio lohihilao , bo diila motolopani mowali kaya tomato lo Allahu Taa̒ala . "
42012022	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ to tahidudua̒ o-Lio , " Uito sababuulio Wau̒ motahuda mai , ' Diila mao̒ polawalo tomimbihu tutumulumu , wolo umaa polameli mongoli , meaalo wolo umaa pomake limongoli . '
42012023	Tutumulo botie lebe mao̒ lou̒ aalo , wau batanga lebe mao̒ wolo pakeyangi .
42012024	Poo̒tuota mao̒ bubuu-lungiyalo paao̒ ! Timongolio diila helo pomulo , diila helolipu , diila olo ohudungu meaalo oyibungo . Bo Allahu Taa̒ala helolaala olimongolio ! Timongoli lebe ohalaga daa̒ wolo bubuu-lungiyalo boito !
42012025	Tatoonu towolota limongoli wolo ololawalio mowali mopohayao̒ tutumulio eleponu bo ngoi̒di ?
42012026	Wonu sua̒li debo odelo kikii̒o leeto olo , madiila mowali pohutuo limongoli , yilongola molawalo u wewolio ?
42012027	Poo̒tuota mao̒ woloolo mola bubuu-ngawaalo patihu boito mobutu ; bubuu-ngawaalo boito diila hipo kalajawa , diila olo hipo hewola ; Bo Olongia Salomo tao̒dito kayalio olo diila helomake boo̒ u odito piohio odelo bubuu-ngawaalo boito !
42012028	Huo̒yoto tohuta datahu wau luasi mobutu dulahe botie wau loombu mola mapobuolio tunggula maahu . Openu boli odito Allahu Taa̒ala helo podadai huo̒yoto boito odito piohio . Tidiyolo mao̒ timongoli ! Bo timongoli diila boti palacaya !
42012029	Oditolio , diila mao̒ polawalo wau polingu tomimbihu wolo umaa polamelo wau yilumolo .
42012030	Susuu-aliyaalo debo odelo uito heilapita lotaa diila motota lo Allahu Taa̒ala . Lebe-lebe pomao̒ otaawa lo Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli deu̒ timongoli palalu ngoa̒amilalo boito .
42012031	Bo timongoli musi motolopani alihu Allahu Taa̒ala momalenta to tutumulumu , yi uwewolio boito mawohi lo Allahu Taa̒ala olo olemu .
42012032	" Timongoli u bo ngoi̒di jumulaalio , diila mao̒ oohe ! Sababu Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli sanangi mongohi mai olimongoli balakati monto Pomalentaa-Lio .
42012033	Potaliyalo milikimu wau wohia mota doilio ode taa mosikini . Pohutua mao̒ ode batangamu lohihilao dompeti udiila mowali moodulo , deu̒ito-yito halata u tilahu tosologa . Halata boito diila mowali mooli sababu tamootao̒wa diila mowali mohama wau wale olo diila mowali mopolusa mao̒ .
42012034	Sababu tou̒toonu halatamu teto olo hilaamu ! "
42012035	Poo̒daha-dahaalo mao̒ motaalua lotimii̒du sua̒li . Timongoli musi laito dapadapato mohiboo̒ wau tohemu debo lei̒lei̒ito ,
42012036	tutuuwauwa odelo tahi pomayawa tadonggo dapadapato hemohima oli tuanilio mohualingai monto potihunggu lonika . Wonu tituani boito mohualingai wau mongokoa̒ huhebu , timongolio mahua̒a momuo̒ huhebu .
42012037	Donggo boli pae̒daalio tahi pomayawa u odungga donggo hemohima towakutu tituanilio meidungga mai . Pomalacayalo : tituani boito mamoti dapato wau mopoa̒hu mao̒ tahi pomayalio boito motihuloa̒a , tulusi tio mohinta olimongolio .
42012038	Donggo boli pae̒daalio tahi pomayawa boito wonu tituani limongolio moo̒dungga olimongolio donggo hiwimawa , eleponu tio meidungga to tomutaa̒ lou̒ hui meaalo lebe moboyu mai woleeto !
42012039	Eelai mao̒ utie ! Wonu otaawa lotaa ohuu̒wo lobele jamu ngoolo tamootao̒wa monao̒ mai , tio mamo poo̒daha alihu tamootao̒wa diila tumuwoto ode delomo belelio .
42012040	Sababu uito timongoli olo musi motidapato sababu Walao̒ Manusia mamei dungga mai tosaaa̒ti udiila helantobu limongoli . "
42012041	" Eeya , wolo pongaajali boito pilomatuju lo Eeya ode mongowatotia meaalo totaa ngoa̒amilalo ? " yilintu mao̒ lei Petrus .
42012042	Eeya lolametao̒ , " Tatoonu tamoomayawa u tatapu wau molotolo hilao wau molinepo tilinggula piluduo̒ lituanilio mowali tau̒wa lo tahi pomayawa wewolio alihu tio mopotamela olimongolio to wakutuulio ?
42012043	Donggo boli sanangilio tamoomayawa boito wonu tituanilio mohualingai wau moo̒dungga olio donggo hemoponao̒ tuugasilio !
42012044	Pomalacayalo : Tituani boito mamo pomalacaya mao̒ ngoa̒amila halataalio to tamoomayawa boito .
42012045	Bo wonu tamoomayawa boito moloi̒ya todelomo hilaalio , ' Tuani donggo mohiheo watia mohualingai , ' tulusi tio momate ngoa̒amila tamomayawa wau molamelo mongilu tunggula huwoa̒alo ,
42012046	yi tituanilio mamo hualingai todulahu wau jamu udiila ota-otaawa mao̒ . Wau tamoomayawa boito mapateelio mongo-mongongotolo mao̒ lituanilio wau pohutuolio ngopaladu wolo tau-tauwalo tadiila modungohe to Allahu Taa̒ala .
42012047	Tamoomayawa tamotota hilaa lituanilio , bo diila motidapato wau diila mohutu u kahandakio lituanilio boito , mabuboa̒lio mongo-mongongotolo mao̒ .
42012048	Bo tamoomayawa tadiila motota u otohilaa lituanilio , lapatao̒ mohutu hitua-tuawua utalatala tilinggula musi buboa̒lo , yi mabuboa̒lo lou̒ moheelo wambao̒ . Sababu taa u mailohia dadaata , monto olio mopohilelio wolo moo̒ohuu̒ u dadaata olo . Wau tamaa pilo-malacaya mao̒ udadaata , monto olio mapohilelio wolo moo̒ohuu̒ u dadaata olo . "
42012049	" Wau̒ dungga-dungga mai mopotoodei u moo̒pobu todunia botie . Donggo boli piohio wonu tululio madilumei̒to !
42012050	Donggo woluo polodutolo polu-polutuo̒ umusi dutola-U̒ . Wau hilaa-U̒ balisa daa̒ tou̒ uito boito diipo motoduo mai .
42012051	Wolo to lantobi mongoli Wau̒ meidungga mai modelo polodame ode dunia ? Diila , diila polodame bo wambao̒ pololawani .
42012052	Tumula mao̒ botia ungaalaa̒ tilitangoa lou̒ limolota tinggai motehengia , toulota moluwali taduulota meaalo taduulota moluwali tatoulota .
42012053	Tiyamo mamoluwali walai̒o talolai̒ wau walai̒o talolai̒ mamoluwali oliyamolio . Tiilo moluwali walai̒o bua wau walai̒o bua mamoluwali oliilolio . Tiilo moluhengo mamoluwali moluhengio bua wau moluhengo bua mamoluwali tiilo moluhengio . "
42012054	Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ olo totaa dadaata , " Wonu timongoli moo̒onto heengo mobotulo ode ambahu otolopa , timongoli hua̒a moloi̒ya , ' Madidiyalo . ' Wau otu-otutuulo mao̒ dilidia mai .
42012055	Wonu timongoli moo̒laasa dupoto meidungga mai monto hulialio , timongoli mamoloi̒ya , ' Mamopatu mai ' Wau otu-otutuulo mao̒ mopatu .
42012056	Timongoli taa u motohilaa diila otu-otutuulo mao̒ ! Timongoli mowali motakusili lou̒ momilohe owowoluwoa lohulungo wau dunia . Yilongola tutuuotaalo jamani botie diila mowali takusilio limongoli ? "
42012057	" Yilongola timongoli diila molantu lohihilao wolo ubanali ?
42012058	Wonu woluo tau mopodulohu olimongoli ode bubutoo̒ , tolopania mao̒ tio̒otutua u mopoo̒ lapato palakala boito wolio tou̒ timongoli donggo tohuungo dalalo . Wonu diila , de tio tamodedea̒ olimongoli ode talu lobutoo̒ wau butoo̒ boito mamohudu olimongoli ode Pulisi , wau Pulisi mamopo tuwoto olimongoli ode delomo tutupa . Pomalacayalo !
42012059	Timongoli diila talumualai monto tutupa boito tou̒ diipo moo̒bayali dintamu ngoa̒amila . "
42013001	Towakutu boito tau lohungguli mao̒ li Isa tomimbihu dengolo lota taulo Galilea tapilate lei Pilaatu , tou̒ timongolio donggo hemo podewo bake ode Allahu Taa̒ala .
42013002	Lomaahamu silita boito , ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Sababu tau-tauwalo Galilea boito pilatelio yila-yilateelo mao̒ debo odelo uito , wolo helantobu limongoli uito bukutiilio timongolio lebe odusa wolo ngoa̒amila taulo Galilea uwewolio ?
42013003	Sama-samaata diila ! Bo eelai mola : wonu timongoli diila molilihu monto duduu-sawaalo limongoli , timongoli ngoa̒amila debo mate olo , debo odelo timongolio .
42013004	Woloolo mola olo wolo mopulaa walulota tailate to Siloam , tou̒ monala boito lolemba olimongolio ? Wolo uito tolantobi mongoli mopobayahei olimongolio lebe odusa wolo tau-tauwalo wewo tabilu-biluloa̒ to Yerusalemu ?
42013005	Sama-samaata diila ! Pee̒entapo potahuda-U̒ mai ; Wonu timongoli diila molilihu monto duduu-sawaalo limongoli , timongoli ngoa̒amila maamate olo debo odelo timongolio . "
42013006	Lapatao̒ uito ti Isa malo hungguli olo pohumaya botie , " Woluo tahingota-ngotawa obungo lo ayu ara to ilengi lo anggurulio . Todulahu tuwau lonao̒ tio mota lopeehu hungo lo ara boito , bo diila loo̒tapu openu bo ngobotu .
42013007	Oditolio , tio loloi̒ya mao̒ to tamoo-kalajawa ilengilio , ' Bilohi , matolo taunu watia hemonao̒ mai mopeehu hungo lo ara u tobungo lo ara botie , bo diila hemoo̒tapu openu bo ngobotu . Luwodelo bungo lo ayu boito ! Tio bo hemo poo̒pulito sati lou̒ aalo monto huta ! '
42013008	Bo tamoomengia boito lolametao̒ , ' Huliaalo mao̒ tio tumutumulo tou̒ ngotaunu pomola , Tuani . Watia mamomati huta topalitio wau dutuwalo puupuki .
42013009	Tanu tio de momungo mai totaunu talutalu botie . Bo wonu diila , mowalilio ti Tuani mei̒ luwodeo̒ ' . "
42013010	Tou̒ dulahu Saabati tuwau , ti Isa longaajali tobele ngowale potabiaalo .
42013011	Mota teeto woluo taabua ngota tamaa mopulaa walu lotaunu mongongoto , sababu woluo rohu u moleeto todelomo batangalio . Taabua boito bunggu wau sama-samaata diila mowali timihulo motulidu .
42013012	Tou̒ ti Isa loo̒onto olio , maa ilibode li Isa tio , " Ibu , ti Ibu molopato monto ngongoti Ibu ! "
42013013	Lapatao̒ ti Isa loleaapu mao̒ yimbupulu lotaabua boito , wau to saaa̒tilo boito tio matilimihulo lotulidu tulusi lomuji Allahu Taa̒ala .
42013014	Tau̒wa lobele potabiaala boito moloingo , deu̒ ti Isa lopoo̒luli tau todulahu Saabati , sababu uito tio loloi̒ya mao̒ totau-tauwalo , " Woluo wolonggui mola u mokalaja ; pona̒olo mai to duduu-laheyaalo boito mei̒ poo̒luli , diila mao̒ todulahu Saabati ! "
42013015	Eeya lolametao̒ , " Munapiki timongoli botie ! Todulahu Saabati ngoa̒amila tau momuli sapi meaalo kolodailio monto lantunga wau deloolio ode bulemengio mota pelumolio .
42013016	Naa , teea botia woluo taabua ngota wali mai lei Abraham , umaa mopulaa walu lotaunu hiheolio ilotihuta lo Ibilisi . Wolo tio diila mowali huliyalo to tihutalio todulahu Sabati ? "
42013017	Totameti Isa boito maloo̒hutu mumuu-suwaalo li Isa loolito daa̒ ; bo ngoa̒amila tau-tauwalo wewolio sanangi loo̒onto tilolahepaalo moo̒linggolabe u pilohutu li Isa .
42013018	Ti Isa lohintu mao̒ , " Wonu bolo Allahu Taa̒ala momalenta , tingga woloolo mola owowoluwoalio ? Mahinta woloolo mola mowali pobandingiyo-U̒ mao̒ ?
42013019	Owowoluwoalio debo odelo pohumaya botie . Bili losawi ngobotu hilama lo tahingota-ngotawa tulusi pilomulolio to ilengilio . Bili losawi boito malobutu mai tulusi lowali ayu ngobungo , wau bubuu-lungiyalo mai lohutu beelealio to tataa-ngowaalo ayu boito . "
42013020	Pee̒entapo ti Isa lohintu mao̒ , " Wonu Allahu Taa̒ala momalenta , mahinta woloolo mola mowali pobandingiyo-U̒ owowoluwoalio ?
42013021	Owowoluwoalio yito debo odelo ragi u hilama lotaabua ngota wau ilulau wolo wopato pulo loliiteli labu , tunggula lolesi ngoa̒amilalo . "
42013022	Todelomo nonao̒ ode Yerusalemu , ti Isa lolibaya to kokoo-tawaalo wau kakaa-mbunguwalo sambela helo ngaajali .
42013023	Lapatao̒ woluo talohintu o-Lio , " Paaa̒ , wolo bo ngoi̒di wambao̒ taa umapo aahuwolo ? "
42013024	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Potolopanilo u tumuwoto moli huhebu umeepito . Sababu , eelai ! Dadaata tahemo tolopani tumuwoto bo diila mowali .
42013025	Towakutu taa ohuu̒wo lobele mobongu wau moheu̒ta huhebulio , timongoli hitihula to bulemengio wau hemo ngoko-ngokoo̒ sambela hemoloi̒ya , ' Tuani , huo̒walo mai huhebu olamiaatia ! ' Tituani boito mamo lametai , ' Diila otaawa lowatia timongoli lonto utoonu ! '
42013026	Timongoli mamolameta , ' Amiaatia malo lamelo wau longilu woli Tuani , wau ti Tuani malo ngaajali olo to dadaa-lalaalo lokota lamiaatia ! '
42013027	Boti Tuani boito mamoloi̒ya poli , ' Diila otaawa lowatia timongoli lonto utoonu . Pohinggi mao̒ monteea , timongoli tahipo hutua u moleeto ! '
42013028	Tou̒ timongoli moo̒onto olei Abraham , Isihaka wolei Yako wau ngoa̒amila nabi hiwengahe todelomo Dunia Bohu lo Allahu Taa̒ala , mahumoyongo timongoli wau modutolo sababu timongoli lohihilao polahilio ode bulemengio !
42013029	Tau-tauwala mamonao̒ mai monto tiimulu wau otolopa , monto tilayo wau hulialio , wau mamo tiwengahe todelomo Dunia Bohu lo Allahu Taa̒ala .
42013030	Tutuulio tutu , woluo tapulitio mamowali tabohulio , wau woluo tabohulio mamowali tapulitio . "
42013031	Towakutu boitolo , woluo dengolo lota taulo Parisi lonao̒ mai odeli Isa wau loloi̒ya , " Diila mao̒ potitola tewe ! Nao̒lo ode tambati uwewo , sababu tei Herodes ohilaa momate mateelo mao̒ ole-Mu . "
42013032	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Ponao̒lo poo̒taa mao̒ totaa diila ohunalio boito , ' Dulahee botie wau loombu Wau̒ mopolahi rohu u moleeto wau mamo poo̒luli taa mongongoto , bo todulahee otolulio , Wau̒ mamopoo̒ lapato kalajaa-U̒ . '
42013033	Openu odito Wau̒ mamusi mopotolonga mola lo nonao̒-U̒ todulahee botie , loombu wau loombu ngonu , sababu diila mopiohu nabi ngota pateelio mate-mateelo mao̒ to bulemengo Yerusalemu .
42013034	Yerusalemu , Yerusalemu ! Mongo nabi hepilatemu yila-yilateelo mao̒ ! Motii̒du tamailao mai lo Allahu Taa̒ala hepilai̒mu lobotu tunggula yilate ! Mapoo̒ ngoolo Wau̒ ohilaa moloo̒pu tuango lipumu odelo tiilo lomaluo̒ modaha mongo walai̒o towalungo polipi̒o , bo yio̒ diila mohuto !
42013035	Sababu uito Allahu Taa̒ala diilalo wolemu . Ototai mao̒ , tumula mao̒ botia yio̒ diilalo moo̒onto ola-U̒ , tunggula yio̒ moloi̒ya , ' Mabala-balakatilo Tio tadungga-dungga mai to tanggulo Eeya . ' "
42014001	Todulahu Saabati tuwau ti Isa lonao̒ lolamelo tobele ngotaalio lo Parisi tao̒ tanggulo . Teto tau-tauwalo helo poo̒tuoto li Isa lou̒ motombipidu .
42014002	Yi malonao̒ mai odeli Isa ngotaalio tamo ngongoto ombongo momatango u oa̒atio wau uluu̒lio himata-matanga .
42014003	Tulusi ti Isa lohintu mao̒ to guguu-ruwaalo agama wau tau-tauwalo Parisi tawoluo teto , " Moduduo̒ wuu̒du lo agamanto , tingga mowali ito mopoo̒luli taa mongongoto todulahu Saabati meaalo diila ? "
42014004	Guguu-lawaalo agama wau tau-tauwalo Parisi boito bo wambao̒ lotipoo̒yo . Tulusi ti Isa lotiangai tau boito wau lopoo̒luli olio , lapatao̒ lopoa̒hu olio lonao̒ .
42014005	Lapatao̒ uito ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ totau-tauwalo , " Humayaalio ngotaalio limongoli owalao̒ ngota meaalo sapi tuwau ulodehu ode delomo ali todulahu Saabati , wolo diila hua̒a bantangalo ode bulemengio walao̒ meaalo sapi boito tou̒ boitolo ? "
42014006	Diaaluo penu boli ngotaa mao̒ taloo̒ tameto li Isa tomimbihu sua̒li boito .
42014007	Ti Isa loo̒onto mao̒ woluo tahe tiloduo tahi polulaoto tataa-mbatiyalo u mopiohu daa̒ . Sababu uito Tio malongohi pangaajali odie olimongolio ngoa̒amila .
42014008	" Wonu bolo timongoli toduwolio ode potihungu lonika , diila mao̒ potihuloa̒a tokadela uhulu-hulumati . Sababu diila otaawa bolo woluo ngotaalio wewo talebe polohuna daa̒ wolemu matilo duwolio olo ,
42014009	tilinggula taa ohuu̒wo lobele tamaa loloduo olimongoli duulota boito , wolo pakusa monao̒ mai ode olemu wau moloi̒ya , ' Maa̒apu , tambati botie mapilohetu ode tamu boito . ' Yi wolo woolito daa̒ yio̒ bolo pakusa motihuloa̒a totambati to dibalaka daa̒ .
42014010	Sababu uito , wonu timongoli toduwolio , polulaotolo tambati u to dibalaka daa̒ , alihu taa ohuu̒wo lobele mamonao̒ mai ode olemu wau moloi̒ya , ' Tamani , toduwolo motihuloa̒a totambati ulebe mopiohe . ' Lou̒ odito timongoli hilulumatilio totalu lo ngoa̒amila tatiloduo uwewo .
42014011	Sababu timii̒du tamopolaio̒ lobatanga mapo dupapaalio , bo tamoti dupapa lobatanga mapolaio̒lio . "
42014012	Tulusi tahuda mao̒ li Isa totaa ohuu̒wo lobele , " Wonu bolo yio̒ moloduo tau ode potihunggu molamela dulahu meaalo melamelo hui , diila mao̒ poloduo tamani meaalo wutato , meaalo mongo ilaato , meaalo tiheedumu takaya . Sababu de timongolio tamaa moloduo olemu olo , wau lou̒ odito yio̒ mololimo pahala to huhutuumu .
42014013	Oditolio , wonu bolo yio̒ mohutu potihunggu , toduwaalo taa mosikini , taa o aibu , taa didu mowali monao̒ , taapitoo̒ .
42014014	Yio̒ mabalakatia-Lio mai , sababu tau-tauwalo boito diila tamoo̒ baalasi opopiohumu . Opopiohumu mawohia mai pahala lo Allahu Taa̒ala tou̒ tau-tauwalo tamopiohu muli potumulo-Lio mai monto opopate .
42014015	Tou̒ tala ngota talo lamelo pee̒-pee̒enta teto loo̒dungohu tahuda li Isa , tio loloi̒ya , " Pae̒eda daa̒ taa umaa molamelo pee̒-pee̒enta wolo Allahu Taa̒ala wonu Tio meidungga odelo Olongia ! "
42014016	Boti Isa lotahuda mao̒ ode tau boito , " Towakutu tuwau woluo ngotaalio talohutu potihungu uleidaa̒ wau loloduo taa dadaata .
42014017	Tou̒ mawakutuulio u molumulo potihunggu , tau boito lopoa̒hu tamoomayawa olio lonao̒ ode tahe tiloduo wau loloi̒ya , ' Toduwolo monao̒ mai , ngoa̒amilalo mahidapata ! '
42014018	Bo timongolio ngoa̒amila , ngota-ngota mahi pohilea maa̒pu . Tabohulio loloi̒ya mao̒ ode tamoomayawa boito , ' Watia boheli lotali mao̒ huta ngopita wau palalu mota palakisa lowatia . Maa̒puwa mai watia . '
42014019	Tawewo loloi̒ya , ' Watia boheli lotali sapi limo lo panggalo , wau ohilaa yimontalalo sasaa-piyaalo boito . Maa̒puwa mai watia . '
42014020	Tawewo poli loloi̒ya , ' Watia boheli lonika mao̒ , sababu uito watia diila moo̒nao̒ mai . '
42014021	Tamoomayawa boito lohualingo wau lopoo̒taa sua̒li boito odeli tuanilio . Tituani boito maloingo daa̒ wau loloi̒ya mao̒ to tamoomayawa olio . ' Hua̒a ponao̒lo ode dadaa-lalaalo daa̒ wau huhuu-lupilowalo to kota . Tianga mai taa mosikini , taa o aibu , taapitoo̒ wau taa didu mowali monao̒ . '
42014022	Lapatao̒ tamoomayawa boito loloi̒ya mao̒ , ' Tuani , palenta li Tuani mapilo ponao̒ , bo tambati donggo dadaata . '
42014023	Tulusi tituani boito loloi̒ya , ' Ponao̒lo mota ode dadaa-lalaalo daa̒ wau huhuu-lupilowalo to bulemengo kota , wau wuntuli mao̒ tau-tauwalo monao̒ mai , alihu beleu̒ mopolu .
42014024	Poo̒toloma mao̒ ! Diaaluo penu boli ngota monto tahe tiloduo tamaa tiloduo boito mamoo̒laasa ua̒alo potihunggu laatia botie ! ' "
42014025	Dadaata tau loduduo̒ lonao̒ woli Isa . Ti Isa maloili wau lotahuda mao ode limongolio ,
42014026	" Wonu taa monao̒ mai ode ola-U̒ , bo lebe motolia̒ngo oliilolio , oliyamolio , dilelio bua mongo walai̒o , mongo wutatio , tumbao̒ batangalio lohihilao , tio diila mowali muri-U̒ .
42014027	Taa u diila mohuto momota salipulio wau moduduo̒ ola-U̒ , diila mowali muri-U̒ .
42014028	Wonu ngotaalio limongoli motohilaa momongu monala tuwau , tantu tio mamotihuloo̒ molekenipo onggosilio alihu otaawalio wonu doilio moo̒tuheto mopoo̒ lapato monala boito meaalo diila .
42014029	Sababu wonu moi̒laalo mai tio diila mowali mopoo̒ lapato uito , lebe-lebe pomao̒ pandasilio mapilohutu , yi ngoa̒amila tau u moo̒onto kalaja boito mamohanti olio .
42014030	Timongolio mamoloi̒ya , ' Wii , tau botie momongu , bo diila mowali mopoo̒ lapato ! '
42014031	Wonu olongia ngota tao̒pajule mopulolihu lota motohilaa mopaatea wolo olongia wewo tao̒pajule dulo pulolihu lota , tantu olongia boito mamo tihuloo̒ motimbangipo meimulo wolo tio moo̒ tahangi moluwali musulio boito .
42014032	Wonu otaawalio u tio diila molotolo , matantu tou̒ musulio boito donggo molamingo , tio mamolao utolialio motaa mohile modaamea . "
42014033	Pulitio mao̒ ti Isa lotahuda , " Odito olo woli mongoli . Diaaluo penu boli ngotaa mao̒ limongoli mowali muri-U̒ , wonu tio diila mopobake totoonulalo u hitua-tuawua . "
42014034	" Watingo boito mopiohu , bo wonu diilalo olamita tingga mowali muli poo̒ panggelolo ? "
42014035	Diilalo ohunalio , mopio ode halabolu meaalo ode puupuki . Oditolio tapilaalo mao̒ wambao̒ . Wonu obulonga , podungohulo ! "
42015001	Todulahee tuwau , dadaata tahi potagia beya wau tau-tauwalo tahe anggapuolio diila mopiohu lotuango lipu , mai lodungohe li Isa .
42015002	Tau-tauwalo Parisi wau guguu-ruwaalo agama mahibiihe . Timongolio loloi̒ya , " Wii , tau botie lololimo tau-tauwalo tadiila mopiohu wau tumbao̒ lolamela woli mongolio ! "
42015003	Masababu uito ti Isa lohungguli mao̒ ode limongolio pohumaya botie .
42015004	" Humayaalo mao̒ ngotaalio limongoli ohimba ngohetuto lapatao̒ tio iloolia tuwau -- tingga wolo umaa pohutuolio ? Matantu tio mololaa mao̒ himba u tio lopulaa tio boito tohuta luasi u pilobutua lohuo̒yoto , wau mota mololohe u mailooli boito tunggula motapu .
42015005	Wau wonu muli motapulio mai himba boito , tio mameengahe daa̒ tilinggula himba boito mapotaalio to binggungio ,
42015006	tulusi deloolio mohualingo . Lapatao̒ tio motiango mongo tamani wau mongo tiheedio , wau moloi̒ya mao̒ , ' Dulo ito motiwengahu . Himbau̒ uilooli maluli lotapuu̒ mai ! '
42015007	Naa , oditolo olo tosologa woluo wengahe ulebe udaa̒ totaa ngota odusa molilihu , wolo taa tio lopulaa tio lota tamaa lopiohe wau diila palalu molilihu . "
42015008	" Meaalo humayaalo mao̒ taabua ngota odoi mopulo pita doi talaa̒ , tulusi iloolia ngopita -- tingga wolo umaa pohutuolio ? Tio mamo podei̒to tohe wau mongaa̒to belelio wau mololohe penu boli deu̒toonu tunggula motapulio doi boito .
42015009	Tou̒ motapulio mai doi boito , tio motianga mongo tamanilio wau mongo tiheedio , tulusi moloi̒ya mao̒ , ' Wau̒ sanangi daa̒ maluli loo̒dungga doiu̒ uilooli . Dulo ito motiwengahu ! '
42015010	Odito olo malai̒kati lo Allahu Taa̒ala meengahu wonu woluo ngotaalio tamoleeto molilihu monto duduusaalio . Pomalacayalo ! "
42015011	Ti Isa luli lotahuda mao̒ , " Woluo tiyamo ngota owalao̒ mongo lolai̒ duulota .
42015012	Tawali-yali loloi̒ya mao̒ olio , ' Paapa , wohia mai ode laatia masaatia botie tayadu lowatia monto okokayanto . Oditolio tiyamolio malo layadeo̒ okokayalio boito towolota lomongo walai̒o . '
42015013	Ngoolohui mola lapatio mao̒ walai̒o tawali-yali boito malo potali tayadio , tulusi lonao̒ odelipu tuwau u molamingo . Mola teto tio malo poloyali doilio boito lou̒ tumutumulo bo hemo tisa-tisanangi .
42015014	Tou̒ doilio malo pulito ngoa̒amila , lipu boito ilodungga lo polobiti daa̒ , tilinggula tio masilikisa .
42015015	Lapatao̒ tio malonao̒ mota lokalaja to ngotaalio lotuango lipu teto , tamaa lopoa̒hu olio ode halabolulio u lodaha boilio .
42015016	Malo odito polaangio tilinggula tio ohilaa molamela ua̒alo lo bobooiyaalo boito . Eleponu tio malo odito polaangio , diaaluo mao̒ penu boli ngota tamopo tamela olio .
42015017	Pulitio mao̒ tio lotota mai lou̒tau wau loloi̒ya , ' Tau-tauwalo tahipo kalajawa toliyamau̒ o ua̒alo dadaata daa̒ , wau wau̒ tewe ngopee̒ yilate lopolaango !
42015018	Wau̒ mamo monggato wau monao̒ odeliyamau̒ , wau moloi̒ya olio : Paapa watia mai̒lodusa to Allahu Taa̒ala wau toli Paapa .
42015019	Diilalo paatuti watia tanggulalo walai̒ Paapa . Anggapualo mao̒ watia ngotaalio tahemo kalaja toli Paapa . '
42015020	Yi lomonggatolo tio lohualinga odeli paapalio . Donggo molamingo monto bele , tio mai̒loontonga lipaapalio . Lou̒ lodehu daa̒ hilaa lipaapalio tilumetea̒ mota lodunggaya wolio , tulusi longoo̒de wau lodiilo olio .
42015021	' Paapa , ' loi̒ya mao̒ lowalao̒ boito , ' watia mai̒lodusa to Allahu Taa̒ala wau toli Paapa . Diilalo paatuti watia tanggulalo walai̒ Paapa . '
42015022	Boti paapalio malo tiangai tahi pomayalio wau loloi̒ya , ' Aliheo̒ ! Hamaa mai boo̒ u mopiohe daa̒ , wau popakea mao̒ olio . Popohulia mao̒ hua̒limo to tingongoa lo uluu̒lio , wau sapatu to oa̒atio .
42015023	Lapatao̒ uito podedea̒i sapi kikiio̒ u molingohu wau olota mao̒ . Ito mamolamela wau motiwengahu .
42015024	Sababu walau̒uu̒ botie mailate , masaatia luli tilumumulai ; tio mailooli masaatia luli lotapu mai . ' Tulusi timongolio malohutu potihunggu .
42015025	Tou̒ boito , walao̒ tamohuhula donggo to halabolu . Tou̒ tio malo hualingai wau malembidu bele , tio maloo̒ dungohe muusiki wau tahi pongelunga .
42015026	Tio malo tiango tala ngota lo tahi pomayalio , tulusi lohintu mao̒ , ' Wolo u malowali tobele botie ? '
42015027	Tamoomayawa boito lolametao̒ , ' Tawali-yali li Tuani malo hualingai ! Wau tiyamo li Tuani malei̒ olotao̒ sapi u molingohu , sababu maluli lotapulio mai walai̒o todelomo owowoluwoa uloa̒ahu ! '
42015028	Walai̒o tamohuhula boito maloingo daa̒ tilinggula didu lohuto tio tilumuwoto ode delomo bele . Tulusi tipaapalio yilumualai wau lomaluto olio tilumuwoto .
42015029	Bo tio loloi̒ya mao̒ , ' Ilotaa-taunuwalio mola hiheolio watia helo kalaja tio̒otutua toli Paapa . Diipo pee̒enta mao̒ watia helo buutola topalenta li Paapa . Wau wolo u mailohi li Paapa olaatia ? Openu bo batade tuwau diipo pee̒enta mao̒ yilohi mai li Paapa olaatia u mohutu potihunggu wolo mongo sahabati lowatia !
42015030	Walai̒ Paapa boito malo poo̒pulita okokaya li Paapa wolo mongobua suntali , bo odito tio lohualingai , pilongolota li Paapa walao̒ sapi u molingohu olio ! '
42015031	' Walau̒uu̒ , ' tametao̒ li Paapalio , ' yio̒ laito wolau̒ tewe . Ngoa̒amila hakuuu̒ hakuumu olo .
42015032	Bo ito wajibu mohutu potihunggu wau motiwengahu , sababu wutatumu tawali-yali boito mailate , bo botia luli tilumumulai ; tio mailooli , bo botia luli lotapu mai . ' "
42016001	Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ to tahidudua̒ o-Lio , " Woluo taakaya ngota . Tio opogawee ngota tamotota mongulusi doi u hemo ngulusi okokayalio . Taakaya boito lololimo poo̒taa deu̒ pogaweelio boito malo poloyali doilio .
42016002	Oditolio matiliyangio mai pogawee tahe mongulusi doilio boito wau loloi̒ya , ' Wolo utie umai̒lo dungoheu̒ tomimbihu olemu ? Masaatia , podulohe mai olau̒ wolo wimu-wimumuto tomimbihu kalajamu hemo ngulusi okokayau̒ . Yio̒ madiilalo mowali pogawee mongulusi doiu̒ . '
42016003	Yi pogawee boito mahemo mikilangi mola , ' Mawolo u pohutuwou̒ botia ? Tituaniu̒ mamopo huheli olau̒ . Momati wau̒ diila molotolo ; mohile-hile wau̒ moolito .
42016004	Wau̒ o aakali ; wonu wau̒ mailinggilio , wau̒ musi otamani dadaata tamohuto mololimo olau̒ tobele limongolio ! '
42016005	Oditolio pogawee boito malo tiangai timii̒du taa obiloli toli tuanilio . To tabohulio , tio loloi̒ya mao̒ , ' Ngoolo bilolimu toli tuaniu̒ ? '
42016006	Tau boito lolametao̒ , ' Ngohetuto bolinggo yinulo jaitun ? ' Pogawee boito loloi̒ya mao̒ olio , ' Utie tuladu lo bilolimu . Huloo̒olo wau aliheo̒ tuladelo mao̒ : limo lopulu . '
42016007	Lapatao̒ tio loloi̒ya mao̒ totaa oluolio , ' Wau Wutato , ngoolo biloli lowutato ? ' Tau boito lolametao̒ , ' Ngolihu lokado pale . ' Pogawee boito loloi̒ya olio , ' Utie tuladu lobilolimu . Tuladelo mao̒ walu lohetuto . '
42016008	Yi tituani lo pogawee tamotota mengulusi doi tadiila juujulu boito helomuji pogaweelio boito sababu huhutuulio u motota boito , sababu tau-tauwala lodunia botie lebe motota mongaatulu ulusani limongolio wolo tau-tauwala tahitumula todelomo u mobaango . "
42016009	Lapatao̒ ti Isa luli lotahuda , tahuda-Lio mao̒ , " Dungohilo ! Pomakea mao̒ okokaya lodunia botie u moo̒tapu tamani , alihu wonu okokaya lodunia botie madiilalo ohalaga , timongoli matolimoolio totambati biluloa̒ u ohio-hiheolo mao̒ .
42016010	Taa u mowali palacayalo to susuu-aliyaalo ukikiio̒ mowali palacayalo olo to susuu-aliyaalo uleidaa̒ . Bo taadiila mowali palacayalo to susuu-aliyaalo ukikiio̒ , diila mowali olo palacayalo to susuu-aliyaalo uleidaa̒ .
42016011	Oditolio , wonu tomimbihu okokaya lodunia botie timongoli madiilalo mowali palacayalo , tatoonu tamohuto mopo palacaya mao̒ olemu okokaya lo lohani ?
42016012	Wau wonu tomimbihu balangi u mililikiki lotaa wewo , timongoli ilobukuti diila mowali palacayalo , tatoonu tamohuto mongohi olimongoli wolo umowali haku limongoli ?
42016013	Diaaluo mao̒ penu bo ngotaa mowali mokalaja ode tuani duulota ; sababu tio malebe motolia̒ngo tangota wolo tawewo , meaalo tio malebe tatapu wau molotolo hilao toli tuani ngota woli tuani wewo . Odito olo wolimongoli . Timongoli diila mowali mokalaja ode Allahu Taa̒ala wau ode halata upango olo . "
42016014	Tau-tauwalo Parisi loo̒dungohu ngoa̒amila upilo tahuda li Isa . Tulusi bo hei̒i̒ya limongolio Tio , sababu timongolio motohilaa doi .
42016015	Boti Isa lotahuda mao̒ olimongolio , " Timongolilo taa u totalu lotaa wewo oontonga otutu , bo otaawa lo Allahu Taa̒ala todelomo tuango hilaamu . Sababu wolo u hea̒nggapuo lomanusia lailaio̒ , oontonga dupadupapa lo Allahu Taa̒ala .
42016016	Butoo̒ uilohi mai lei Musa wau pongaajali lomongo nabi debo pohupohutu demola tomaasa lei Yahya Tamopolihua . Anggadu towakutu boito Habari Mopiohu tomimbihu woloolo mola Allahu Taa̒ala momalenta odelo olongia pilo habarilio mololaalaaita . Wau tau hipo makusawa lobatanga u mowali pongawaa̒ umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala .
42016017	Bo lebe gambangi duo̒lo hulungo wau dunia mooli , wolo hulupu tuwau todelomo Butoo̒ lo Allahu Taa̒ala mowali diila pohupohutu .
42016018	Tatoonu tamotolaki dilelio bua , lapatao̒ monika wolo taabua wewo , tau boito lojina . Wau taa u monika wolo taabua tamaa tilalakilio , tio olo lojina . "
42016019	" Woluo taakaya ngota . Pakeyangilio himahalea , wau tutumulio ngoa̒amilalo dadaata timii̒du dulahu .
42016020	Totalu lohuhebu belelio pilopo huloi̒o ngotaalio tamosikini tanggulio Lajarus . Wawai̒o polupolu lokukudu onana mohutodu .
42016021	Tio ohilaa molamelo mumui̒o lou̒ aalo u loduduulahu lonto meja lotaakaya boito . Apula tumbao̒ malonao̒ mai lodelita kukudio onana mohutodu .
42016022	Taa mosikini boito lapatio mao̒ yilate tulusi dilelo malai̒kati ode tambati hulu-hulumati totili lei Abraham tosologa . Taakaya boito yilate olo wau yilobungio .
42016023	Todunia lotailate tio sikisa daa̒ . Wau tou̒ tio lomilohe lonteeto mola ode yitaato , tio maloo̒onto olei Abraham totambati molamingo wau tei Lajarus totili lei Abraham .
42016024	' Paaa̒ Abraham ! ' wuwaatio̒ lotaakaya boito . ' Tolia̒nga mai watia . Ahuli mai tei Lajarus mopolomo lo uluu̒lio todelomo taluhu tulusi mai mopobata mao̒ dila lowatia . Watia sikisa daa̒ todelomo tulu botie ! '
42016025	Bo tei Abraham lolameto , ' Eelai mao̒ walau̒uu̒ : ngotupa lo tutumulumu yio̒ maloo̒tapu ngoa̒amila u hipiiohe , hiambola tei Lajarus loo̒tapu u hileeleeta . Masaatia tio sanangi teea , wau yio̒ sikisa .
42016026	Uwewolio mao̒ leeto , towolotamu wolami mapilo hutualio liito leidaa̒ tuwau , alihu tamonteea diila mowali odito mola , wau tamola monteeto diila mowali odia mai ! '
42016027	' Wonu odito , Paaa̒ , ' loi̒ya lotaakaya boito , ' watia tio̒otutua mohile ti Paaa̒ molao olei Lajarus ode bele liyamo lowatia .
42016028	Woluo limo lota wutato lowatia mota teto . Ahuli mao̒ tei Lajarus mopoe̒ela olimongolio , alihu timongolio diila bolo modehu ode tambati usikisa botie . '
42016029	Tei Abraham lolameto , ' Timongolio mao̒ kikii-tabiyaalo lei Musa wau kitabi lomongo nabi ! Huliilo mao̒ timongolio moduduo̒ wolo u tulatulade todelomo kikii-tabiyaalo boito ! '
42016030	Bo taakaya boito lolameto , ' Uito diila motuuheta , Paaa̒ Abraham . Bo wonu woluo taamate muli tumumulai wau monao̒ mai ode limongolio , timongolio mamolilihu monto duduu-sawaalo limongolio . '
42016031	Bo tei Abraham loloi̒ya , ' Wonu timongolio diila momandungi palenta lei Musa wau mongo nabi , matantulo mao̒ timongolio diila tapalacaya olo , openu boli woluo taamate tamuli tumumulai . ' "
42017001	Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ to tahidudua̒ o-Lio , " Sua̒li umoo̒ sababu tau mohutu dusa tantulo mao̒ debo woluo . Bo matopotala taa u moo̒sababu mao̒ !
42017002	Lebe mopiohu wonu botu pohilingalo potihutolo to buloo̒lio , tulusi tio pomahulolo ode delomo deheto lou̒ tio mamoo̒ sababu tala ngota lotau-tauwalo tabiasa botie mohutu dusa .
42017003	Sababu uito , poo̒dahailo ! Wonu wutatumu odusa , dinia mao̒ tio . Wonu tio molee̒e , ambungua mao̒ tio .
42017004	Wonu tio odusa to olemu poo̒opitu ngohui wau timii̒du monao̒ mai ode olemu wau moloi̒ya , ' Watia mohile maa̒apu , ' ambungua mao̒ tio . "
42017005	Mongo rasulu malo loi̒ya odeli Isa Eeya , " Yaa Eeya , poo̒lotola mai iimani lomongo watotia . "
42017006	Eeya lolametao̒ , " Wonu timongoli o iimani debo odelo udaa̒ bili losawi , timongoli mowali moloi̒ya ode bungo lo ayu mulubei botie , ' Pobunggatolo yio̒ wau meilodungolo mola todelomo deheto , ' tantulo mao̒ bungo lo ayu botie mamoduduo̒ palentamu . "
42017007	" Humayaalio ngotaalio limongoli owato u hemomadeo̒ to halabolu meaalo hemo himbala himba . Wonu bolo wato boito mohualingai , wolo tio mamoloi̒ya olio , ' Dulo aliheo̒ molamelo ' ?
42017008	Tantulo mao̒ diila ! Bolii̒o mao̒ tio mamoloi̒ya olio , ' Pohetua mao̒ ua̒alou̒ . Pomakeyalo boo̒ ubelesi wau wimai mao̒ wau̒ donggo hemolamelo wau hemongilu ; lapatao̒ uito yio̒ mamowali molamelo . '
42017009	Wato boito diila palalu pujiolo sababu malo dungohe palenta lituanilio , diila odito ?
42017010	Odito olo timongoli . Wonu timongoli malohutu ngoa̒amila upilo malentalio mai olimongoli , loi̒yawa mao̒ , ' Ami bo wato biaasa ; ami bo wambao̒ mohutu uwajibu olami ' . "
42017011	To nonao̒ ode Yerusalemu , ti Isa lolibaya to sipatana madala lo Samaria wau Galilea .
42017012	Tou̒ tilumuwoto to kambungu tuwau , Tio nilao̒ mai lo tamopulu lota tao̒ngongoto lo alipo u moo̒tihela hapato . Timongolio hitihula tou̒ molamingo ,
42017013	wau hiwaatia̒ , " Isa ! Tuani ! Ponua mai mongowatotia ! "
42017014	Tou̒ ti Isa loo̒onto olimongolio , Tio lotahuda mao̒ , " Ponao̒lo ode mongo iimamu , pohilea mao̒ olimongolio momalakisa wawau̒mu . " Tou̒ timongolio donggo hinao̒wa , mailooli ngongoti mongolio .
42017015	Tou̒ ngotaalio limongolio loo̒laasa mao̒ deu̒ tio maloluli , tio malo hualingo sambela wenga-wengahe daa̒ helomuji Allahu Taa̒ala .
42017016	Tulusi totalu li Isa tio losujudu wau lolapali oduo̒lo o-Lio . Tau boito ngotaalio lo Samaria .
42017017	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Diila mopulu lota tamaa piloo̒luli ? Matou̒toonu taa tiolota ?
42017018	Yilongola bo taa deli botie talo hualingai lolapali oduo̒lo to Allahu Taa̒ala ? "
42017019	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ ode tau boito , " Pobongulo , wau nao̒olo . Sababu yio̒ palacaya ola-U̒ , yio̒ maloluli . "
42017020	Dengolo lota taulo Parisi lohintu toli Isa omolua Allahu Taa̒ala meidungga mai u momalenta . Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Pamalenta lo Allahu Taa̒ala diila tumulalio wolo tutuuotalo umowali oontonga lotau , tilinggula tau mowali moloi̒ya ,
42017021	' Dulo , bilohi , botie Tio ! ' meaalo , ' Teto mola Tio ! ' Sababu Allahu Taa̒ala malo lumulo lomalenta tohuungi mongoli . "
42017022	Lapatao̒ uito ti Isa lotahuda to tahidudua̒ o-Lio , " Mamei dungga wakutuulio timongoli ohilaa momilohe dulahe tuwau monto duduu-laheyaala lo Walao̒ Manusia , bo timongoli diila mowali moo̒onto mao̒ .
42017023	De tau mamoloi̒ya olemu , ' Bilohi , teto ! ' meaalo ' Bilohi , teea ! ' Bo timongoli diila polualao̒ u mololohe olio .
42017024	Odelo woloolo molo ilato pukapukao̒ tohulungo , wau motinelo monto huudio ode huudio , odito olo de owowoluwoa lo Walao̒ Manusia todulahio .
42017025	Bo bohu-bohulio Tio musi modutolopo dadaata wau diila tolimoo lotau-tauwalo tojamani botie .
42017026	Todulahee lo Walao̒ Manusia de poi̒laalolio , owowoluwoalio odelo tojamani li Nabi Noho tou̒ boito .
42017027	Tau molamelo mongilu , wau monika ; oditolo mola mololaalaaita tunggula ti Nabi Noho tilumuwoto ode kapali wau taluhe daa̒ leidungga tunggula loo̒sababu tau-tauwala boito lopunungo ngoa̒amila .
42017028	Wau olo debo odelo tojamani lei Lot . Tau-tauwalo hipo lamela hipo ngiluma , hipopo taalia , hipo tolopania halabolu wau pangimba wau hipo mongula bele .
42017029	Bo tou̒ tei Lot yilumualai lonto Sodom , todulahu boito tulu wau walilangi lotuhutai lonto hulungo wau lopobinasa olimongolio ngoa̒amila .
42017030	Odieelo mola owowoluwoalio de todulahee lo Walao̒ Manusia poi̒laalolio mai .
42017031	Todulahee boito taa donggo woluo toitaato watopo belelio diila mao̒ polaahu u mohama babaa-langilio todelomo bele . Odito olo taa donggo to halabolu diila mao̒ pohualingo ode belelio .
42017032	Eelai mola wolo u malowali todile lei Lot !
42017033	Taa motolopani mopoa̒ahu tutumulio , mao̒olia lo tutumulio . Bo tao̒olia lo tutumulio mapoa̒ahuwolo .
42017034	Pomalacayalo : Tohui boito , duulota tadonggo tuutuluhu toheetule tuwau , ngota madeloolo ; wau ngota tolaalio mao̒ poli .
42017035	Mongobua duulota donggo hemo hilinga pale , ngota madeloolo wau ngota tolaalio mao̒ poli . [
42017036	Taduulota donggo hemokalaja to halabolu , ngota madeloolo , wau ngota tolaalio mao̒ poli ] "
42017037	Tahidudua̒ li Isa malohintu mao̒ , " Mamowali tou̒toonu uito Eeya ? " Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Tou̒toonu omilate , teto obulungi mongongala milate . "
42018001	Lapatao̒ uito ti Isa lohungguli mao̒ pohumaya tuwau u longaajali to tahidudua̒ o-Lio alihu timongolio laito modua̒ wau diila mao̒ mopulito halaapani .
42018002	Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Tokota tuwau woluo hakimu ngota tadiila moohe to Allahu Taa̒ala , wau diila momandungi openu boli olita .
42018003	Tokota boito woluo olo janda ngota tamaa poo̒-poo̒daata helo taalua woli hakimu boito mei̒ podulua to palakalalio . ' Tulungi mai watia motaalua wolo musu lowatia , ' loi̒ya lojanda boito .
42018004	Dengolo mola hiheolio tihakimu boito diila lohuto lotulungi janda boito . Bo pulitio mao̒ tihakimu boito helo mikiilangi mola , ' Eleponu wau̒ diila moohe to Allahu Taa̒ala wau diila momandungi penu boli olita ,
42018005	bo sababu janda botie laito bo momuyu olau̒ , lebe mopiohu wau̒ mamo podulua palakalalio . Wonu diila , tio mamolo laalaaita monao̒ mai wau mopoo̒suusa olau̒ ' . "
42018006	Tulusi Eeya lotahuda mao̒ , " Poo̒tuota mao̒ wolo uiloi̒ya lihakimu tadiila adili boito !
42018007	Naa , wolo Allahu Taa̒ala diila tamo podulua palakala lo umati-Lio lohihilao tahi pongibode o-Lio hui wau dulahu ? Wolo Tio mamopo lohudu lowakutu mai motulungi olimongolio ?
42018008	Pomalacayalo : Tio mahua̒a mopodulua palakala limongolio ! Bo wonu Walao̒ Manusia meidungga mai , wolo donggo odungga taa palacaya o-Lio todunia botie ? "
42018009	Ti Isa lohungguli mao̒ olo pohumaya botie u pilomatuju-Lio ode tahe monganggapu dupadupapa taawewo , bo yakini deu̒ batangalio lohihilao mopiohu .
42018010	Tahuda mao̒ li Isa , " Woluo taduulota lonao̒ ode Bele lo Eeya mota lodua̒ . Ngotaalio taulo Parisi , tawewolio ngotaalio tamootagia beya .
42018011	Taulo Parisi boito tilimihula lotiwiwi wau lodua̒ , ' Oo Allahu Taa̒ala , wototia molapali oduo̒lo to Allahu Taa̒ala , sababu watotia diila debo odelo taawewo , talanggamu , hale diila motulidu meaalo hemojina . Watotia mosukuru sababu watotia diila debo odelo tamootagia beya boito .
42018012	Watotia hemo puasa poo̒oluo ngodiminggu , wau watotia hemo podewo to Eeya ngotayade mopulu monto ngoa̒amila tilapulo watotia . '
42018013	Bo tamootagia beya boito tilimihula tou̒ molamingo wau tumbao̒ diila buheli lumanggela ode hulungo . Sambela hemoleaapu duhelio tio maloloi̒ya , ' Oo Allahu Taa̒ala , ponua mai watotia , taa odusa botie ! ' "
42018014	" Pomalacayalo , " tahuda mao̒ li Isa , " tou̒ malo hualinga ode bele , tamootagia beya boitolo tatilolimo lo Allahu Taa̒ala wau diila taulo Parisi boito . Sababu timii̒du tamopolaio̒ batangalio mapo dupapaalio ; wau timii̒du tamopo dupapa batangalio mapolaio̒lio . "
42018015	Woluo tau-tauwalo talodelo mai tau̒kekeei̒ odeli Isa alihu Tio moleaapu wau mobalakati olimongolio . Tou̒ tahidudua̒ li Isa loo̒onto mao̒ , timongolio maloingo totau-tauwala boito .
42018016	Boti Isa malo tiangai tau̒kekeei̒ boito tulusi lotahuda mao̒ to tahidudua̒ o-Lio . " Hulii mao̒ tau̒kekeei̒ boito monao̒ mai ode ola-U̒ ! Diila mao̒ dinia timongolio , sababu taa debo odelo utieelo tamowali pongawaa̒ umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala .
42018017	Eelai mao̒ ! Taa diila motaalua wolo Allahu Taa̒ala debo odelo tau̒kikiia̒ ngota , diila mowali pongawaa̒ umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala . "
42018018	Tau̒wa ngota lo Yahudi lohintu mao̒ li Isa , " Paaa̒ Guru tamopiohu , watia musi mohutu wolo alihu mowali mololimo tutumulo tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ ? "
42018019	" Yilongola heloi̒yamu Wau̒ tamopiohu ? " yilintu li Isa olio . " Diaaluo tamopiohu , ngopohia Allahu Taa̒ala wambao̒ .
42018020	Maa ilotaawamu ngoa̒amila palenta lo Allahu Taa̒ala : ' Diila mao̒ pojina , diila mao̒ pomate mateelo mao̒ , diila mao̒ potao̒ , diila mao̒ posakusi yimbulo , wau hulumatia mao̒ tiilamu wau tiyamamu . ' "
42018021	" Ngoa̒amila palenta boito madiludua̒ lowatia tou̒ watia donggo muda mai , " tametao̒ lotau boito .
42018022	Loo̒dungohe uito , ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Donggo woluo sua̒li tuwau umusi pohutuwomu : Potaliyalo ngoa̒amila milikimu , wohia mao̒ doilio totaa mosikini , wau yio̒ mamoo̒tapu halata tosologa . Lapatao̒ ponao̒lo mai modudua̒ ola-U̒ . "
42018023	Bo tou̒ tau boito loo̒dungohe uito , tio tilapakulu sababu tio kaya daa̒ .
42018024	Otaawa li Isa tau boito tilapakulu , sababu uito tio lotahuda mao̒ , " Suukali daa̒ taakaya mowali pongawaa̒ umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala .
42018025	Lebe gambangi unta tuwau tumuwoto huwango dudetu , wolo taakaya ngota tumuwoto ode Dunia Bohu lo Allahu Taa̒ala . "
42018026	Tau-tauwalo taloo̒ dungohe li Isa lotahuda odito malohintu , " Wonu odito , tatoonu tamowali moa̒ahu ? "
42018027	Tametao̒ li Isa , " Udiila mowali ode manusia , mamowali ode Allahu Taa̒ala ! "
42018028	Tulusi tei Petrus loloi̒ya mao̒ , " Bilohilo ! Amiaatia malo lolaa mao̒ ungaalaa̒ lamiaatia wau loduduo̒ li Paaa̒ . "
42018029	" Pomalacayalo ! " tahuda li Isa . " Taa malo lolaa mao̒ belelio , meaalo dilelio , meaalo wutatio , meaalo tiilo wau tiyamolio meaalo mongo walai̒o sababu momaya to Allahu Taa̒ala ,
42018030	tau boito mabalasiyalo dadaata daa̒ tomaasa botie , wau tomaasa u mamei dungga mai tio mawohialio tutumulo tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ . "
42018031	Ti Isa malongambu mopulu wau duulota tahidudua̒ o-Lio wiwiwiwi , tulusi lotahuda mao̒ , " Dungohi ! Ito masaatia dulu-dulunga ode Yerusalemu . Mola teto , ngoa̒amila u tiluladio lomongo nabi tomimbihu Walao̒ Manusia , mamotoduo .
42018032	Tio mawuduolio ode tau-tauwalo tadiila Yahudi , tamamo hente-hentea̒ o-Lio , mohina , wau monula loiyohe o-Lio .
42018033	Timongolio mamopo sikisa wau momate mateelo mao̒ o-Lio , bo tou̒ dulahee otolulio , Tio mamobongu mai . "
42018034	Ngoa̒amilalo boito diila ilotonea̒ penu boli ngoi̒di mao̒ lo tahidudua̒ li Isa boito . Boli lo tataahe-Lio boito hehuliyo-Lio monto olimongolio . Diila otaawa limongolio Tio helo bisala pasali loolo .
42018035	Tou̒ ti Isa ngopee̒ meidungga ode Yerikho , ngotaalio tapitoo̒ donggo hulohuloa̒a hemohile-hile tobiihu dalalo .
42018036	Tou̒ ilodungohelio taa dadaata boito yilumawodu , tio malohintu , " Owolo ? "
42018037	" Ti Isa , taulo Najaret boito , lawolawodu , " loi̒ya mao̒ limongolio ode olio .
42018038	Yi taapitoo̒ boito malo nguatio̒ , " Isa , walae̒e Dauda ! Ponua mai watotia ! "
42018039	Tau-tauwalo tatotalu , maloingo wau pilei̒ poo̒yongalio tio . Bo tio lebe loo̒ohuu̒ longuatia̒ poli , " Walae̒e Dauda ! Ponua mai watotia ! "
42018040	Ti Isa malo huheli wau lopoa̒hu mota tau lodelo mai ode o-Lio taapitoo̒ boito . Tou̒ tio leidungga mai , ti Isa malohintu ,
42018041	" Wolo u otohilaamu pohutuwo-U̒ mai olemu ? " " Tuani , " tametao̒ lotaa pitoo̒ boito , " watotia ohilaa moo̒onto . "
42018042	Tulusi ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Wonu odito , pomilohulo ! Sababu yio̒ palacaya ola-U̒ , yio̒ maloluli . "
42018043	Tou̒ boitolo tio malowali loo̒onto , tulusi tio malo duduo̒ li Isa sambela hemo lapali oduo̒lo ode Allahu Taa̒ala . Tou̒ taa dadaata boito loo̒onto mao̒ sua̒li boito , timongolio ngoa̒amila mahipo muji-mujia Allahu Taa̒ala .
42019001	Tou̒ ti Isa leidungga mola ode Yerikho , Tio lonao̒ tulusi loli kota boito .
42019002	Tokota boito woluo tau̒wa ngota tamootagia beya wau kaya . Tanggulio Jakheus .
42019003	Tio ohilaa momilohe wonu tatoonu ti Isa boito , bo sababu mailaba daatalio lotau wau tio lohihilao limbo-limbongo , yi tio diila lowali lomilohe li Isa .
42019004	Oditolio , tio matilumeteo̒ lotitimulo wolo tau-tauwalo , tulusi malo mia̒ata ayu ngobungo , alihu moo̒onto li Isa bolo ngopee̒e mola lumaode teto .
42019005	Tou̒ ti Isa leidungga mota ode bungo lo ayu boito , Tio yilumanggela mola ode yitaato tulusi lotahuda , " Jakheus , aliheo̒ polaahei ! Sababu Wau̒ musi mohepita ode belemu todulahee botie . "
42019006	Tei Jakheus ngoi̒nta lolaahei wau malohima li Isa lou̒ wenga-wengahu .
42019007	Ngoa̒amila taloo̒onto sua̒li boito mahibiihe . Timongolio hipoloi̒yawa , " Wii ! Tio lonao̒ ode bele lotaa diila mopiohu ! "
42019008	Lapatao̒ tobelelio , tei Jakheus tilimihulo wau loloi̒ya mao̒ li Isa , " Eeya , ngotayadu halata lowatotia maposadaka lowatotia ode taa mosikini ; wau titaalo tita tamaa pee̒enta ilaakalia lowatotia , mamuli bayalia lowatotia poo̒opato piu̒wa ! "
42019009	Tulusi tahuda mao̒ li Isa , " Todulahee botie yio̒ wau ngoa̒amila ngaalaa̒mu poa̒ahua mai lo Allahu Taa̒ala wau moo̒toduo tutumulo u bohu , sababu yio̒ olo wali mai lei Abraham .
42019010	Walao̒ Manusia leidungga mai u mololohe wau mopoaahu taa u yilapalo . "
42019011	Tou̒ tau donggo hidungohe li Isa hemobisala , Tio malo hungguli mao̒ pohumaya tuwau . Sababu , tou̒ boito Tio membideo̒ lo Yerusalemu , wau helantobu lotau deu̒ Allahu Taa̒ala mahua̒a momalenta odelo Olongia todunia .
42019012	Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Woluo tabangusa ngota u lonao̒ ode lipu molamingo mola hiluwatio lowali olongia , lapatao̒ luli lohualingai .
42019013	Tou̒ diipo lomonggato , tio lotiangai tamo pululota tahi pomayalio tulusi longohi mao̒ olimongolio ngota-ngota doi hulawa ngopita . ' Podahangilo wolo doi botie tou̒ wau̒ diaaluo , ' loi̒yaalio mao̒ to limongolio .
42019014	Bo tuango lipulio boito molonui̒o . Oditolio , tou̒ tio lomonggato , timongolio malolao mongo utolia mota loloi̒ya , ' Ami diila mohuto tau botie mowali olongia lami . '
42019015	Bo tabangusa boito piluduio̒ lowali olongia , lapatao̒ luli lohualingai ode lipulio . Hua̒a tiliangio tamoomayawa olio mai lotaalua wolio , alihu otaawalio ngoolo mao̒ pae̒eda u malotapu limongolio .
42019016	Tamoomayawa bohulio lonao̒ mai wau loloi̒ya , ' Tuani , doi hulawa ngopita uilohi li Tuani boito , mapilowali lowatia mopuulo pita . '
42019017	' Mopiohu , ' loi̒ya mao̒ lituani boito , ' yio̒ tamoomayawa mopiohu ! Sababu todelomo susuu-aliyaalo ukikiio̒ yio̒ mowali palacayalo , wau̒ mamomuduo olemu tao̒kawasa to mopuulo kota . '
42019018	Tamoomayawa oluolio lonao̒ mai wau loloi̒ya , ' Tuani , doi hulawa ngopita uilohi li Tuani , mapilowali lowatia limo lopita . '
42019019	To tamoomayawa boito ti olongia maloloi̒ya , ' yio̒ mamowali tao̒kawasa to limo lokota . '
42019020	Tamoomayawa wewo lonao̒ mai wau loloi̒ya , ' Tuani , botie doi li Tuani ; matilahu lowatia toleto .
42019021	Moohe watia toli Tuani ; sababu ti Tuani tamoingowa daa̒ . Tituani hemohama wolo udiila haku li Tuani , wau ti Tuani hemohimoa̒ tilapulo totambati udiila pilomuloa li Tuani . '
42019022	Olongia boito malo loi̒ya olio , ' Yio̒ tamoomayawa moleeto ! Lotuuu̒de wolo loi̒yamu lohihilao , wau̒ mamo hukumani olemu . Otaawamu wau̒ tamoingowa daa̒ ; wau̒ hemohama wolo udiila hakuuu̒ wau hemo himoa̒ tilapulo totambati udiila pilomulowau̒ .
42019023	Wonu odito yilongola yio̒ diila lopotuoto doi boito ode bangi alihu wonu wau̒ mohualingai wau̒ mamowali mololimo doi boito wolo lentelio ? '
42019024	Lapatao̒ ti olongia boito loloi̒ya mao̒ totau-tauwalo tahitihula teto , ' Hamaa mao̒ doi boito too̒lio wau wohia mao̒ to tamoomayawa u odoi hulawa mopuulo pita boito . '
42019025	Bo tau-tauwala boito loloi̒ya , ' Tuani , tio maa omopuulo pita . '
42019026	Olongia boito lolametao̒ , ' Eelai mao̒ : tamaa ilowoluo , too̒lio mawohialio lebe dadaata mao̒ . Bo taadiila ilowoluo hitua-tuawua , wolo u mailoluo too̒lio mamuli hamaalio monto olio .
42019027	Wau botia delowalo mai mumuusuuu̒ boito tadiila motohilaa olau̒ mowali olongialio . Pateyalo timongolio ngoa̒amila mate-mateelo mao̒ totaluu̒ ' ! "
42019028	Tou̒ lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ ngoa̒amilalo boito Tio lonao̒ totalu limongolio lotidulungo ode Yerusalemu .
42019029	Tou̒ leidungga mola totili lo Betpage wau Betania to Huludu lo Jaitun , Tio lopoa̒hu duulota tahidudua̒ o-Lio lotitimulo .
42019030	" Ponao̒lo mota ode kambungu u totalu boito , " tahuda mao̒ li Isa olimongolio , " Wonu bolo timongoli tumuwoto mola odito , timongoli mamoo̒onto walao̒ kolodai tuwau u tihutihuto . Kolodai boito diipo pee̒enta mao̒ tilae̒a lotau . Hulia mao̒ kolodai boito wau delowa mai .
42019031	Wonu tau mohintu olemu , ' Yilongola timongoli lomuli kolodai boito ? ' polelea mao̒ , ' Eeya palalu leeto . ' "
42019032	Taduulota hidudua̒ li Isa boito malonao̒ , wau ilodunggaalio ngoa̒amilalo tiluhata debo odelo upilo tahuda-Lio .
42019033	Tou̒ timongolio lomuli walao̒ kolodai boito , taa ohuu̒wolio loloi̒ya mao̒ ode limongolio , " Yilongola hilulia limongoli kolodai boito ? "
42019034	Timongolio lolametao̒ , " Eeya palalu leeto . "
42019035	Tulusi timongolio lodelo walao̒ kolodai boito odeli Isa . Lapatao̒ timongolio lopo hepideo̒ jumba limongolio towulea lo kolodai boito wau lopotae̒ li Isa toitaatio .
42019036	Tou̒ Tio yilumaodeo̒ donggo toitaato kolodai boito , tau-tauwalo helo pohepide jumba limongolio todalalo .
42019037	Tou̒ ti Isa ngopee̒ meidungga ode Yerusalemu , todalalo motuhuto to Huludu lo Jaitun , ngoa̒amila tahidudua̒ o-Lio u dadaata boito mahiwatia̒ hemomuji Allahu Taa̒ala wau helo lapali sukuru to o-Lio sababu ngoa̒amila moo̒linggolabe u masilakusia limongolio .
42019038	Timongolio malo nguatio̒ , " Mabala-balakatilo Olongia tadungga-dungga mai to tanggulo Eeya ! Salaamati tosologa , wau ilopujialo mola Allahu Taa̒ala ! "
42019039	Ngoolo lota taulo Parisi towolota lotaa dadaata boito loloi̒ya mao̒ odeli Isa , " Paaa̒ Guru , Pei̒ poo̒yongilo mola tahidudua̒ li Paaa̒ . "
42019040	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Pomalacayalo ! Wonu timongolio motipoo̒yo , boboo-tuwaalo botie mamonguatio̒ . "
42019041	Tou̒ ti Isa lebe hemembideo̒ wolo Yerusalemu , wau loo̒onto mota kota boito , mahiliyonga-Lio kota boito .
42019042	Tahuda-Lio mao̒ , " Atio̒olo , donggo boli piohio wonu todulahu botie otaawamu wolo u mowali mopotoduo mai polodame ! Bo botia yio̒ diila mowali moo̒onto mao̒ .
42019043	Yio̒ mamoo̒laasa maasa tuwau , tou̒toonu musumu mamohutu popoo-mubulaalo to palitumu ; timongolio mamomala olemu wau mohuntula olemu monto totoonulalo tutulio .
42019044	Timongolio mamo ngantulu olemu wolo ngoa̒amila tuango lipumu ; wau diaaluo penu boli botu ngobotu mapoluli limongolio meitolaa , susuusungi to tambatilio , sababu yio̒ diila lopoo̒tuoto saaa̒ti tou̒ Allahu Taa̒ala leidungga mai mopoa̒ahu olemu ! "
42019045	Ti Isa tilumuwoto ode Bele lo Eeya wau lolumulo helo polahi to tahipo dahangia teto .
42019046	" Todelomo Kitabi , " Tahuda-Lio mao̒ olimongolio , " tulatuladu odie ; Allahu Taa̒ala lotahuda , ' Bele-U̒ mamowali tambati podua̒alo . ' Bo timongoli lopowali beelea lopohehu ! "
42019047	Timii̒du dulahu ti Isa hemo ngaajali to Bele lo Eeya . Mongo iimamu tauwa , wau guguu-ruwaalo agama wolo mongo tau̒wa lo Yahudi , ohilaa momate-mateelo mao̒ o-Lio ,
42019048	bo diila loo̒tapu dalalo u mohutu mao̒ sua̒li boito , sababu taa ngoa̒amila wambao̒ hemo dungohe laito o-Lio , wau iloa̒anga to tataahe-Lio .
42020001	Todulahee tuwau , ti Isa donggo hemo ngaajali wau hemo pohabari Habari Mopiohu monto Allahu Taa̒ala ode tau-tauwala todelomo Bele lo Eeya . Mongo iimamu tauwa , guguu-ruwaalo agama wolo mongo tau̒wa lo Yahudi , lonao̒ mai ,
42020002	wau loloi̒ya li Isa , " Nte polelea mai olami dutadutaa̒ tolo yio̒ helohutu ngoa̒amilalo botie ? Tatoonu talongohi haku boito to ole-Mu ? "
42020003	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Wau̒ ohilaa mohintu . Nte polelea mai ola-U̒ ,
42020004	Tei Yahya helo polihu wolo haku lo tatoonu ? Allahu Taa̒ala meaalo manusia ? "
42020005	Yi timongolio malo lumulo lodulohupa , " Wonu maloi̒yanto ' Wolo haku lo Allahu Taa̒ala , ' Tio mamoloi̒ya , ' Wonu odito , yilongola timongoli diila palacaya o-Lio ? '
42020006	Bo wonu ito moloi̒ya , ' Wolo haku lomanusia , ' taa ngoa̒amila mamomai̒ olanto wolo botu , sababu timongolio palacaya deu̒ tei Yahya nabi ngota . "
42020007	Oditolio timongolio lolametao̒ , " Diila otaawa lami . "
42020008	Yi ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ ode limongolio , " Wonu odito Wau̒ olo diila tamolele mai olemu wolo haku lotatoonu Wau̒ malohutu ngoa̒amilalo botie . "
42020009	Ti Isa lohungguli mao̒ totau-tauwalo boito , pohumaya odie mola , " Woluo ngotaalio talo pomulo angguru to ilengi ngopita . Pilopo seuwalio ilengi boito ode tangolo lota tahi pokalajawa , tulusi lomonggato odelipu uwewo wau mola lotibiluloa̒ lohiheo teto .
42020010	Tou̒ mawakutuulio molipu hungo lo angguru , taa ohuu̒wo lo ilengi boito lolao tamoomayawa olio ode tahi pokalajawa ilengi boito mola mololimo tayadio . Bo tahi pokalajawa ilengi boito lomate tamoomayawa boito wau hua̒a pilei̒ walinga limongolio lou̒ laulau lo uluu̒ .
42020011	Yi taa ohuu̒wo lo ilengi boito luli lolao tamoomayawa wewo ; bo debo pilate mai limongolio olo tamoomayawa boito boli hilinaalio lo tahi pokalajawa boito tulusi pilei̒ walingalio wolo laulau lo uluu̒ .
42020012	Lapatao̒ taa ohuu̒wo lo ilengi boito lolao mota tamoomayawa otolulio . Bo tamoomayawa boito debo pilatelio olo lo tahi pokalajawa boito wau pilomahuli mongolio ode bulemengo lo ilengi boito .
42020013	' Pulitio mao̒ taa ohuu̒wo lo ilengi boito loloi̒ya , mawolo umusi pohutuwou̒ poli ? Wau̒ mamolao walau̒uu̒ lohihilao taa otolia̒nguu̒ . Tantu tio mahulumatio mai limongolio ! '
42020014	Bo tou̒ tahi pokalajawa ilengi boito loo̒onto walao̒ lotaa ohuu̒wo lo ilengi boito , timongolio maloloi̒ya ngota-timongota , ' Botie tio taa̒hali lo walisilio . Dulo pateento tio mate-mateelo mao̒ , alihu motapunto walisilio . '
42020015	Yi madiledei̒ mongolio tio ode bulemengo ilengi boito lapatao̒ pilate limongolio yila-yilateelo mao̒ . " Lapatao̒ ti Isa lohintu mao , " Naa , wonu taa ohuu̒wo lo ilengi boito mohualingai , mawolo u pohutuolio to tahi pokalajawa ilengi boito ?
42020016	Matantu tio monao̒ mai wau momate-mateelo mao̒ to tahi pokalajawa ilengi boito , tulusi mongohi ilengi boito to tahi pokalajawa wewo . " Loo̒dungohe uito , maloloi̒ya tau-tauwala odeli Isa , " Sama-samaata diila ! "
42020017	Ti Isa lomiloheo̒ ode limongolio lapatao̒ lotahuda , " Wonu odito , wolo boliilio ayati lo Kitabi botie ? ' Botu udiila ilopomakea pani lo hudungu , malowali botu ulaba-labaalo mopiohu . '
42020018	Ngoa̒amila tamodehu tobotu boito mamoa̒ntulu ; wau tatoonu tao̒deehe lobotu boito mamotoyopu mowali peaahuo̒ . "
42020019	Guguu-ruwaalo agama wau mongo iimamu tau̒wa motota deu̒ pohumaya boito pilomatuju li Isa ode limongolio . Sababu uito timongolio ohilaa moheu̒pa o-Lio to saaa̒tilo boito , bo timongolio moohe totaa dadaata .
42020020	Oditolio timongolio malo lolohe hiangio u mopiohu . Timongolio losoloi̒ totaa u lotihutu odelo taa ihilasi , wau lopoa̒hu tau-tauwalo boito lohentobu li Isa wolo totoonulalo yiyintu , alihu timongolio mowali mohudu o-Lio to tao̒haku molantu wau to okokawasa li gubolonulu .
42020021	Yi tau-tauwala tamaa siloloi̒ boito loloi̒ya li Isa , " Paaa̒ Guru , otaawa lamiaatia deu̒ ngoa̒amila uiloi̒ya li Paaa̒ boito otutu . Otaawa lamiaatia olo ti Paaa̒ helo ngaajali lou̒ juujulu tomimbihu kahandaki lo Allahu Taa̒ala ode manusia , sababu ti Paaa̒ diila bo wambao̒ momilohe tau .
42020022	Sababu uito nte polelea mai li Paaa̒ olamiaatia , moduduo̒ wuu̒du lo agamanto , wolo mowali momayali beya odeli Kaisali meaalo diila ? "
42020023	Bo otaawa li Isa siyasati limongolio . Sababu uito tio lotahuda mao̒ ,
42020024	" Nte pobilohe mai ola-U̒ doi talaa̒ ngopita . Gambali wau tanggulita utie ? " " Kaisali ! " tametao̒ limongolio .
42020025	" Wonu odito , " tahuda li Isa olimongolio , " wohia mao̒ li Kaisali , wolo miliki li Kaisali wau ode Allahu Taa̒ala wolo miliki lo Allahu Taa̒ala . "
42020026	Malo patata totalu lotaa dadaata boito timongolio diila loo̒tapu totala penu boli tuwau mao̒ toli Isa . Timongolio bo wambao̒ hipoo̒yonga wau hilinggolabe to totame-Tio boito .
42020027	Dengolo lota talonto palatei lo Saduki lonao̒ mai odeli Isa . ( Timongolio botie palatei tao̒ huhama deu̒ tamailate diilalo mobongu mai . ) Timongolio lohintu li Isa ,
42020028	" Paaa̒ Guru , Tei Musa loluladei butoo̒ botie ode olanto : Wonu talolai̒ ngota mate wau diila owalao̒ , yi wutatio musi monika wolo jandalio alihu moo̒tapu mai wali totaa mailate boito .
42020029	Pee̒enta woluo tamohutato pitu lota . Tamohuhula lonika , lapatao̒ yilate diila owalao̒ .
42020030	Lapatao̒ tao̒luolio lonika wolo jandalio , bo tio olo yilate wau diila loo̒tapu walao̒ .
42020031	Sua̒li u tutuuwauwa lowali olo wolo wutatio tao̒tolulio demola tao̒pitulio .
42020032	Pulitio mao̒ taabua boito yilate olo .
42020033	Todulahu muli pobongula mai lotaa malo punungo , dile lo tatoonu taabua boito ? Sababu pitupitu lotaalo malonika wolio . "
42020034	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Tau-tauwalo tahitumula masaatia botie hiponikawa ,
42020035	bo tau-tauwalo tapaatuti u muli potumulolio mai tou̒ malo punungo , wau tumumulo tojamani u mamei dungga , timongolio diila mowali monika .
42020036	Owowoluwoa limongolio debo odelo malai̒kati , wau diila mowali mate . Timongolio yito mongo walao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala , sababu timongolio maluli bilongulio mai lonto opopate .
42020037	Tei Musa lohihilao malo poi̒laalo lou̒ mopatato deu̒ taamate mamuli bongulolio mai . Todelomo tuladio tomimbihu diu̒to u lei̒lei̒ta boito tio longunte Eeya odelo ' Allahu Taa̒ala lei Abraham , Allahu Taa̒ala lei Isihaka wau Allahu Taa̒ala lei Yako ' .
42020038	Naa , Allahu Taa̒ala boito diila Allahu Taa̒ala lotaa yilate ! Tio Allahu Taa̒ala lotau-tauwalo tahitumula ! Sababu ode Allahu Taa̒ala , ngoa̒amila tau tumutumulo . "
42020039	Ngoolo lota guru lo agama loloi̒ya mao̒ , " Totameti Paaa̒ Guru mopiohe daa̒ . "
42020040	Sababu uito timongolio diilalo buheli helohintu hitua-tuawua toli Isa .
42020041	Ti Isa lohintu mao̒ olimongolio , " Woloolo mola mowali loi̒yalo deu̒ Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua boito wali mai lei Dauda ?
42020042	Lebe-lebe pomao̒ tei Dauda lohihilao loloi̒ya todelomo Jaburu , ' Eeya lotahuda to Eeyau̒ : Potihuloo̒lo to ambahu olowala-U̒ ,
42020043	tunggula Wau̒ mohutu mumuusuu-Mu taa̒luku ole-Mu . '
42020044	Oditolio wonu tei Dauda longunte Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua boito ' Eeya ' , mawoloolo mola Tio wali mai lei Dauda ? "
42020045	Tou̒ tau-tauwala donggo hipo dungohe li Isa hemobisala , Tio lotahuda mao̒ to tahidudua̒ o-Lio ,
42020046	" Poo̒daha-dahaalo mao̒ to guguu-ruwaalo agama . Timongolio motohilaa mojalena wolo jumba hayahayao̒ , wau motohilaa mei̒ hulumati to papaa-taliyaalo . Timongolio motohilaa tataa-mbatiyalo u hulu-hulumati todelomo bele potabiaalo wau to popoo-tihungguwalo .
42020047	Timongolio hemohimbulo tomongo janda , wau hemohehu belelio . Wau u modepuheo̒ ololeeti mongolio boito , timongolio hemodua̒ hayahayao̒ ! Hukumani limongolio de mobuheetai ! "
42021001	To Bele lo Eeya , ti Isa loo̒onto tau-tauwalo tahi kaayawa helo luwango doi ode delomo bulua lodewo .
42021002	Iloontonga-Lio olo janda ngota tamosikini daa̒ , loluwango doi tombaha dulopita .
42021003	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Dungohi : janda botie loluwango lebe dadaata wolo ngoa̒amila taawewo .
42021004	Sababu timongolio ngoa̒amila longohi ololebe lohalata limongolio . Bo janda botie , eleponu mosikini tutu , malongohi ngoa̒amila uwoluo too̒lio u palaluolio lohihilao u potumulo . "
42021005	Woluo tahipo loi̒yawa tomimbihu woloolo mola piohio Bele lo Eeya dadaiyalo wolo boboo-tuwaalo u mopiohu wau wolo babaa-langiyalo u pilopodewo ode Allahu Taa̒ala . Yi ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ olimongolio ,
42021006	" De woluo mai saaa̒tilio , ngoa̒amila u iloontonga limongoli botie malolo hubuolio ; diaaluo mao̒ penu boli botu ngobotu tewe u meitolaa susuusungi to tambatilio ! "
42021007	Timongolio lohintu mao̒ li Isa , " Paaa̒ Guru , omolua sua̒li boito mamotoduo mai ? Wau wolo tuotio deu̒ malei dungga saaa̒tilio sua̒li boito mamotoduo mai ? "
42021008	Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Poo̒dahailo , diila bolo timongoli o aakalialio . Dadaata taa mamonao̒ mai lou̒ momake tanggulu-U̒ , wau moloi̒ya , ' Wau̒lo Tio ! ' wau ' Mawakutuulio . ' Bo timongoli diila mao̒ podudua̒ olimongolio .
42021009	Diila mao̒ oohe olo wonu timongoli modungohe habari tomimbihu lo popaatea wau polo malakala . Ngoa̒amilalo boito musi motoduwopo mai . Bo uito diila oboliilio deu̒ mawakutuulio kiama . "
42021010	Lapatao̒ ti Isa malo potolonga mola bisalaa-Lio , tahuda-Lio mao̒ , " Bangusa u tuwau mamopaatea moluwali bangusa uwewo wau lipu tuwau mamoluhu lipu uwewo .
42021011	Teto teea mamotoduo liluhu daa̒ , polobiti , wau wembolo longongoto . Mamei dungga mai susuu-aliyaalo u moo̒tihela hapato wau dahasati tohulungo .
42021012	Bo tou̒ dipolulio mai ngoa̒amilalo boito motoduo , timongoli mawau̒polio wau alinayalio . Timongoli mabutoo̒lio to bebee-leyaalo potabiaalo wau potuwotolio ode delomo tutupa . Wau timongoli madedeo̒lio ode talu lomongo olongia wau tahi okawasawa sababu timongoli muri-U̒ .
42021013	Uitolo hiyangio olimongoli u mopohabari Habari Mopiohu monto Allahu Taa̒ala .
42021014	Poo̒ohuu̒walo hilao deu̒ timongoli diila tamolawalo tomimbihu wolo umusi loi̒ya limongoli u mopodulua batanga .
42021015	Wau̒ lohihilao mamongohi mai tataa-heyaalo wau tinepo olimongoli , tilinggula diaaluo mao̒ penu boli ngota monto mumuusuumu mowali moluwali meaalo momaahu wolo uloi̒ya limongoli .
42021016	Timongoli mahiyanatio lipaapa wau limaamamu , lomongo wutatumu , lomongo ilaatumu wau lomongo tamanimu . Ngotayadi mongoli mapateelio mate-mateelo mao̒ limongolio .
42021017	Timongoli malonuo̒ lotaa ngoa̒amila sababu timongoli muri-U̒ .
42021018	Bo penu boli huwoo̒ ngopata monto lunggongumu diila tameenggi .
42021019	Wonu timongoli moo̒tahangi wau sabali , yi timongoli moa̒ahu . "
42021020	" Wonu bolo timongoli moo̒onto Yerusalemu bilaala lopajule , mao̒taawa mao̒ limongoli deu̒ kota boito diilalo mohiheo maa̒ntuluolio .
42021021	Towakutu boito mamusi tau to Yudea tumeteo̒ ode hihui̒-hui̒dea . Timongolio tawoluo todelomo kota mamusi mololaa mao̒ kota , wau timongolio to bulemengo kota diila mao̒ potuwoto ode delomo kota .
42021022	Sababu duduu-laheyaalo boito tutuulio tutu ' Duduu-laheyaala lo Hukumani Podehuwolo mai ' , alihu lou̒ odito motoduwolo mola wolo u malei tuladu todelomo Kitabi .
42021023	Malo moo̒tihela hapato duduu-laheyaalo boito ode taabua tadonggo ombodaa̒ , wau tiilo tadonggo hemo potutu lotau̒nge . Lipu botie mao̒dungga lou̒ suusa daa̒ , wau Eeya mamo hukumani mai bangusa botie .
42021024	Woluo tamaa pateelio lobanggo mate-mateelo mao̒ , woluo olo tamaa deloolio odelo tatilawalo ode lilii-puwaalo lotau ; wau tau-tauwalo tadiila motota lo Allahu Taa̒ala mamo dutadutaa̒a Yerusalemu tunggula mopulito wakutuulio u matilantu lo Eeya ode limongolio . "
42021025	" De tomato lodulahu , hulalo , wau popoo-liyamalo mao̒ntonga tutuu-wotalo . Todunia babaa-ngusawalo mamoohe wau molingu motaalua wolo tingohu dupota daa̒ wau oliyoo̒ buoo̒olo uwali-walihuhu lodeheto .
42021026	Manusia mamoohe tio̒opatea motaalua lou̒ wolo u mamotoduo mai to ngoilanggubu dunia botie , sababu tahi kawasawa todulente daa̒ mamowali moa̒aa̒-mbulatia .
42021027	Tou̒ boitolo Walao̒ Manusia mamei dungga todelomo heengo wolo kawasa wau ololaio̒ daa̒ .
42021028	Wonu bolo susuu-aliyaalo boito mamotoduo mai , pobongulo wau bintaa̒a mola lunggongumu , sababu ngopee̒epo mai timongoli mapo aahuwolo . "
42021029	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lohungguli mao̒ olimongolio pohumaya odie mola , tahuda-Lio , " Poo̒bilohe mao̒ bungo lo ayu ara wau ngoa̒amila bungo lo ayu wewo .
42021030	Wonu bolo duduungio muda to wohutio mahe oontonga , otaawa mao̒ limongoli deu̒ malembidu sembo lou̒ mopatu .
42021031	Odito olo wonu timongoli moo̒onto sua̒li boito motoduo mao̒taawa limongoli deu̒ Allahu Taa̒ala mahua̒a momalenta odelo Olongia .
42021032	Ototai mao̒ ! Susuu-aliyaalo boito mamotoduo tou̒ dipolulio mai tau-tauwalo tahitumula masaatia botie mate ngoa̒amilalo .
42021033	Hulungo wau dunia mamooli , bo tahuda-U̒ debo ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ . "
42021034	" Poo̒dahawa batangamu , diila bolo timongoli mopusingi daa̒ wolo popoo-tihungguwalo wau mimii-numaniyalo u moo̒huwoo̒ , meaalo mailaba momikiilangi susuu-aliyaala lo tutumulumu , tilinggula timongoli diila dapadapato tou̒ dulahee boito tumahuo̒lo mola lumenetai .
42021035	Sababu Dulahee boito mamei dungga debo odelo talele to ngoa̒amila tau todunia botie .
42021036	Poo̒daha-dahaalo mao̒ , wau podua̒alo laito alihu timongoli moo̒ tahangi tou̒ ngoa̒amila sua̒li de motoduo mai wau timongoli mowali motaalua lo Walao̒ Manusia . "
42021037	Ti Isa helo ngaajali to Bele lo Eeya wakutu dulahu wau huilio mao̒ Tio lonao̒ ode huludu lo Jaitun wau lotitolaa teto .
42021038	Timii̒du dumodupo ngoa̒amila tau hiponao̒wa mai ode Bele lo Eeya hemo dungohe pongaajali li Isa .
42022001	Lameyangi lo Roti Diila Oragi u ilunte Paska malembidei .
42022002	Mongo iimamu tau̒wa wau guguu-ruwaalo agama hipololohe dalalo lou̒ poo̒-poo̒oyo u momate li Isa mate-mateelo mao̒ , sababu timongolio moohe totaa dadaata .
42022003	Lapatao̒ Ibilisi tilumuwoto odelei Yudas tai̒lunte olo Iskariot , deu̒ito-yito ngotaalio lo tamopulu wau duulota tahidudua̒ li Isa .
42022004	Sababu uito tei Yudas malonao̒ mola lodulohupa wolo mongo iimamu tau̒wa wau wolo mongo tau̒wa lo tamoo-kawalia Bele lo Eeya pasali woloolo mola tio mowali mohudu li Isa ode limongolio .
42022005	Timongolio leengahe daa̒ wau lodanti u mamongohi doi olio .
42022006	Tei Yudas olo akolo wau malopeehu hiyango u mohudu li Isa ode limongolio , lou̒ diila ilotaawa lotau .
42022007	Malei dungga dulahio todelomo Lameyangi lo Roti Diila Oragi deu̒ himba u pohutu ua̒alo lo Paska mao̒lotolo .
42022008	Yi ti Isa lopoa̒hu olei Petrus wolei Yahya , " Ponao̒lo podapato mao̒ ua̒alo lo Paska olanto . "
42022009	" Tou̒toonu otohilaa li Paaa̒ podapato mao̒ lamiaatia ? " uali mongolio .
42022010	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Tou̒ timongoli tumuwoto ode kota , talolai̒ ngota tadonggo delodelo bolinggo tuwau tuatuanga taluhu mamo dunggaya wolimongoli . Dudui̒ mao̒ tio ode bele u potuwotalio ,
42022011	wau polelea mao̒ totaa ohuu̒wo lobele boito : Ti Guru loloi̒ya mai , ' Tou̒toonu tambatilio lo tahidudua̒ ola-U̒ wau Wau̒ molamela ua̒alo lo Paska ? '
42022012	Taa ohuu̒wo lobele boito mamopotunu mai olemu huwali lopahu tuwau u leidaa̒ , wimu-wimumuto wolo pakakasilio . Podapato mao̒ ngoa̒amilalo teto mola . "
42022013	Yi malonao̒ tei Petrus wolei Yahya , tulusi loo̒dungga ngoa̒amilalo lotuuu̒de debo odelo u tilahuda li Isa . Timongolio olo malopo dapato ua̒alo lo Paska boito .
42022014	Tou̒ malei dungga wakutuulio u molamelo ua̒alo lo Paska boito , ti Isa lotihuloa̒a pee̒-pee̒enta wolo tahidudua̒ o-Lio totambati polamelalo .
42022015	Lapatao̒ Tio lotahuda mao̒ olimongolio , " Otohilaa-U̒ daa̒ molamelo ua̒alo lo Paska botie pee̒-pee̒enta wolimongoli tou̒ Wau̒ diipo modutolo sikisa !
42022016	Sababu , pomalacayalo : Wau̒ diilalo molamela ua̒alo botie tunggula boliilo totamela botie poi̒laalolo to Dunia Bohu lo Allahu Taa̒ala . "
42022017	Lapatao̒ uito ti Isa lomintaa̒a hakati lo angguru , tulusi lolapali dua̒ sukuru ode Allahu Taa̒ala , lapatao̒ lotahuda mao̒ , " Hamaalo utie , wau taya-tayadelo mota ;
42022018	sababu ototai mao̒ : tumula mao̒ masaatia botie Wau̒ diilalo mongilu angguru botie poli tunggula Allahu Taa̒ala mai̒lo kawasa wolo lealeaatulo mao̒ . "
42022019	Lapatao̒ uito ti Isa malohama roti . Wau tou̒ mailapato lolapali dua̒ sukuru , hepili-pilita-Ngio roti boito wolo uluu̒-Lio tulusi yilohi-Lio mao̒ olimongolio , wau lotahuda , " Uti-utieelo batanga-U̒ [ uiludu ode limongoli . Pohutuwalo utie u mopoe̒ela ola-U̒ . "
42022020	Odito olo lapatao̒ lolamelo , Tio longohi mao̒ olimongolio hakati lo angguru boito wau lotahuda , " Hakati botie tutuulio tutu daantia lo Allahu Taa̒ala u bohu , u piloposaaha wolo duhu-U̒ -- duhu u bilangguatai ode limongoli . " ]
42022021	" Bo bilohi ! Taa u mohiyanati ola-U̒ woluo tewe pee̒-pee̒enta wola-U̒ .
42022022	Walao̒ Manusia memangi maamate odelo woloolo mola u matilantu mai lo Allahu Taa̒ala ; bo matopotala taa u mohiyanati o-Lio ! "
42022023	Yi timongolio mahipo hihiintua ngota timongota , tatoonu towolota limongolio tamamohutu mao̒ sua̒li boito .
42022024	Towolota lo tahidudua̒ li Isa tilumoodu polohamawa tomimbihu tatoonu monto olimongolio tamusi anggapuwolo tapulito udaa̒ .
42022025	Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ ode limongolio , " Mongo olongia lobangusa tadiila motota lo Allahu Taa̒ala hipodeehe ulipulio , wau tahi okawasawa ulipulio tai̒lunte , ' Tamoduo̒lawa Ulipu ' .
42022026	Bo timongoli diila mowali odito . Bolii̒o mao̒ , taa pulito udaa̒ towolotamu musi debo odelo tapulito ukikiio̒ , wau tau̒wa mamusi mowali debo odelo tamoomayawa .
42022027	Tatoonu talebe udaa̒ : taa u hulohuloa̒ hemolamela tomeja , meaalo taa u hemohinta olio ? Matantu taa u hulohuloa̒ boito . Bo Wau̒ woluo towolota limongoli odelo tamoomayawa .
42022028	Todelomo totoonulalo polodutolo-U̒ , timongoli laito pee̒-pee̒enta wola-U̒ .
42022029	Odelo woloolo mola Allahu Taa̒ala malongohi palenta ola-U̒ haku u momalenta , odito olo Wau̒ mamongohi mai olemu haku boito .
42022030	Lou̒ odito timongoli mowali moduduo̒ motisana-sanangi wola-U̒ towakutu Wau̒ mowali Olongia . Wau timongoli mamo tihuloo̒ toitaato mopulaa duluo tambati huhuloa̒ li olongia u momalenta tomopulaa duluo suku bangusa lo Isirai̒lu . "
42022031	" Simon , Simon , dungohe mai ! Ibilisi mailohiya luasi u motesi olimongoli ; debo odelo pale yinggilolo monto alipo tilinggula u mopiohu yilinggi monto u moleeto .
42022032	Bo Wau̒ malodua̒ mola olemu , Simon , alihu iimanimu diila mao̒ moluluto . Wau wonu yio̒ malo hualingai ode ola-U̒ , yio̒ mamusi mopoo̒ lotolao̒ mongo wutatumu . "
42022033	Tei Petrus lolametao̒ , " Eeya , watotia ihilasi tumuwoto ode tutupa wau mate pee̒-pee̒enta wolo Eeya ! "
42022034	" Pomalacayalo , Petrus , " tahuda mao̒ li Isa , " tou̒ maluo̒ diipo mokukuyuu̒ mai todulahee botie , mapoo̒otolu yio̒ lomaahe ola-U̒ . "
42022035	Lapatao̒ uito ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ ode limongolio , " Muloololio mai tou̒ Wau̒ lolao olimongoli lou̒ diila lopoluasi olimongoli helodelo dompeti , bututu meaalo sapatu , wolo timongoli ilopulita lolo-loolo ? " " Diila ! " tametao̒ limongolio .
42022036	" Bo botia , " tahuda mao̒ li Isa , " tatoonu tao̒dompeti meaalo bututu , mamusi modelo uito ; wau tatoonu tadiila owamilo , musi mopotali jumbalio mota motali wamilo .
42022037	Sababu , pomalacayalo , ayati lo Kitabi u tingohio odie : ' Tio ilanggapu odelo tau ngota tamoleeto , ' musi motoduo mai tobatanga-U̒ . Sababu wolo u tulatulade todelomo Kitabi tomimbihu-U̒ donggo todutoduo masaatia botie . "
42022038	" Eeya , " loi̒ya mao̒ lo tahidudua̒ li Isa , " bilohi , teea woluo wamilo mohelu duluo . " " Sambelolo ! " tametao̒ li Isa .
42022039	Ti Isa lololaa mao̒ kota wau malonao̒ debo odelo ubiaasa ode Huludu Jaitun , wau tahidudua̒ o-Lio lonao̒ olo wo-Lio .
42022040	Tou̒ malei dungga mota teto , " Tio lotahuda mao̒ ode limongolio , Podua̒alo mola alihu timongoli diila mao̒ odusa wonu timongoli yimontalalio . "
42022041	Lapatao̒ Tio lonao̒ lebe lolaminga ngopee̒ lonto olimongolio , tanu lamingio ngopopai̒ lobotu , tulusi loti bonggohuu̒ wau lodua̒ ,
42022042	" Oo Paapa , " ua-Lio mao̒ , " wonu mowali , powalahe mao̒ monto olaa-Tia polodutolo umusi olaasawa lowa-Tia botie . Bo diila moduduo̒ utohilaa lowa-Tia , bo moduduo̒ utohilaa li Paapa wambao̒ . " [
42022043	Malai̒kati ngota malonao̒ mai ode o-Lio wau lopoo̒ lotolao̒ o-Lio .
42022044	Ti Isa lodutola daa̒ lohilao tilinggula Tio helebe tio̒otutua lodua̒ . Wula-Tio debo odelo duhu u hilumeheta ode huta . ]
42022045	Yilapato lodua̒ , ti Isa luli lohualingai ode tahidudua̒ o-Lio . Tio loo̒dungga olimongolio donggo hituluhe sababu siluukali daa̒ lohilao .
42022046	Tulusi Tio lotahuda mao̒ olimongolio , " Yilongola timongoli bo hituluhe ? Pobongulo wau podua̒alo mola alihu timongoli diila odungga loimontala . "
42022047	Tou̒ ti Isa donggo hemotahuda leidungga mai ngopolemboa̒ tau . Tau̒wa limongolio tei Yudas , tala ngota muri li Isa . Lapatao̒ tei Yudas lonao̒ mota odeli Isa wau malodilo o-Lio .
42022048	Boti Isa lotahuda mao̒ olio , " Yudas , wolo yio̒ lodilo ola-U̒ botie , yio̒ ohilaa mohiyanati Walao̒ Manusia ? "
42022049	Tou̒ tahidudua̒ li Isa tawoluo teto loo̒onto mao̒ wolo u mamotoduo , timongolio loloi̒ya , " Eeya , matuhuwo wambao̒ lomongo watotia wolo wamilo ! "
42022050	Tulusi tala ngota limongolio lolimadeo̒ wato li iimamu daa̒ wolo wamilo tilinggula loputu bulongalio olowala .
42022051	Boti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Sambelolo ! " Tulusi dilede-Tio bulonga lotau boito wau lopoo̒luli mao̒ .
42022052	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda ode mongo iimamu tau̒wa wau mongo polowila tamoo-kawalia , Bele lo Eeya , wau mongo tau̒wa lo Yahudi talonao̒ mai odito u moheu̒pa o-Lio , " Yilongola Wau̒ botie tamoleeto , tunggula timongoli lonao̒ mai wolo wamilo wau ayu pangokoo̒ u moheu̒pa ola-U̒ ?
42022053	Ngohui-ngohui Wau̒ wolimongoli to Bele lo Eeya , timongoli diila loheu̒pa ola-U̒ . Bo uti-utieelo saaa̒tilio limongoli moponao̒ uito , saaa̒ti kawasa lou̒ modio̒lomo modihu poloitohu . "
42022054	Timongolio loheu̒pa li Isa wau lodelo o-Lio ode Bele lomongo iimamu daa̒ . Tei Petrus lohunuhe lonto u molamingo .
42022055	Tohuungo pango boito tulu towungolo mapilo lei̒itio wau tei Petrus mota lotihuloa̒a pee̒-pee̒enta wolo tahihuloa̒a to palitio .
42022056	Tala ngota lowato taabua loo̒onto olei Petrus hulohuloa̒a tobiihu polulo tulu boito ; tulusi wato taabua baito helo poo̒tuoto olei Petrus , lapatao̒ loloi̒ya mao̒ , " Tau botie olo engonti woluo pee̒-pee̒enta woli Isa ! "
42022057	Bo tei Petrus malomaahu . Tio loloi̒ya , " Watia sama-samaata diila moo̒taawa wolo tau boito ! "
42022058	Ngosaaa̒ti lapatio mao̒ , ngotaalio wewo loo̒onto olei Petrus wau loloi̒ya , " Yio̒ olo ngotaalio limongolio ! " Bo tei Petrus lolametao̒ , " Diila , diila watia ! "
42022059	Tanu ngojamu lapatio mao̒ , ngotaalio wewo poli malo loi̒ya wolo suala daa̒ , " Memangi tau botie muri li Isa , sababu tio taulo Galilea ! "
42022060	Bo tei Petrus lolametao̒ , " Wolo makusudumu , diila otaawau̒ ! " To saaa̒tilo boito , tou̒ tei Petrus donggo hemobisala , maluo̒ lokukuyuu̒ .
42022061	Ti Isa poli loili mao̒ wau lomilohe olei Petrus . Tulusi tei Petrus loo̒e̒ela mola to Eeya u malo tahuda olio , " Tou̒ diipo maluo̒ mokukuyuu̒ todulahe botie , yio̒ mapoo̒otolu lomaahe ola-U̒ . "
42022062	Yi tei Petrus mailumuwalo lonteto wau hilumoyongo mopotide-tideo̒ .
42022063	Tau-tauwala tadonggo hidahawa li Isa , helo poitohe wau lomate o-Lio .
42022064	Matolio tilau̒be limongolio wau hepilo hintualio , " Nte tapula tatoonu talomate ole-Mu ? "
42022065	Donggo dadaata tataa-heyaalo u mohina hepomukao̒ limongolio o-Lio .
42022066	Dimodupio mola , mongo tau̒wa lo Yahudi , mongo iimamu tau̒wa , wau guguu-luwalo agama lotia̒mbu , tulusi lodelo li Isa , ode talu lo Mahakama Agama limongolio .
42022067	" Poo̒taawa mai olami , " uali mongolio o-Lio , " wolo Yio̒ botie Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua ? " Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Wonu polele-U̒ mai olimongoli , timongoli debo diila tapalacaya .
42022068	Wau wonu Wau̒ mohintu mai olemu , timongoli debo diila tamolameto .
42022069	Bo tumula mao̒ botia , Walao̒ Manusia mamo tihuloa̒a to ambahu olowala lo Allahu Taa̒ala Taa Laba-labaalo kawasa . "
42022070	Yi timongolio ngoa̒amila malo loi̒ya , " Wonu odito , Yio̒ botie Walao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala ? " Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " odito uali mongoli . "
42022071	Yi timongolio malo loi̒ya , " Diilalo palalu sakusi ! Ito maloo̒ dungohu lonto tunggi-Lio lohihilao ! "
42023001	Ngoa̒amila majalisi boito tilimihulo , tulusi lodelo li Isa ode talu lei Pilatus .
42023002	Teto timongolio malo potulude o-Lio , " Timongolio loloi̒ya , ' Malotapu lami tau botie hemopo lapalo ulipu . Tio hemo popatu totau alihu diila momayali beya toli Kaisali , sababu heloi̒yaa-Lio deu̒ Tio yito Almasi , ngotaalio li olongia . "
42023003	Lapatao̒ tei Pilatus lohintu mao̒ li Isa , " Tingga otutu Yio̒ olongia taulo Yahudi ? " Tametao̒ li Isa , " Oditolo loi̒yamu . "
42023004	Yi loi̒ya mao̒ lei Pilatus ode mongo iimamu tau̒wa wau taa dadaata boito , " Wau̒ diila loo̒tapu totala penu boli tuwau mao̒ totau botie u pohukuu-maniyalo o-Lio . "
42023005	Bo timongolio lebe hemo huntulao̒ olo , " Wolo pongaajali-Lio , Tio hemo popatu taa to ngoilanggubu Yudea ; bohu-bohulio to Galilea , wau botia matilinggula poli odiamai . "
42023006	Tou̒ tei Pilatus loo̒dungohe uito , tio malohintu , " wolo Tio botie taulo Galilea ? "
42023007	Tou̒ piloo̒taalio mao̒ deu̒ ti Isa asalii-Lio lonto madala to kawasa lei Herodes , tei Pilatus malolao li Isa odelei Herodess , u tou̒ boito woluo olo to Yerusalemu .
42023008	Tei Herodes sanangi daa̒ tou̒ loo̒onto li Isa , sababu malohiheo tio loo̒dungohe pasalii-Lio wau ohilaa momilohe o-Lio . Tio hemo halapu moo̒ sakusi li Isa mohutu u moo̒linggolabe .
42023009	Sababu uito tei Herodes heloo̒woli mao̒ dadaata yiyintu ode o-Lio , boti Isa diila pee̒enta mao̒ lolameto .
42023010	Mongo iimamu tau̒wa wau guguu-ruwaalo agama lotaalua olo teto wau helo potulude wolo moo̒ohuu̒ li Isa .
42023011	Tei Herodes wau mongo pongowaa̒ lo suludadulio helo poitohe wau lohina li Isa , lapatao̒ pilakealio Tio boo̒ odudaa̒ , lapatao̒ luli yilaolio Tio odelei Pilatus .
42023012	To dulahulo boito tei Herodes wolei Pilatus , tou̒ muloololio mai mumuusua , maluli lotamania . "
42023013	Tei Pilatus malongambu mongo iimamu tau̒wa , mongo tau̒wa , wau ulipu ,
42023014	lapatao̒ loloi̒ya mao̒ olimongolio , " Timongoli malodelo mai tau botie ode olau̒ wau loloi̒ya deu̒ Tio helo poo̒lapalo totau-tauwalo . Botia totalu limongoli wau̒ malo malakisa o-Lio , bo wau̒ sama-samaata diila loo̒tapu u moleeto penu bo tuwau mao̒ u hepotuludi mongoli o-Lio .
42023015	Odito olo huhama lei Herodes , sababu tio olo maluli lolao mai li Isa boito ode olami . Tau botie diila helohutu penu bo tuwau mao̒ upaatuti pohukuu-maniyalo o-Lio wolo hukumani mate .
42023016	Sababu uito wau̒ mamo muboa̒a o-Lio , tulusi mopoluli mao̒ o-Lio . " [
42023017	Totimii̒du lameyangi lo Paska , tei Pilatus musi mopobebasi ngotaalio lotutupa ode ulipu . ]
42023018	Ngoa̒amila tahia̒mbua teto longuatio̒ , " Pateyalo Tio mate-mateelo mao̒ ! Bebasia mao̒ tei Barabas olami ! " (
42023019	Tei Barabas tiluwotio ode tutupa sababu polomalakala ulowali tokota wau sababu polomatea yila-yilatelo mao̒ . )
42023020	Tei Pilatus ohilaa mopoluli mao̒ li Isa , sababu uito tio luli lobisala pee̒entapo totaa dadaata boito .
42023021	Bo timongolio longuatio̒ , " Salipua Tio , salipua Tio ! "
42023022	Lapatao̒ u otolulio tei Pilatus longibode olimongolio , " Bo wolo totalaa-Lio ? Wau̒ diila loo̒tapu penu boli tuwau mao̒ totala to o-Lio upaatuti pohukuu-maniyola o-Lio hukumani mate ! Wau̒ mamo muboa̒a o-Lio tulusi mopoluli mao̒ o-Lio . "
42023023	Bo timongolio tulusi hiwatia̒ lodaa̒-daa̒alo mao̒ deu̒ ti Isa musi salipuolo . Wau pulitio mao̒ wuwaatii̒ mongolio lomata .
42023024	Yi tei Pilatus malo podehu hukumani mate li Isa loduduo̒ utohilaa lotaa dadaata boito ,
42023025	wau lopoluli taa u pilohile limongolio , deu̒ito-yito taa u tiluwotio ode tutupa sababu polo molakala wau polomatea yila-yilatelo mao̒ . Lapatao̒ ti Isa yiludulio ode limongolio u lololimo totoonulalo u otohilaa pohutuo limongolio o-Lio .
42023026	Yi ti Isa madilelo limongolio . Tohuungo dalalo , timongolio lodunggaya wolo ngotaalio tai̒lunte Simon , u asaliilio mai lonto Kirene , tadonggo tuwo-tuwotai ode kota . Timongolio loheu̒pa olio , tulusi lomakusa olio lomota ayu salipu boito to wulea li Isa .
42023027	Dadaata taa tunu-tunuhe towulea li Isa -- to wolotalio woluo olo dengolo lota mongobua . Mongobua boito hehiyonga wau hipo hilimutawa li Isa .
42023028	Boti Isa malomilohe ode limongolio wau lotahuda mao̒ , " Mongobua lo Yerusalemu ! Diila mao̒ hiyongi Wau̒ . Hiyongilo mola batangamu lohihilao wau mongo walau̒mu .
42023029	Sababu mamei dungga wakutuulio tau mamoloi̒ya , ' Donggo boli pae̒daalio mongobua tadiila pee̒enta mao̒ ilombodaa̒ , tadiila pee̒enta mao̒ owalao̒ wau diila pee̒enta mao̒ lopotutu lotau̒nge ! '
42023030	Tou̒ boitolo tau mamoloi̒ya to huhuu-iduwaalo , ' Deehilo mai ami ! ' Wau to huhuu-luduwalo , ' Tambulilo mai ami ! '
42023031	Sababu wonu to ayu udonggo hitumula , tau malohutu debo odelo utie , wolo poli u mapohutuo limongolio to ayu umalo hengu ! "
42023032	Woluo poli taduulota wewo -- duduulotalo tamoleeto -- tadilelo limongolio u hukuu-maniyola mate pee̒-pee̒enta woli Isa .
42023033	Tou̒ malei dungga mola totambati u ilunte " Bakakau , " timongolio malo salipu li Isa wolo taduulota tamoleeto boito -- ngotaalio to ambahu olowala wau ngotaalio poli to ambahu oloihi li Isa .
42023034	Tulusi ti Isa malodua̒ , " Paapa , ambunguwalo mai timongolio ! Diila otaawa limongolio wolo upilohutu limongolio . "
42023035	Pakeyangi li Isa hetila-tilayadio teto towolota limongolio wolo undi .
