Tau-tauwalo tahitihula teto sambela hibilohe , tulusi mongo tau̒wa lo Yahudi hipohentea̒ li Isa wolo loi̒ya , " Tio malo poa̒ahu taa wewo ; ntali botia Tio mopoa̒ahu batanga-Lio lohihilao , wonu Tio tutuulio tutu Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua tatilulaoto Allahu Taa̒ala ! "
42023036	Mongo pajule olo hemohentea̒ li Isa . Timongolio lonao̒ mai longohi angguru molotingo o-Lio
42023037	wau loloi̒ya , " Wonu Yio̒ olongia taulo Yahudi , poa̒ahuwalo lohihilao batanga-Mu ! "
42023038	Toitaato ayu salipu li Isa , tulatuladu tataa-heyaalo odie : " Tabotieelo Olongia Taulo Yahudi . "
42023039	Tala ngota lo tamoleeto tasilalipu teto hemohina li Isa . Tio loloi̒ya , " Yio̒ Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua , diila odito ? Nte , poa̒ahuwalo batanga-Mu wau ami ! "
42023040	Bo tamoleeto ngota poli lodini to tamaniilio boito , loi̒yaalio mao̒ , " Tingga yio̒ diila moohe to Allahu Taa̒ala ? Yio̒ pee̒-pee̒enta hilukuu-manilio mate debo odelo Tio .
42023041	Bo hukuu-maninto duulota memangi malo tuuu̒de wolo huhutuunto . Bo Tio sama-samaata diila ototala !
42023042	Tulusi tio loloi̒ya , " Isa , Eelai mai watia , wonu Ito meidungga mai odelo Olongia ! "
42023043	" Pomalacayalo , " tahuda mao̒ li Isa olio , " Dulahee botie yio̒ mapee̒-pee̒enta wola-U̒ to Pirdaus . "
42023044	Otanu dulahee totau̒ , mato lodulahu diila otinelio , wau ngoilanggubu lipu boito lowali lodio̒lomo daa̒ tunggula jamu tiga lolaango .
42023045	Lalante untaya-ntayanga todelomo Bele lo Eeya , lokaidingo duluo .
42023046	Tulusi ti Isa longuatia̒ wolo suala daa̒ , " Paapa ! Ode delomo uluu̒ li Paapa wuduo mola lo Watia batanga lo Watia ! " Tou̒ yilapato loloi̒ya odito , Tio yilate !
42023047	Tou̒ polowila lo pasukani loo̒onto wolo u mailowali , tio malomuji Allahu Taa̒ala . Tulusi tio loloi̒ya , " Otutu Tio diila ototala ! "
42023048	Taa dadaata talonao̒ mai odito u momilohe , loo̒onto mao̒ wolo u mailowali . Timongolio ngoa̒amila malo hualingo wolo hilaa ulee̒-lee̒e daa̒ .
42023049	Wau ngoa̒amila tamoo̒taawa woli Isa , tuwotuwoto mongobua talo dudua̒i o-Lio lonto Galilea , hitihula lonto u molamingo wau loo̒onto ngoa̒amilalo boito .
42023050	Woluo ngotaalio tai̒lunte Yusu , u asaliilio mai lonto kota Arimatea tolipu lo Yudea . Tio tau ngota mopiohu tahe hulumatio lotau , wau tadonggo hemohima wakutuulio Allahu Taa̒ala molumula momalenta odelo Olongia . Eleponu tio waito Mahakama lo Agama , tio diila akolo wolo putuusani wau huhutu lo mahakama boito .
42023051	
42023052	Tei Yusu botie lonao̒ mota lotaalua wolei Pilatus wau lohile alihu milate li Isa wohi mao̒ olio .
42023053	Lapatao̒ yilaahio milate li Isa lonto ayu salipu , tulusi tilaputio wolo latu lonto lenani . Lapatao̒ uito tio malopo balato li Isa todelomo kuubulu upilohutu todelomo huludu botu -- kuubulu boito diipo pee̒enta mao̒ pilomake .
42023054	Dulahu boito dulahu Jumaa̒ti ; wau dulahu Saabati wimbedeo̒ tumulalio .
42023055	Mongobua talonao̒ mai woli Isa lonto Galilea lodudua̒ olei Yusu wau lomilohe kuubulu boito . Timongolio olo loo̒onto woloolo mola milate li Isa pilopo balatio todelomo kuubulu .
42023056	Lapatao̒ timongolio malo hualingo tulusi lopodapato lamba-lamba wau yinulo moonu u polamahio tomilate li Isa . Todulahu Saabati , timongolio lohuheli lokalaja u loduduo butoo̒ lo agama .
42024001	Todulahu Ahadi , didimodupo daa̒ , mongobua boito lonao̒ ode kuubulu li Isa lodelo yilonta u mapilo dapato limongolio .
42024002	Tokuubulu ilodungga limongolio botu heu̒tio malo lilidu .
42024003	Tulusi timongolio tilumuwota mola ode delomo kuubulu boito , bo diila loo̒dungga milate li Isa teto .
42024004	Tou̒ timongolio hitihula teto wau lolingu hemo mikiilangi sua̒li boito , debolo taduulota wolo boo̒ hei̒nta-intawa tilimihulai totili limongolio .
42024005	Timongolio mailoohe daa̒ , lapatao̒ losujudu demola huta , sambela taduulota boito loloi̒ya mao̒ ode limongolio , " Yilongola timongoli hemo lolohe totaa tumutumulo towolota lotaa yilate ?
42024006	Diaaluo Tio teea . Tio malobongu ! Eelai mola wolo u mapilo tahuda-Lio olemu tou̒ Tio donggo to Galilea ,
42024007	deu̒ ' Walao̒ Manusia musi wuduolio totaa odusa , lapatao̒ salipuolio wau todulahe otolulio Tio mamobongu mai . ' "
42024008	Yi mongobua boito maloe̒ela mola tataa-heyaalo li Isa .
42024009	Tou̒ malo hualingai lonto kuubulu boito timongolio helo hungguli u lotuduo boito to tamopulaa tuwau lota rasulu wau ode ngoa̒amila tahidudua̒ wewolio .
42024010	Mongobua talo poo̒taa ngoa̒amilalo boito to tahidudua̒ li Isa , yito : ti Maria Mahadalena , ti Yohana wau ti Maria tiilo lei Yakobus wau mongobua wewolio tapee̒-pee̒enta woli mongolio .
42024011	Bo mongo rasulu boito hemo lantobu mongobua boito bo hipo hunggulia udiila pongalo aakali . Timongolio diila palacaya silita lo mongobua boito .
42024012	Bo tei Petrus malobongu wau tilumeteo̒ ode kuubulu . Sambela lotibunggu tio lohedupa mola ode delomo kuubulu , tulusi loo̒onto mola bo wambao̒ taputo u teto . Tei Petrus lolinggolabe daa̒ , tulusi lohualingo wolo dadaata yiyintu todelomo hilaalio tomimbihu wolo u mailowali .
42024013	To dulahulo boito , duulota tahidudua̒ li Isa donggo hinao̒wa ode kambungu tuwau u ilunte Emaus , tanu mopulaa tuwau lokilo lamingio lonto Yerusalemu .
42024014	Tou̒ hinao̒wa timongolio bibiisalawa pasali lou̒ totoonulalo polou̒tia u mailowali boito .
42024015	Tou̒ timongolio donggo bibiisalawa wau hipotuuloa̒ lo pikiilangi , ti Isa lohihilao leidungga mai wau lonao̒ pee̒-pee̒enta woli mongolio .
42024016	Timongolio loo̒onto li Isa , bo woluo hitua-tuawua u lohutu olimongolio diila loo̒onuhe o-Lio .
42024017	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Wolo u hebisala limongoli tohuungo dalalo botie ? " Timongolio malo huheli wolo baya suukali .
42024018	Tulusi ngotaalio limongolio , tai̒lunte Kleopas , lohintu mao̒ li Isa , " Mati Paaa̒ ngota-ngotaalo tau deli to Yerusalemu tadiila motota polou̒tia uilowali teto mola towoli-woli mai botie ? "
42024019	" Polou̒tia wolo ? " yilintu mao̒ li Isa . " Pasali uilowali woli Isa , talonto Najaret boito , " tametao̒ limongolio . " Tio Nabi . Tataahe-Lio wau huhutuu-Lio okawasa daa̒ -- mopio moduduo̒ huhama lo Allahu Taa̒ala meaalo moduduo̒ huhama lotaa ngoa̒amila .
42024020	Mongo iimamu tau̒wa wau mongo tau̒wa lo bangusanto malohudu o-Lio u hilukuu-manilio yila-yilaatelo mao̒ , wau timongolio loposalipu o-Lio !
42024021	Lebe-lebe pomao̒ hehalapuo lami deu̒ Tiolo tamamo lopato Isirai̒lu ! Wau dulahee botie dulahee otolulio anggadu sua̒li boito lotoduo mai .
42024022	Donggo poli , dengolo lota mongobua towolota lami malohutu olami iloohea . Didimodupo daa̒ timongolio ode kuubulu ,
42024023	bo diila loo̒dungga milate li Isa mola teto . Tulusi timongolio luli lohualingai wau loloi̒ya deu̒ timongolio maloo̒onto malai̒kati , wau mamaa-lai̒katiyalo boito loloi̒ya deu̒ ti Isa tumutumulo .
42024024	Dengolo lota tawolami tulusi lonao̒ ode kuubulu wau loo̒dungga mola deu̒ wolo uiloi̒ya lo mongobua boito memangi odito , bo timongolio diila loo̒onto li Isa . "
42024025	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ olimongolio , " Timongoli memangi mohulodu ! Mailaba pomboyongi mongoli u momalacaya ngoa̒amila u mailoi̒ya lomongo nabi !
42024026	Memangi Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua musi moo̒laasapo sikisa boito , bolo moo̒ toduo mai ololai-Io . "
42024027	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotombangao̒ olimongolio wolo u tulatuladu todelomo ngoilanggubu Kitabi tomimbihu batanga-Lio tumulalo mai monto bubuu-kuwaalo lei Musa wau bubuu-kuwaalo lomongo nabi .
42024028	Sambela uito timongolio mahe membideo̒ kambungu u hepatujuo limongolio . Ti Isa lotiwali debo odelo tao̒hilaa mopotolonga mola lononao̒-Lio ,
42024029	bo timongolio lolahangi o-Lio , " Potitolaapo totambati lamiaatia , " loi̒ya mao̒ limongolio o-Lio , " masaatia mabolo ngopee̒ mola hui wau mamo dio̒lomai olo . " Yi ti Isa tilumuwotao̒ u lotitihui totambati limongolio .
42024030	Tou̒ hihuloa̒a hipolamela pee̒-pee̒enta woli mongolio , ti Isa lohama roti , lolapali sukuru ode Allahu Taa̒ala , wau lomita-mitangao̒ roti boito wolo uluu̒-Lio , tulusi longohi mao̒ ode limongolio .
42024031	Lapatao̒ timongolio malongalati deu̒ tau boito ti Isa . Bo Tio mailooli to poomilohi mongolio .
42024032	Uali mongolio ngota timongota , " Memangi laasa lohilaanto debo odelo wali-walihuhu , tou̒ Tio hemobisala wolanto to huungo dalalo , wau helo tombango tuango Kitabi ode olanto ? "
42024033	To saaa̒tilo boito timongolio matilimihulo wau tulusi lohualinga ode Yerusalemu . Mola teto timongolio loo̒dungga tamopulaa tuwau lota tahidudua̒ li Isa donggo hia̒mbua wolo tawewolio .
42024034	Timongolio boito loloi̒ya , " Memangi otutu Eeya maluli tilumumulai ! Tio malopo bilohe batanga-Lio odelei Simon ! "
42024035	Duulota hidudua̒ li Isa taboheeli leidungga mai boito tulusi lohungguli mao̒ u mai̒lo laasawa limongolio tou̒ hinao̒wa , wau woloolo mola timongolio loo̒onuhe Eeya tosaaa̒ti Tio helo mita-mitanga roti .
42024036	Tou̒ timongolio donggo hemosilita , debolo ti Isa lohihilao matihu-tihula tohuungi mongolio wau lotahuda , " Salaamatilo timongoli ! "
42024037	Timongolio iloohea wau mailoohe , sababu helantobu limongolio loo̒onto lati .
42024038	Boti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Yilongola timongoli yiloohe ? Yilongola timongoli pilotoodei lou̒ molilimbuto todelomo hilaa limongoli ?
42024039	Bilohi uluu̒-U̒ wau bilohi oa̒atu-U̒ . Ototai mao̒ , deu̒ utie Wau̒ lohihilao ! Tontali mai wau poo̒tuota mao̒ , sababu lati diila otapu wau tulalo , odelo u iloontonga limongoli to ola-U̒ . "
42024040	Ti Isa lotahuda odito sambela hemo pobiloheo̒ uluu̒ wau oa̒a-Tio olimongolio .
42024041	Wau tou̒ timongolio debo donggo diipo palacaya , sababu malo odito wengahu wau linggolabu , ti Isa malohintu olimongolio , " Wolo timongoli o ua̒alo tewe ? "
42024042	Timongolio malongohi mao̒ o-Lio uponula tilinanga ngoputu .
42024043	Ti Isa malohama uponula boito , lapatao̒ lolamela totalu limongolio .
42024044	Lapatao̒ uito Tio lotahuda mao̒ olimongolio , " Utieelo susuu-aliyaalo umaa piloo̒taa-U̒ mai olimongoli tou̒ Wau̒ donggo pee̒-pee̒enta woli mongoli ; deu̒ timii̒du sua̒li u tulatuladu tomimbihu tanggulu-U̒ todelomo Bubuu-kuwaalo lei Musa , lomongo Nabi , wau Jaburu , musi motoduo mai . "
42024045	Lapatao̒ ti Isa malomuo̒ pikiilangi limongolio alihu mongalati makusudu lo Kitabi .
42024046	Tulusi Tio lotahuda mao̒ ode limongolio , " Todelomo Kitabi tulatuladu deu̒ Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua musi modutolo wau musi muli mobongu mai monto opopate todulahee otolulio .
42024047	Wau olo deu̒ to tanggulo Olongia Tamoo-poaahua boito mamusi pololadulo to ngoa̒amilalo bangusa deu̒ manusia musi molilihu , wau deu̒ Allahu Taa̒ala mongambungu dusa . Wau habari boito musi pololadulo tumula mai to Yerusalemu .
42024048	Matimo-timongolilo tamowali sakusi tou̒ ngoa̒amilalo boito .
42024049	Wau Wau̒ lohihilao mamolao mai olemu wolo u madilanti lo Allahu Taa̒ala . Bo timongoli musi debo mohima tokota botie tunggula kawasa monto Allahu Taa̒ala mohenggubei olimongoli . "
42024050	Lapatao̒ uito ti Isa lodelo olimongolio ode bulemengo kota demola Betania . Teto Tio lomintaa̒ mola uluu̒-Lio , tulusi lobalakati olimongolio .
42024051	Tou̒ tio donggo hemohutu uito , Tio bilintai̒o ode sologa , tulusi lobua̒ala woli mongolio .
42024052	Timongolio losujudu lolubo olio , lapatao̒ lohualinga ode Yerusalemu wolo hilao leengahe daa̒ ,
42024053	wau molo laalaaita hemo muji boli puji to Allahu Taa̒ala to Bele lo Eeya .
43001001	Tobohulio , tou̒ diipo dunia pilowali mai , Tahuda boito mailoluo . Tahuda woluo pee̒-pee̒enta wolo Allahu Taa̒ala . Wau Tahuda tutuuwauwa wolo Allahu Taa̒ala .
43001002	Tumulalo bohulio mai Tio pee̒-pee̒enta wolo Allahu Taa̒ala .
43001003	Ngoa̒amilalo pilowali mai lotimbulude o-Lio , wau monto ngoa̒amilalo uwoluo diaaluo mao̒ penu boli tuwau u pilowali mai wonu diila monto o-Lio .
43001004	Tahuda boito bungo lo tutumulo , wau tutumulo boito mongohi mai tilango tomanusia .
43001005	Tilango boito tinetinelo tou̒ modio̒lomo , wau modio̒lomo diila mowali momate tilango boito .
43001006	Dungga-dunggalo mai tailao lo Allahu Taa̒ala , tei Yahya tanggulio .
43001007	Tio lonao̒ mai lopo habari pasali lotilango boito , alihu ngoa̒amila tau palacaya .
43001008	Tio lohihilao diila tilango boito , tio bo mopo habari mai uito .
43001009	Tilango ututuulio tutu u mopo baangai ngoa̒amila tau dungga mai ode dunia .
43001010	Tahuda woluo todunia , dunia pilowali mai lotimbulude o-Lio , bo dunia diila moo̒onuhe o-Lio .
43001011	Tio dungga-dungga mai odelipu-Lio lohihilao bo bangusaa-Lio diila mololimo o-Lio .
43001012	Penu boli odito debo woluo olo talo lolimo o-Lio wau palacaya o-Lio : timongolio yilohia-Lio haku lowali Walao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala ,
43001013	tapilo tutulio mai diila lonto manusia , sababu tutumula bohu boito lonto Allahu Taa̒ala asaliilio .
43001014	Tahuda malowali manusia , Tio bilubiluloa̒ to wolotanto , wau ito maloo̒onto odudaa̒-Lio . Odudaa̒ boito tilolimo-Lio odelo Walao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala tatuwa-tuwaulo . Lotimbulude o-Lio ito maloo̒onto Allahu Taa̒ala wau ponu-Lio ode olanto .
43001015	Tei Yahya lonao̒ mai odelo sakusii-Lio , tio lopo habari : " Tabotieelo Tio tailoi̒yaau̒ : Tio mamei dungga meimulo wolau̒ , bo lebe mao̒ udaa̒ wolau̒ , sababu tou̒ wau̒ dipoolu , tio mailoluo . "
43001016	Tio polupolu loponu : diila ohuheli-Lio , Tio mobalakati olanto .
43001017	Butoo̒ Eeya tilolimonto lotimbulude olei Musa . Bo ponu wau otatapu wau olootolo hilao lo Allahu Taa̒ala piloi̒laalo lotimbulude li Isa Almasi .
43001018	Diaaluo tapee̒enta mao̒ loo̒onto Allahu Taa̒ala , ngopohia Walao̒ tuwa-tuwaulo lo Allahu Taa̒ala , u tutuuwauwa wolo Allahu Taa̒ala wau mohulanga daa̒ wo-Lio . Tiolo talo poi̒laalo mai Allahu Taa̒ala to olanto .
43001019	Tahidihima kawasa lo Yahudi to Yerusalemu lopoa̒hu mongo iimamu wau tau-tauwalo Lewi lonao̒ odelei Yahya wau lohintu olio , " Yio̒ botie tatoonu ? "
43001020	Tei Yahya malongaku wolo juujulu , " Watia diila Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua . "
43001021	" Wonu odito , tatoonu yio̒ ? " yilintu mao̒ limongolio . " Wolo yio̒ tei Elia ? " " Diila , " tametao̒ lei Yahya . " Wolo yio̒ Nabi ? " yilintu mao̒ limongolio poli . " Diila , " tametio mao̒ .
43001022	" Wonu odito , poleleaalo mai olami tatoonu yio̒ botie , " uali mongolio , " alihu ami moo̒ tametao̒ totau-tauwalo talo poa̒hu mai olami . Wolo u heloi̒yamu tomimbihu batangamu lohihilao ? "
43001023	Tei Yahya lolametao̒ , " Watiaalo tio tailoi̒ya li Nabi Yesaya : ' Taa u hemo ngiibode tohuta hungayo u luasi daa̒ : Popayade mao̒ dalalo ode Eeya . ' "
43001024	Tau-tauwalo tailao mai taulo Parisi
43001025	malohintu , " Wonu yio̒ diila Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua , diila tei Elia , diila olo nabi , yilongola yio̒ hemo polihu ? "
43001026	Tei Yahya lolametao̒ , " Watia mopolihu wolo taluhu . Bo tohuungi mongoli woluo taa diila oonuhe limongoli .
43001027	Tio meidungga mai lapatio mao̒ lowatia , bo u mongua̒deo̒ tali losapatu-Lio watia diila paatuti . "
43001028	Ngoa̒amilalo boito lotoduo to Betania , to ambahu Tiimuru lo Dutula Yordan tambati hepopo lihua lei Yahya .
43001029	Loloombulio mola , tei Yahya loo̒onto li Isa lonao̒ mai ode olio . Tulusi tei Yahya loloi̒ya mao̒ , " Bilohi , boi-boitolo Walao̒ Himba lo Allahu Taa̒ala tamo luluto dusa lodunia .
43001030	Tioolo taheloi̒ya laatia mamei dungga mai lapatio mao̒ laatia , bo lebe udaa̒ wolaatia , sababu tou̒ watia diipo pilotutulio mai , Tio mawoluo .
43001031	Tou̒ dipolulio mai , diila otaawa laatia tatoonu Tio boito . Lebe-lebe pomao̒ watia lonao̒ mai mopolihu wolo taluhu alihu bangusa lo Isirai̒lu moo̒onuheo̒ o-Lio . "
43001032	Tei Yahya olo longohi sakusi odie , " Watia loo̒onto Rohullah lotuhutai debo odelo poombo lonto hulungo lapatao̒ lotitolaa toitaa-Tio .
43001033	Tou̒ boito diipo otaawa laatia tatoonu Tio . Bo Allahu Taa̒ala talo poa̒hu mai olaatia mopolihu wolo taluhu malo tahuda olaatia , ' Wonu yio̒ moo̒onto Rohullah motuhutai , lapatao̒ motitolaa toitaato lo ngotaalio , yi Tioolo tamamo polihu wolo Rohullah . '
43001034	Watia lohihilao maloo̒onto o-Lio , " ualei Yahya , " wau watia mongohi mai sakusi deu̒ Tioolo Walao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala . "
43001035	Loloombulio mola tei Yahya woluo totambati boito poli wolo taduulota murilio .
43001036	Tou̒ tio loo̒onto li Isa yilumaodeo̒ , tio maloloi̒ya , " Bilohi ! Tioolo Walao̒ Himba lo Allahu Taa̒ala . "
43001037	Taduulota muri lei Yahya loo̒dungohe loi̒ya boito , tulusi lonao̒ lodudua̒ li Isa .
43001038	Ti Isa loili ode wulea , wau loo̒onto olimongolio donggo hidudua̒ o-Lio . Tio malohintu mao̒ , " timongoli hemo lolohe olita ? " Tametao̒ limongolio , " Rabbi , tou̒toonu biluloa̒ li Rabbi ? " ( ' Rabbi ' boliilio mao̒ guru ) .
43001039	" Dulo mai bilohi lohihilao , " tahuda mao̒ li Isa . Timongolio malonao̒ wo-Lio wau mota lomilohe tou̒toonu piloti biluloa̒-Lio . Wakutu boito jamu ampa lolaango . Todulahu boito timongolio lotibiluloa̒ wo-Lio .
43001040	Tala ngota lo taduulota tamaloo̒ dungohe wolo uiloi̒ya lei Yahya wau lapatao̒ lonao̒ lodudua̒ li Isa , deu̒ito-yito tei Andreas , wutatio lei Simon Petrus .
43001041	Lolamemetao̒ tei Andreas lololohe olei Simon , wutatio , wau loloi̒ya olio , " Ami malo dunggaya woli Mesiasi ! " ( Mesiasi tutuuwauwa woli Almasi , deu̒ito-yito : Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua ) .
43001042	Tei Andreas malo depita mota olei Simon odeli Isa . Ti Isa lolontonga olei Simon , lapatao̒ lotahuda mao̒ , " yio̒ Simon , walae̒e Yona , yio̒ maunteelo Kepas . " ( Kepas tutuuwauwa wolei Petrus , bolilio mao̒ : hui̒dee botu . )
43001043	Loloombulio mola ti Isa lolantu mao̒ u monao̒ ode Galilea . Tio lodunggaya wolei Pilipus wau lotahuda mao̒ olio , " Dulo dudui̒ mai Wau̒ ! "
43001044	Tei Pilipus asaliilio lonto Betsaida , deu̒ito-yito tambati piloti biluloa̒ lei Andreas wau lei Petrus .
43001045	Tei Pilipus lodunggaya wolei Natanael wau loloi̒ya mao̒ olio , " Ami maloo̒ dungga tahe untee lei Musa todelomo Buku Butoo̒ lo Allahu Taa̒ala , wau tapilo habari mai lomongo nabi . Tio boito ti Isa talonto Najaret , Walae̒e Yusu . "
43001046	Bo tei Natanael lolametao̒ , " Wolo pongalo aakali hitua-tuawua umopiohe meidungga mai monto Najaret ? " Dulo mai bilohi lohihilao tametao̒ lei Pilipus .
43001047	Ti Isa loo̒onto olei Natanael lonao̒ mai , lapatao̒ loloi̒ya pasali olio , " Bilohi , uito taulo Isirai̒lu ututuulio tutu ! Diaaluo mao̒ upaluti to olio . "
43001048	" Woloolo mola ti Paaa̒ moo̒onuhe olaatia ? " yilintu mao̒ lei Natanael li Isa . Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Tou̒ tei Pilipus diipo lotianga olemu , Wau̒ maloo̒onto olemu towalungo bungo lo ara boito . "
43001049	" Paaa̒ Guru , " loi̒ya mao̒ lei Natanael , " ti Paaa̒ yito Walao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala ! Ti Paaa̒alo Olongia bangusa lo Isirai̒lu ! "
43001050	Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Yio̒ palacaya , bo sababu Wau̒ loloi̒ya mai deu̒ Wau̒ maloo̒onto olemu towalungo bungo lo ara boito ? Susuu-aliyaala ulebe udaa̒ mao̒ tutu woleeto mao̒ontongamu ! "
43001051	Uali Isa poli , " Otutu , pomalacayalo , yio̒ mamoo̒onto mola hulungo mohuo̒ , wau mamaa-lai̒katiyala lo Allahu Taa̒ala laahe bootula to Walao̒ Manusia . "
43002001	Duuhui mola lapatio mao̒ woluo potihunggu lonika tokota Kana to Galilea , wau tiilo li Isa woluo mola teto .
43002002	Ti Isa wolo tahidudua̒ o-Lio tiloduwolio olo ode potihunggu boito .
43002003	Tou̒ angguru malo pulito , tiilo-Lio loloi̒ya mao̒ odeli Isa , " Timongolio mai̒lo pulita lo angguru . "
43002004	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Maama , diila mao̒ ahuli Watia . Diipo leidungga wakutuulio Watia mopoi̒laalo batanga . "
43002005	Bo tiilo li Isa loloi̒ya mao̒ to tahi pohintawa , " Wambao̒ pohutuwalo wolo u mapilo tahuda-Lio olemu . "
43002006	Teto woluo mohelu wolomo tombe upilohetu odelo tambati pongulowalo modudua̒ uu̒udu lo Yahudi . Timii̒du tombe boito tuangio tanu ngohetuto liiteri .
43002007	Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ to tahi pohintawa boito , " Tuangi mao̒ timii̒du tombe boito wolo taluhu . " Yi matiluanga limongolio tombe boito tunggula lopolu .
43002008	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ ode limongolio , " Botia hamaawa mao̒ taluhu boito ngoi̒di wau delowa mai ode tau̒wa lo potihunggu . Timongolio malodelo taluhu boito ode tau̒wa lo potihunggu . "
43002009	Wau tio lolamitao̒ taluhu umalo bolio̒ lowali angguru . ( Diila otaawalio lonto utoonu angguru boito , bo tahi pohintawa talo luango taluhu boito tamotota ) . Yi tau̒wa lo potihunggu boito lohimbideo̒ ode bulentiti talolai ,
43002010	tulusi lotahuda mao̒ olio , " Biasaalio tau mopo hintapo angguru umopiohe daa̒ meimulo wau wonu tahe tiloduo malotolu longilu , deu̒ito angguru ubiasa . Bo Wutato lolahu angguru u mopiohe daa̒ tunggula botia ! "
43002011	Ui-uitolo bohulo moo̒linggolabe u pilohutu li Isa . Tio lohutu uito to Kana to Galilea . Wolo tuoto boito Tio lopobilohe odudaa̒-Lio . Yi tahidudua̒ o-Lio palacaya o-Lio .
43002012	Lapatao̒ uito ti Isa lonao̒ mola ode Kapernaum pee̒-pee̒enta woliilo-Lio , mongo wuta-Tio wau tahidudua̒ o-Lio . Timongolio lotibiluloa̒ mola teto dengolo hui mola hiheolio .
43002013	Tou̒ Dulahu Buka Paska lo Yahudi malembidei , ti Isa lonao̒ mola ode Yerusalemu .
43002014	To Bele lo Eeya to Yerusalemu Tio loo̒dungga tahe mopotaalia losapi , himba , wau bulungi poombo ; wau olo tahipo tutuuloa̒ lodoi hihuloa̒ teto .
43002015	Ti Isa lohutu mao̒ buuboa̒ ngohuu̒ lonto tali tulusi lolanenga ngoa̒amila binatangi boito , himba wau sapi , lonto delomo Bele lo Eeya . Memee-jawaalo lotaa hipo tutuuloa̒ lodoi hebilantulele-Ngio tilinggula doi limongolio lo pupuulepelo mao̒ .
43002016	Lapatao̒ Tio lotahuda mao̒ ode tahe mopotaalia lo bulungi poombo , " Bintaa̒alo ngoa̒amilalo monteea . Diila mao̒ pohutua Bele li Paapa-U̒ tambati podaa-hangiyalo ! "
43002017	Yi tahidudua̒ o-Lio maloe̒ela mola ayati lo Kitabi botie . " Tolia̒ngu-U̒ duo̒lo Bele lo Eeya , yaa Allahu Taa̒ala , molumbila hilaa-U̒ . "
43002018	Tahidihima kawasa lo Yahudi helo tehengi li Isa , uali mongolio , " Nte pohutua mai u moo̒linggolabe odelo tuoto olami deu̒ yio̒ ohaku mohutu mao̒ debo odelo utie . "
43002019	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Lolohubelo Bele botie , wau todelomo utolo hui mola Wau̒ mamuli momongu mao̒ . "
43002020	Lapatao̒ timongolio loloi̒ya , " Wopato pulaa wolomo lotaunu upilo mongulalio Bele lo Eeya botie . Wau Yio̒ mamuli momongu bo todelomo utolo hui ? "
43002021	Bo Bele lo Eeya u milakusudu li Isa yito batanga-Lio lohihilao .
43002022	Oditolio lapatio mao̒ , tou̒ ti Isa bilongu mai monto opopate , mai̒loe̒ela mola lo tahidudua̒ o-Lio deu̒ sua̒li boito mapee̒enta pilotahuda-Lio . Yi malo malacaya timongolio tou̒ wolo u tulatuladu todelomo Kitabi wau tou̒ wolo u tilahuda li Isa .
43002023	Tou̒ ti Isa donggo to Yerusalemu tou̒ Lameyangi lo Paska , dadaata taa palacaya o-Lio sababu ngoa̒amila moo̒linggolabe u hepilohutu-Lio .
43002024	Boti Isa lohihilao diila palacaya olimongolio , sababu oonuhe-Lio ngoa̒amila tau .
43002025	Diila palalu tau mongohi tombango to o-Lio pasali penu boli olo tatoonu wambao̒ , sababu otaawa-Lio lohihilao wolo uwoluo todelomo hilaa lomanusia .
43003001	Woluo ngotaalio tao̒tanggulo to agama towimbihu taulo Parisi tai̒lunte Nikodemus .
43003002	Tou̒ huilio tuwau tio lonao̒ mai odeli Isa wau loloi̒ya mao̒ , " Paaa̒ Guru , otaawa lamiaatia ti Paaa̒ tailao mai lo Allahu Taa̒ala . Sababu diaaluo penu boli ngotaa mao̒ tamowali mohutu u moo̒linggolabe debo odelo upilohutu li Paaa̒ , Wonu Allahu Taa̒ala diila wolio . "
43003003	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Pomalacayalo , diaaluo penu boli ngotaa mao̒ tamowali pongawaa̒ umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala , wonu tio diila muli potutuolio mai . "
43003004	" Diila pongalo aakali tamaa iludaa̒ muli potutuolio mai , " loi̒ya mao̒ lei Nikodemus odeli Isa , " Tingga mowali tio muli tumuwoto ode delomo talomo liilolio wau muli pututuolio mai ? "
43003005	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Otutu banali tahuda-U̒ botie : Wonu tau diila potutuolio mai monto taluhu wau monto Rohullah , tau boito diila mowali pongawaa̒ umati lo Allahu Taa̒ala .
43003006	Manusia odelo pohuli lotapu pilotutu mai lomongo dulaa̒lio , bo odelo pohuli lorohani pilotutu mai lo Rohullah .
43003007	Diila mao̒ polinggolabu wonu Wau̒ motahuda mai : timongoli ngoa̒amila paatuti muli potutuolio mai .
43003008	Dupoto mohiipo deu̒toonu otohilaalio ; ito moo̒dungohe tingohio , bo diila otaawanto monto utoonu dudunggaalio mai wau deu̒toonu dulungio . Odito olo wolo taa potutuo mai lo Rohullah . "
43003009	" Woloolo mola uito mowali motoduo mai ? " yilintu lei Nikodemus .
43003010	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Yio̒ Guru lo agama to Isirai̒lu ; diila pongalo aakali diila otaawamu ?
43003011	Pomalacayalo ; ami mobisala bo tomimbihu wolo u otaawa lami , wau ami mongohi sakusi bo tomimbihu wolo umaa iloontonga lami ; bo timongoli diila mohuto mololimo u silakusia lami .
43003012	Timongoli diila palacaya wonu Wau̒ mohungguli mai olimongoli pasali susuu-aliyaala lodunia botie ; woloolo mola timongoli mowali palacaya , wonu Wau̒ mohungguli mai olimongoli pasali lo sologa ?
43003013	Diaaluo penu boli ngotaa tapee̒enta mao̒ lobotula mola ode sologa , ngopohia Tio tamalo laahei ode dunia , deu̒ito-yito Walao̒ Manusia .
43003014	Tutuuwauwa debo odelo tei Musa malopo botula mola tulidu tombaha tobatango ayu ngoputu tohuta datahu u luasi daa̒ wau delita , odito olo Walao̒ Manusia paatuti pobotulolo ,
43003015	alihu ngoa̒amila taa palacaya o-Lio moo̒tapu tutumulo ututuulio tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ . "
43003016	Sababu Allahu Taa̒ala odito momonu mai manusia todunia botie , tilinggula Allahu Taa̒ala longohi mai Wala-I̒o tatuwa-tuwaulo , alihu timii̒du taa palacaya o-Lio diila binasa , bo moo̒tapu tutumulo ututuulio tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ .
43003017	Sababu Allahu Taa̒ala lolao Wala-I̒o diila mai momutoo̒ dunia botie , bo mai mopoa̒ahu mao̒ .
43003018	Taa palacaya o-Lio diila hukuu-maniyola . Bo taa diila palacaya mahi lukuumani lo Allahu Taa̒ala , sababu tio diila palacaya to Walao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala tatuwa-tuwaulo .
43003019	Tio pilohile moo̒ohuu̒ dadaasali tosua̒li botie ; Tilango boito malei dungga mai ode dunia , bo manusia lebe motohilaa u modio̒lomo wolo u mobaango , sababu huhutu limongolio moleeto .
43003020	Timii̒du taa hipohutua u moleeto , molonuo̒ u mobaango ; tio diila motohilaa u mobaango , alihu huhutuulio u moleeto diila oontonga .
43003021	Bo taa u hipohutua kahandaki lo Allahu Taa̒ala monao̒ mai ode mobaango alihu mowali moi̒laalo deu̒ wolo u pilohutulio boito yito modudua̒ kahandaki lo Allahu Taa̒ala .
43003022	Lapatao̒ uito ti Isa wau tahidudua̒ o-Lio malonao̒ ode Yudea . Tio lotitolaa mola teto dengolo wakutu hiheolio woli mongolio wau helo polihu tau .
43003023	Tou̒ boito tei Yahya diipo tilumuwoto ode tutupa . Tio helo polihu to Ainom , diila molamingo monto Salim , sababu mola teto dadaata taluhu . Tau-tauwalo helonao̒ mai ode olio , wau tio lopolihu olimongolio .
43003024	
43003025	Dengolo lota tahidudua̒ olei Yahya helo haamawa wolo taulo Yahudi pasali lowuu̒du u mopoo̒ belesi .
43003026	Timongolio lonao̒ mota odelei Yahya , wau loloi̒ya mao̒ , " Paaa̒ Guru , wolo donggo oe̒ela mola li Paaa̒ tapee̒-pee̒enta woli Paaa̒ to ngotuwali lo Dutulaa Yordan boito , tou̒ boito pilotunu mai li Paaa̒ olamiaatia omoo̒molu ? Tio masaatia olo hemo polihu , wau ngoa̒amila tau hiponao̒wa ode o-Lio ! "
43003027	Tei Yahya lolametao̒ , " Manusia diila mowali owolo-wolo wonu tio diila wohia mai lo Allahu Taa̒ala .
43003028	Timongoli lohihilao maloo̒ dungohe olaatia loloi̒ya mai , ' Watia diila Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua . Watia ilutolia leimulo mai wo-Lio . '
43003029	Bulentiti taabua yito hakuulio libulentiti talolai̒ . Sahabati libulentiti talolai̒ boito wambao̒ tihutihula totili wau modungohe , wau tio sanangi wonu modungohe suala libulentiti talolai̒ . Odito olo wolaatia . Masaatia watia sanangi daa̒ .
43003030	Tioolo tamusi helebe polohuna daa̒ , wau watia diila boti polohuna daa̒ . "
43003031	Tadungga-dungga mai monto yitaato mongilabotao̒ lou̒ ngoa̒amilalo . Tadungga-dungga mai monto dunia , meituwoto tau lodunia , wau mobisala pasali lodunia . Tio tadungga-dungga mai monto yitaato mongilabotao̒ lou̒ ngoa̒amilalo .
43003032	Tio mobisala tomimbihu wolo umaa iloontonga wau ilodungohe-Lio , bo diaaluo penu boli ngotaa mao̒ tapalacaya tou̒ silakusia-Lio .
43003033	Taa palacaya tou̒ silakusia-Lio boito , motolongaku mao̒ deu̒ Allahu Taa̒ala banali .
43003034	Sababu taa uilao mai lo Allahu Taa̒ala mopo tunggulai tataa-heyaalo Allahu Taa̒ala , sababu Rohullah mailohi ode o-Lio lealeaatulo mao̒ .
43003035	Allahu Taa̒ala momonu Wala-I̒o , wau malohudu totoonulalo kawasa to o-Lio .
43003036	Taa palacaya to Walao̒ boito mamoo̒tapu tutumulo ututuulio tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ . Bo taa diila modungohe to Walao̒ boito diila moo̒tapu tutumulo . Tio hukuumanio lo Allahu Taa̒ala u ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ .
43004001	Tau-tauwalo Parisi loo̒dungohe deu̒ ti Isa loo̒tapu wau helo polihu lebe dadaata mao̒ muri wolei Yahya . (
43004002	Otutuulio mao̒ ti Isa lohihilao diila lopolihu bo tahidudua̒ o-Lio wambao̒ . )
43004003	Tou̒ ilotaawa li Isa deu̒ tau-tauwalo Parisi maloo̒ dungohu pasali losua̒li boito , Tio malo monggato lonto Yudea lohualinga ode Galilea .
43004004	Todelomo nonao̒o-Lio boito Tio musi lumaodeo̒ to Samaria .
43004005	Yi malei dungga ti Isa tokota tuwau to Samaria u iluntee Sikhar , diila molaminga monto huta u muloololio mai yilohi lei Yako odelei Yusu walai̒o .
43004006	Mota teto woluo ali lei Yako . Ti Isa moongolo daa̒ sababu nonao̒o-Lio boito , sababu uito Tio lotihuloa̒a tobiihu ali . Tou̒ boito otanu dulahu matotau̒ ,
43004007	wau tahidudua̒ li Isa malonao̒ ode kota mota lotali mai ua̒alo . Lapatao̒ taabua ngota lo Samaria mai lolime taluhu . Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ olio , " Ibu , mowali Watia mohile taluhu uilumolo ? "
43004008	
43004009	Taabua lo Samaria boito lolametao̒ , " Ti Tuani taulo Yahudi , wau watia taulo Samaria ; yilongola ti Tuani mohile uilumolo monto olaatia ? " ( Sababu tau-tauwalo Yahudi diila owumbuta wolo taulo Samaria ) .
43004010	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Humayaalio otaawamu wowohi mai lo Allahu Taa̒ala wau tatoonu talohile taluhu olemu , tantuulo mao̒ yio̒ lohihilao tamohile uilumolo to o-Lio , wau Tio mamongohi mai olemu taluhu lo tutumulo . "
43004011	Loi̒ya mao̒ lotaabua boito , " Ti Tuani diila otuuntu , wau ali botie modeloma daa̒ . Monto utoonu ti Tuani moo̒tapu mai taluhee lo tutumulo ?
43004012	Tei Yako , tipaapa loluuhuru lamiaatia , longohi mai ali botie . Tio lohihilao malohama taluhu yililumio lonteea ; odito olo mongo walai̒o wau binatangi bibiaahio . Wolo tolantobu li Tuani deu̒ ti Tuani talebe udaa̒ wolei Yako ? "
43004013	" Taa mongilu taluhu botie mamuli mototoa̒ngo , " tahuda mao̒ li Isa ,
43004014	" bo taa mongilu taluhu u mawohi-U̒ mai madiilalo mototoa̒ngo poli ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ . Sababu tahulu u mawohi-U̒ boito mamowali mato lotaluhu todelomo batangalio u mopentelai ode bulemengio wau mongohi olio tutumulo ututuulio tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ . "
43004015	Loi̒ya mao̒ lotaabua boito . " Tuani wohiyalo mai taluhu boito olaatia alihu watia diilalo mototoa̒ngo ; wau watia diilalo palalu mohualingai odia mai mohama taluhu . "
43004016	" Ponao̒lo , mota tianga mai dilemu , lapatao̒ muli pohualingai , " tahuda mao̒ li Isa .
43004017	" Watia diila odile , " tametao̒ lotaabua boito . " Memangi otutu loi̒yamu , " tahuda li Isa ,
43004018	" Sababu yio̒ mapoo̒olimo lonika , wau talolai̒ tatumu-tumulo wolemu botia diila dilemu . "
43004019	" Botia mai̒lotaawa lowatia ti Tuani nabi ngota , " loi̒ya lotaabua boito .
43004020	" Nenemoya lamiaatia helolubo Allahu Taa̒ala tohuludu botie , bo bangusa li Tuani malo loi̒ya deu̒ bo to Yerusalemu wambao̒ tambatilio polubowa lotau to Allahu Taa̒ala . "
43004021	" Pomalacayalo , " tahuda li Isa olio , " Tosaaa̒ti tuwau tau mamolubo Allahu Taa̒ala , diilalo tohuludu botie wau diila olo to Yerusalemu .
43004022	Timongoli taulo Samaria hipolubowa tadiila otaawa limongoli , hiambola ami taulo Yahudi hemolubo o-Lio tao̒taawa lami , sababu osalaamati dudunggaalio mai monto taulo Yahudi .
43004023	Bo wakutuulio mamei dungga , tumbao̒ malei dungga mai , deu̒ wolo kawasa lo Rohullah tau-tauwalo mamolubo li Paapa odelo Allahu Taa̒ala tabanali debo odelo u otohilaa li Paapa .
43004024	Sababu Allahu Taa̒ala boito Rohu , wau bo wolo kawasa lo Rohullah tau-tauwalo moo̒tubo li Paapa odelo woloolo mola Tio woluo . "
43004025	Taabua boito loloi̒ya mao̒ li Isa . " Otaawa lowatia Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua ( tai̒lunte Almasi ) mamei dungga . Wonu Tio meidungga , Tio mamo poo̒taa totoonulalo u hitua-tuawua to olanto . "
43004026	" Wau̒lo Tio , " tahuda li Isa , " Wau̒ tabotia donggo hemo bisala wolemu . "
43004027	Tou̒ boito tahidudua̒ li Isa lohualingai . Timongolio lolinggolabu loo̒onto li Isa hemobisala wolo taabua ngota . Bo diaaluo penu boli ngotaa mao̒ limongolio talohintu totaabua boito , " Ti ibu palalu wolo ? " meaalo lohintu toli Isa , " Yilongola ti Paaa̒ hemobisala wolo taabua boito ? "
43004028	Yi taabua boito lololaa mao̒ tombelio teto lapatao̒ tilumeteo̒ ode kota wau loloi̒ya totau-tauwalo mola teto .
43004029	" Dulo mai bilohi talo poo̒taa mai olaatia totoonulalo hitua-tuawua u mapee̒enta pilohutu lowatia . Wolo otanu Tiolo boito Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua ? "
43004030	Yi tau-tauwala boito olo malo lolaa mao̒ kota tulusi lonao̒ odeli Isa .
43004031	Tou̒ boito tahidudua̒ o-Lio malo loduo li Isa lolamelo , " Paaa̒ Guru , " uali mongolio , " toduwolo molamelo . "
43004032	Boti Isa lolametao̒ , " Woluo ua̒alo to ola-U̒ , udiila otaawa limongoli . "
43004033	Yi tahidudua̒ o-Lio mahipo hihiintua , " Wolo woluo talodelo mai ua̒alo ode o-Lio ? "
43004034	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Ua̒alo-U̒ yito modudua̒ u otohilaa-Lio lo tamalolao mai ola-U̒ , wau mopoo̒ lapato kalaja uiludu-Lio mai ola-U̒ .
43004035	Timongoli hemoloi̒ya , ' Donggo wopato hula mola sembo pongotolaalo . ' Bo Wau̒ moloi̒ya mai olemu : Bilohi mota hahaa-laboluwalo u mahilalahe , dapadapato otololo :
43004036	Taa u mongotolo malo lumulao̒ hipo lolimoa wuupalio wau hipo himoa̒ tilapulio duo̒lo tumumulo ututuulio tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ . Yi taa u momua̒yadu wau taa u mongotolo mowali motisanangi pee̒-pe̒enta .
43004037	Lumadu botie otutu olo , ' Tangota mopomulo , tawewo mongotolo . '
43004038	Wau̒ mopoa̒hu olimongoli mota mongotolo to halabolu udiila tilolopani limongoli ; taawewo malo kalaja mola teto , wau timongoli tamololimo pae̒eda lokalaja limongolio . "
43004039	Dadaata taulo Samaria tuango kota boito palacaya li Isa , sababu taabua boito loloi̒ya , ' Tio lolele mai to olaatia totoonulalo hitua-hituawua u mapee̒enta pilohutu lowatia . '
43004040	Yi tou̒ tau-tauwalo Samaria boito lodunggaya woli Isa , timongolio lohile tio̒otutua alihu Tio motibiluloa̒ woli mongolio . Oditolio ti Isa malo tibiluloa̒ teto duuhui mola hiheolio .
43004041	Lapatao̒ lebe dadaata mao̒ poli taa palacaya li Isa sababu wolo u hepilo ngaajali-Lio lohihilao olimongolio .
43004042	Timongolio loloi̒ya mao̒ ode taabua boito , " Ami palacaya masaatia , diila bo kalena u pilolelemu mai olami , bo sababu ami lohihilao malo dungohe o-Lio , wau otaawa lami deu̒ Tio memangi Tamoo-poa̒ahua dunia . "
43004043	Lapatao̒ duuhui mola lotibiluloa̒ to Sikhar , ti Isa lonao̒ mola ode Galilea .
43004044	Ti Isa lohihilao malo tahuda , " Nabi ngota diila hulumatiolio to lipulio lohihilao . "
43004045	Bo tou̒ Tio leidungga mola ode Galilea , tau-tauwalo mola teto lolutulao̒ o-Lio wolo hiwengahe , sababu timongolio woluo to Yerusalemu to Dulahu Buka Paska , wau maloo̒onto ngoa̒amila u hepilohutu li Isa .
43004046	Lapatao̒ ti Isa luli lohualingo ode Kana to Galilea , tou̒toonu Tio mapee̒enta lomolio̒ taluhu lowali angguru . Tokota boito woluo pogawee ngota lo pamalenta , walai̒o donggo mongongoto to Kapernaum .
43004047	Tou̒ ilodungohelio deu̒ ti Isa malei dungga ode Galilea lonto Yudea , tio malonao̒ mota odeli Isa wau loloduo li Isa ode Kapernaum u mopoo̒luli walai̒o ungopee̒ mate .
43004048	Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ ode pogawee lo pamalenta boito , " Wonu timongoli diila loo̒onto totoonulalo moo̒linggolabe , yi timongoli diila palacaya . "
43004049	" Tuani , " ualo pogawee lo pamalenta boito , " aliheo̒ ponao̒lo mai tou̒ walao̒ lowatia boito diipo mate . "
43004050	Tahuda mao̒ li Isa olio , " Pohualingolo , walau̒mu moluli . " Tau boito palacaya u tilahuda li Isa , tulusi tio malonao̒ .
43004051	Tohuungo dalalo , tahi pomayalio malonao̒ mai ode olio wau lopohabari mao̒ , " Walai̒ Tuani maloluli . "
43004052	Lapatao̒ tio malohintu olimongolio , jamu ngoolo walao̒ boito loluli . Timongolio lolametao̒ , " Olaango tanu jamu satu mohulonu polipitio yilooli . "
43004053	Lapatao̒ tiyamo lowalao̒ boito loo̒e̒ela mola deu̒ tosaaa̒ti boito ti Isa lotahuda olio , " Walau̒mu moluli . " Yi tio wau ngoa̒amila ngaalaa̒lio palacaya li Isa .
43004054	Uitolo u moo̒linggolabe oluolio u pilohutu li Isa to Galilea tou̒ dudunggaa-Lio mai lonto Yudea .
43005001	Lapatao̒ uito woluo lameyangi lo Yahudi , yi ti Isa lonao̒ mola ode Yerusalemu .
43005002	To Yerusalemu totili " Huhebu lo Himba " woluo kulamu tuwau , u todelomo bahasa lo Ibrani iluntee Betesda . Mota teto woluo sulambe mohelu limo .
43005003	To susuu-lambeyalo boito dadaata taa mongongoto hibalata ; woluo taapitoo̒ , woluo taapenggo , wau woluo tadidu mowali monao̒ . [ Timongolio ngoa̒amila hipo himawa taluhu tokulamu boito mobuo̒lai .
43005004	Sababu tingga maito malai̒kati lo Eeya motuhutai ode delomo kulamu boito wau mopo buo̒lai taluhio . Wau tahi ngongota tabohulio tumuwoto ode delomo kulamu boito tou̒ taluhio donggo mobuo̒lo mamoluli penu boli ngongota wolo u hedutolalio . ]
43005005	Totambati boito woluo talolai̒ ngota u ngongotio matolo pulaa walu lotaunu hiheolio .
43005006	Ti Isa loo̒onto olio balabalata mola teto , wau otaawa li Isa deu̒ tio malohiheo daa̒ mongongoto ; yi ti Isa malohintu olio , " Mohuto yio̒ moluli ? "
43005007	Taa mongongoto boito lolametao̒ , " Paaa̒ , diaaluo taatewe umopo tuwotao̒ olaatia ode delomo kulamu tou̒ taluhio mobuo̒lai . Wau tou̒ watia mao̒de kulamu , taawewo maa tilumuwoto leimulo . "
43005008	Yi ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ olio , " Bongulo mola , bintaa̒alo amongumu wau ponao̒lo . "
43005009	Tou̒ boitolo olo tau boito loluli . Tio malo mintaa̒ amongio wau lonao̒ . Sua̒li boito lotoduo mai todulahu Saabati .
43005010	Sababu uito tahidihima kawasa lo Yahudi malo loi̒ya totaa boheli loluli mao̒ boito , " Dulahu botie dulahu Saabati . Yio̒ diila mowali momintaa̒ amongumu . "
43005011	Bo tau boito lolametao̒ , " Taa u lopoo̒luli mai olaatia engonti boito talo poa̒hu olaatia lomintaa̒ amongo lowatia wau loponao̒ . "
43005012	" Tatoonu Tio talo poa̒hu olemu lomintaa̒ amongumu wau lononao̒ ? " yilintu mao̒ limongolio .
43005013	Bo tailoluli boito diila lotota tatoonu taulio , sababu ti Isa mailooli lomola towolota lotaa dadaata boito .
43005014	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lodunggaya wolo tau boito todelomo Bele lo Eeya , wau lotahuda mao̒ olio , " Botia yio̒ maloluli . Diilalo pohutu dusa , alihu yio̒ diila moo̒laasa mai sua̒li ulebe moleetao̒ . "
43005015	Yi malonao̒ tau boito lapatao̒ lopoo̒taa to tahidihima kawasa lo Yahudi deu̒ ti Isaalo talo poo̒luli olio .
43005016	Wau sababu uito timongolio mahipo tolopania mopoo̒suusa li Isa , sababu Tio lopoo̒luli tau todulahu Saabati .
43005017	Boti Isa lotahuda mao̒ olimongolio , " Allahu Taa̒ala debo hemo kalaja tunggula botia , wau Wau̒ olo musi mokalaja . "
43005018	Tahuda boito maloo̒ sababu to tahidihima kawasa lo Yahudi lebe mao̒ hipo tolopania u momate o-Lio mate-mateelo mao̒ . Timongolio lohutu uito , diila bo sababu u Tio lolambanga wuu̒du lo agama tomimbihu dulahu Saabati , bo olo kalana Tio malo tahuda deu̒ Allahu Taa̒ala boito ti Paapa-Lio ; boliilio mao̒ Tio mopo tutuuwauwa batanga-Lio wolo Allahu Taa̒ala .
43005019	Ti Isa lolametao̒ ode tau-tauwala boito odie , " Pomalacayalo , Walao̒ diila mowali mohutu wolo-wolo , wolo kawasaa-Lio lolohilao . Tio bo mohutu wolo u iloontonga-Lio pilohutu li Paapa-Lio . Sababu wolo u pilohutu li Paapa-Lio , uito olo u pohutuo lo Walao̒ .
43005020	Sababu Allahu Taa̒ala lomonu to Walao̒ wau lopobilohei o-Lio ngoa̒amila u pilohutu-Lio lohihilao . Tumbao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala mamopo bilohei o-Lio totoonulalo huhutu ulebe udaa̒ mao̒ poli tilinggula timongoli molinggolabe .
43005021	Allahu Taa̒ala boito mopobongu mai taamate , wau mongohi olimongolio tutumulo ututuulio tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ ; odito olo Walao̒ mongohi mai tutumulo u ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ totaa mohuto wohia-Lio tutumulo .
43005022	Allahu Taa̒ala lohihilao diila momutoo̒ boli olita . Ngoa̒amila kawasa u momutoo̒ mailudu-Lio to Wala-I̒o .
43005023	Allahu Taa̒ala lohutu uito alihu ngoa̒amila tau mohulumati to Walao̒ debo odelo timongolio mohulumati to Allahu Taa̒ala . Taa diila mohulumati to Walao̒ diila mohulumati olo to Allahu Taa̒ala tamalolao mai to Walao̒ .
43005024	Otutu banali totoonulalo tahudaa-U̒ botie : Taa umopoo̒ tuotao̒ totoonulalo tahudaa-U̒ , wau palacaya o-Lio talolao mai ola-U̒ , o tutumulo ututuulio tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ . Tio diila tahukuu-maniyolo ; tio malo lopato lonto opopate wau loo̒tapu tutumulo .
43005025	Pomalacayalo : Mamei dungga wakutuulio -- tumbao̒ malei dungga wakutuulio -- taamate mamo dungohe suala lo Walao̒ Allahu Taa̒ala . Wau taa modungoheo̒ matumumulo .
43005026	Debo odelo Allahu Taa̒ala lohihilao bungo lo tutumulo , yi Tio olo mopowali mai wala-I̒o bungo lotutumulo .
43005027	Tio malohudu ode wala-I̒o haku u momutoo̒ , sababu Tio Walao̒ Manusia .
43005028	Diila mao̒ polinggolabu timongoli modungohe sua̒li botie , sababu wakutuulio mamei dungga deu̒ ngoa̒amila taa mailate modungohe sualaa-Lio ,
43005029	lapatao̒ lumualai monto kuubulu . Taa malohutu u mopiohe mamobongu mai ode tutumulo . Bo taa malohutu u moleeto mamobongu mai u hukuu-maniyolo . "
43005030	" Wau̒ diila mowali mohutu wolo-wolo modudua̒ otohilaa-U̒ lohihilao . Wau̒ bo momutoo̒ motuuu̒de lou̒ wolo u pilomalentai lo Allahu Taa̒ala . Wau putuusani-U̒ aadili , sababu Wau̒ diila modudua̒ u otohilaa-U̒ lohihilao , bo wambao̒ u otohilaa lo Allahu Taa̒ala talolao mai ola-U̒ .
43005031	Humayaalio Wau̒ mongohi mai sakusi pasali lobatanga lohihilao , diila mowali palacayalo .
43005032	Bo woluo taawewo tamongohi sakusi tomimbihu ola-U̒ , wau otaawa-U̒ deu̒ u silakusialio boito otutu .
43005033	Timongoli malolao utolia odelei Yahya , wau tio malongohi sakusi ubanali tomimbihu ola-U̒ .
43005034	Sua̒li botie tahudaa-U̒ mai , diila bo sababu Wau̒ momalalu sakusi monto manusia , bo alihu timongoli poa̒ahuwolo .
43005035	Tei Yahya boito debo odelo tohe ulei̒-lei̒ita wau mopo bulilangai lotilango . U ngopee̒ mola wakutu timongoli sanangi mololimo tinelio boito .
43005036	Bo u silakusiya-U̒ lebe udaa̒ mao̒ lou̒ silakusia lei Yahya . Wolo u masaatia pilohutu-U̒ botie , deu̒ito-yito kalaja u pilotuugasi mai li Paapa ola-U̒ , u mopobukuti deu̒ ti Paapa malolao mai ola-U̒ .
43005037	Wau ti Paapa talolao mai ola-U̒ olo longohi sakusi pasali ola-U̒ . Timongoli diipo pee̒enta mao̒ lodungohe sualaa-Lio meaalo loo̒onto baya-Lio .
43005038	Tataahe-Lio diila leitahu todelomo hilaamu sababu timongoli diila palacaya to ola-U̒ tailao-Lio mai .
43005039	Timongoli mopoo̒olato kitabi sababu helantobu limongoli deu̒ wolo dudelo boito timongoli otutumulo ututuulio tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ .
43005040	Bo timongoli diila motohilaa monao̒ mai ode ola-U̒ u moo̒tapu tutumulo ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ .
43005041	Wau̒ diila mololohe poloi̒laalo momuji monto manusia .
43005042	Oonuhe-U̒ timongoli . Otaawa-U̒ timongoli diila motolia̒nga to Allahu Taa̒ala todelomo hilaamu .
43005043	Wau̒ dungga-dungga mai wolo kawasa li Paapa-U̒ , bo timongoli diila mololimo ola-U̒ . Bo wonu taawewo dungga-dungga mai wolo kawasaalio lohihilao , timongoli motohilaa mololimo olio .
43005044	Woloolo mola timongoli moo̒ palacaya , wonu timongoli bo ohilaa mei̒puji monto timongotamu , wau diila motolopani u moo̒tapu poloi̒laalo momuji monto Allahu Taa̒ala u Tuwa-tuwaulo ?
43005045	Diila mao̒ polantobu Wau̒ mamopotala olimongoli totalu lo Allahu Taa̒ala . Tumbao̒ tamaa mopotala olimongoli yito tei Musa .
43005046	Humayaalio timongoli palacaya olei Musa , timongoli mapalacaya to ola-U̒ , sababu pasali-U̒lo tunggula tio loluladei .
43005047	Bo wonu timongoli diila palacaya tou̒ wolo u tiluladio lei Musa , woloolo mola timongoli moo̒ palacaya tou̒ wolo upilo tahudaa-U̒ mai ? "
43006001	Dengolo wakutu lapatio mao̒ ti Isa lonao̒ mola ode ngotuwali lobulalo Galilea , u ilunte olo Bulalo Tiberias .
43006002	Leidungga mola odito , dadaata talo dudua̒ o-Lio sababu timongolio maloo̒onto u moo̒linggolabu hepilohutu-Lio wolo lopoo̒luli tahi ngongota .
43006003	Ti Isa lotao̒dee mola ode huludu , lapatao̒ lotihuloa̒ mola teto wolo tahidudua̒ o-Lio .
43006004	Towakutu boito mabolo ngopee̒ mola Dulahu Buka Paska lo Yahudi .
43006005	Tou̒ ti Isa lomilohe mota ode pali-Tio , Tio loo̒onto taa dadaata hinao̒wa mai ode o-Lio . Yi Tio lotahuda mao̒ odelei Pilipus . " Tou̒toonu mowali potaliyanto ua̒alo , alihu ngoa̒amila tau botie mowali molamelo ? " (
43006006	Mai̒lotaawa li Isa wolo u mapo hutuo-Lio , bo Tio lotahuda mao̒ odito sababu Tio motohilaa motesi olei Pilipus . )
43006007	Tei Pilipus lolametao̒ , " Roti u ngohalaga dulo hetuto doi talaa̒ diila tamoo̒ tuheta totau-tauwalo botie , eleponu ngota-ngota bo moo̒tapu ngoi̒di wambao̒ . "
43006008	Ngotaalio lomuri li Isa wewolio deu̒ito-yito tei Andreas , wutatei Simon Petrus malo loi̒ya ,
43006009	" Tewe woluo walao̒ talolai̒ wolo limo lobotu roti wau uponula dulo botu . Bo wolo boliilio uito totaa dadaata botie ? "
43006010	" Ahulaalo mota tau-tauwalo boito motihuloo̒ , " tahuda mao̒ li Isa . Totambati boito o huo̒yoto dadaata , oditolio tau-tauwala boito malo tihuloo̒ to huo̒yoto -- ngoa̒amilalo tanu limo lolihu lota mongo lolai̒ .
43006011	Lapatao̒ ti Isa malohama roti boito tulusi losukuru mola ode Allahu Taa̒ala . Lapatao̒ uito Tio lolaya-layadeo̒ roti boito totaa dadaata . Lapatao̒ Tio lolaya-layadeo̒ uponula boito , wau timongolio malo lamelo lotolu-toluulo mao̒ .
43006012	Lapatao̒ ngoa̒amilalo malo lamelo tunggula lobutuhu ti Isa lotahuda ode tahidudua̒ o-Lio , " Yimoa̒lo labitio lo ua̒alo boito ; diila bolo woluo u mohua̒yadu . "
43006013	Lapatao̒ timongolio malo himoa̒ mopulaa dulo kalanji hipolua lebe lo ua̒alo monto limo lobotu roti upilo lamela lotaa dadaata boito .
43006014	Tou̒ taa dadaata loo̒onto mao̒ moo̒linggolabe u pilohutu li Isa , timongolio malo loi̒ya , " Otutu , utieelo Nabi tahe halapuwolo meidungga mai ode dunia ! "
43006015	Otaawa li Isa timongolio malonao̒ monao̒ mai momakusa o-Lio mowali olongia limongolio . Sababu uito Tio malolahi ode madala ohuludu .
43006016	Tou̒ mahemo dio̒lomai , tahidudua̒ li Isa lotuhutaa mola ode bulalo .
43006017	Lapatao̒ timongolio malo titae̒ tobulotu lobalango bulalo boito lotidulunga ode Kapernaum . Dulahu malo dio̒lomai ti Isa debo diipo leidungga mai ode limongolio .
43006018	Tou̒ boito bulalo mahemo buo̒olai sababu dupoto daa̒ .
43006019	Tou̒ malobite mota tanu limo meaalo wolomo kilo , timongolio loo̒onto mota li Isa tahu-tahudei ode bulotu wau nao̒nao̒ totudu lotaluhu . Timongolio mailoohe daa̒ .
43006020	Boti Isa lotahuda olimongolio , " Diila oohe , utie Wau̒ ! "
43006021	Tulusi wolo sanangi lohilao timongolio malo lolimo o-Lio ode delomo bulotu , wau tosaaa̒tilo boito bulotu limongolio boito malei dungga mota ode tambati u pilatuju .
43006022	Loloombulio mola taa dadaata tadonggo leitolaa to ngotuwali lobulalo , lotota lou̒tau deu̒ engontielio bo woluo bulotu tuwau mola teto . Otaawa limongolio deu̒ tahidudua̒ li Isa malo monggata mota wolo bulotu boito , hiambola ti Isa diila loduduo̒ .
43006023	Lapatao̒ demohelu ngoolo bulotu lonto kota lo Tiberias leidungga mai wau lotirabua totili lotambati lotaa dadaata boito hipo lamela roti u mailapato silukuru mola lo Eeya .
43006024	Tou̒ taa dadaata boito loo̒onto deu̒ mopio ti Isa meaanto tahidudua̒ o-Lio diaaluo teto , timongolio olo malo titae̒ to bubuu-lotuwalo boito wau lobite ode Kapernaum mola mololohe li Isa .
43006025	Tou̒ tau-tauwala boito lodunggaya woli Isa to ngotuwali lobulalo , timongolio lohintu o-Lio , " Paaa̒ Guru , omolua ti Paaa̒ leidungga mai odie ? "
43006026	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Otutu , timongoli hemo lolohe ola-U̒ diila bo sababu timongoli malo ngalati makusudu totoonulalo moo̒linggolabe u hepilohutu-U̒ , bo sababu timongoli malo lamela tunggula lobutuhu .
43006027	Diila mao̒ pokalaja u moo̒tapu mai ua̒alo u mowali mopulito wau mobunuto . Pokalajaalo u moo̒tapu mai ua̒alo udiila mowali mobunuto u mongohi tutumulo ututuulio tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ . Ua̒alo boito mawohi mai lo Walao̒ Manusia olemu , sababu Tio mapiluduo̒ lo Allahu Taa̒ala . "
43006028	Lapatao̒ timongolio lohintu mao̒ o-Lio , " Amiaatia musi mohutu mao̒ wolo u moponao̒ kahandaki lo Allahu Taa̒ala ? "
43006029	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Utieelo u otohilaa lo Allahu Taa̒ala monto olimongoli : pomalacayalo o-Lio tailao mai lo Allahu Taa̒ala . "
43006030	" Wonu odito , " uali mongolio , " bukuti wolo u mowali wohi mai li Paaa̒ alihu amiaatia moo̒onto wau palacaya li Paaa̒ ? Wolo u mapohutuo li Paaa̒ ?
43006031	Tinenemoya lamiaatia lolamela manna tohuta datahu u luasi daa̒ wau delita , debo odelo u leitulade todelomo Kitabi , ' Tio longohi olimongolio ua̒alo roti lonto sologa ! ' "
43006032	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ olimongolio , " Pomalacayalo : Diila tei Musa , boti Paapa-U̒lo tamongohi mai olemu roti u otutuulio mao̒ monto sologa .
43006033	Sababu roti uwohi mai lo Allahu Taa̒ala yito Tio tamo tuhutai monto sologa wau mongohi tutumulo ode manusia todunia . "
43006034	" Paaa̒ , " uali mongolio , " wohiyalo mai laito roti boito ode lamiaatia . "
43006035	" Wau̒lo roti tamongohi mai tutumulo , " tahuda mao̒ li Isa olimongolio . " Taa u monao̒ mai ode ola-U̒ diila tapolaangolo poli u ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ . " Wau taa u palacaya ola-U̒ diila tamotoa̒ngo poli u ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ .
43006036	" Bo debo odelo u mapilo tahuda-U̒ mai olemu , eleponu timongoli maloo̒onto ola-U̒ , timongoli diila palacaya .
43006037	Ngoa̒amila tailudu mai li Paapa ode ola-U̒ mamonao̒ mai ode ola-U̒ . Wau̒ diila tamopo touli boli tatoonu tamonao̒ mai ode ola-U̒ .
43006038	Sababu Wau̒ lotuhutai lonto sologa , diila mai mohutu u otohilaa-U̒ lohihilao , bo u otohilaa-Lio lo talolao mai ola-U̒ .
43006039	Wau uti-utieelo u otohilaa-Lio lo talolao mai ola-U̒ : alihu monto ngoa̒amila tailudu-Lio mai ola-U̒ , diaaluo penu boli ngotaa mao̒ tamooli ; bo alihu Wau̒ mopobongu mai olimongolio to Dulahu Kiama .
43006040	Memangi uti-utieelo u otohilaa li Paapa-U̒ : alihu ngoa̒amila tau moo̒onto to Walao̒ boito wau palacaya o-Lio o tutumulo tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ , wau muli bongulo-U̒ mai to Dulahu Kiama . "
43006041	Tau-tauwalo Yahudi maloingo toli Isa , sababu Tio lotahuda : " Wau̒ roti talo tuhutai lonto sologa . "
43006042	Timongolio loloi̒ya mao̒ , " Diila maa Tio botie ti Isa walae̒e Yusu ? Otaawa lami mongo dulaa̒-Lio ! Woloolo mola Tio mowali moloi̒ya deu̒ Tio malo tuhutai lonto sologa ? "
43006043	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda ode limongolio , " Diila mao̒ poingo .
43006044	Diaaluo penu boli ngotaa tamowali monao̒ mai ode ola-U̒ , wonu Allahu Taa̒ala talolao ola-U̒ , diila modelo mai olio ode ola-U̒ ; wau tatoonu tamonao̒ mai ode ola-U̒ , mabongulo-U̒ to Dulahu Kiama .
43006045	Todelomo Buku lomongo nabi tulatulade odie , ' Ngoa̒amila tau maa̒alario lo Allahu Taa̒ala . ' Oditolio ngoa̒amila taa modungohe li Paapa-U̒ wau mobalajali monto o-Lio , monao̒ mai ode ola-U̒ .
43006046	Uito diila oboliilio deu̒ woluo tamaa loo̒onto li Paapa-U̒ . Bo Tio tadungga-dungga mai lonto Allahu Taa̒ala , maloo̒onto li Paapa .
43006047	Ototai mao̒ : Taa u palacaya , o tutumulo ututuulio tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ .
43006048	Wau̒lo roti tamongohi mai tutumulo .
43006049	Tinenemoyamu lolamelo manna tohuta datahu u luasi daa̒ wau delita wau timongolio yilate olo .
43006050	Bo diila odito wolo roti u lotuhutai lonto sologa ; taa u molamela roti boito diila tamaate .
43006051	Wau̒lo roti u lotuhutai lonto sologa -- roti u mongohi tutumulo . Taa u molamela roti botie matumumulo ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ . Roti u mawohi-U̒ ode tutumulo manusia todunia ui-uitolo tapu-U̒ . "
43006052	Loo̒dungohe uito , tau-tauwalo Yahudi mahipo hahaamawa ngota-timongota . " Woloolo mola tau botie mowali mongohi tapu-Lio ode olanto u polamelo ? " uali mongolio .
43006053	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ olimongolio , " Pomalacayalo : Wonu timongoli diila molamelo tapu lo Walao̒ Manusia wau mongilu duhu-Lio , timongoli diila tao̒tu-otutuulo mao̒ tumumulo .
43006054	Taa u molamelo tapu-U̒ wau mongilu duhu-U̒ o tutumulo ututuulio tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ wau Wau̒ mamopo bongu mai olio to Dulahu Kiama .
43006055	Sababu tapu-U̒ tutuulio tutu ua̒alo , wau duhu-U̒ tutuulio tutu minumani .
43006056	Taa u molamelo tapu-U̒ wau mongilu duhu-U̒ , debo motituwau wola-U̒ , wau Wau̒ wolio .
43006057	Allahu Taa̒ala tatumu-tumulo boito , lolao mai ola-U̒ wau Wau̒ olo tumumulo monto Allahu Taa̒ala . Odito olo taa u molamelo tapu-U̒ matumumulo monto ola-U̒ .
43006058	Uti-utieelo roti u lotuhutai lonto sologa ; diila debo odelo roti u pilolameli nenemoyamu . Sababu tou̒ malo lamelo roti boito , timongolio debo yilate olo . Bo taa u molamelo roti botie matumumulo ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ . "
43006059	Ngoa̒amilalo boito pilotahuda li Isa tou̒ Tio helo ngaajali tobele potabiaalo to Kapernaum .
43006060	Tou̒ loo̒dungohe tataa-heyaalo li Isa boito , dadaata towolota lo tahidudua̒ o-Lio loloi̒ya mao̒ , " Pongaajali botie mailaba buheetio . Tatoonu tamowali mololimo mao̒ ! "
43006061	Ti Isa lohihilao motota deu̒ tahidudua̒ o-Lio hiwingoa pasali losua̒li boito . Yi Tio malo tahuda , " Wolo timongoli diila sanangi sababu tataa-heyaalo boito ?
43006062	Woloolo mola waliilio dewonu timongoli moo̒onto Walao̒ Manusia muli mobotula mola ode tambati-Lio u bohulio ?
43006063	Tamohutu mai manusia tumumulo yito Rohullah . Olootolo manusia diaaluo hunalio . Tataa-heyaalo upilo tahuda-U̒ mai olemu botie tataa-heyaalo Rohullah wau tataa-heyaalo u mongohi tutumulo .
43006064	Bo debo woluo olo towolota limongoli tadiila mohuto palacaya . " ( Mai̒lotaawa li Isa tou̒ bohulio mai titatita tadiila mohuto palacaya , wau tatoonu tamamo hiyanati o-Lio . )
43006065	Lapatao̒ ti Isa luli lotahuda mao̒ , " Uitolo sababuulio Wau̒ mopoo̒taa mai olemu deu̒ diaaluo penu boli ngotaa mao̒ tamowali monao̒ mai ode ola-U̒ , wonu ti Paapa-U̒ diila mongohi olio . "
43006066	Tumulalo mai tosaaa̒ti boito dadaata tahidudua̒ o-Lio , lololaa mao̒ o-Lio , wau diilalo mohuto modudua̒ o-Lio .
43006067	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lohintu mao̒ to tamo pulaa duulota tahidudua̒ o-Lio , " Wolo timongoli olo mohuto mololaa mao̒ ola-U̒ ? "
43006068	" Eeya , " ualei Simon Petrus o-Lio , " ode tatoonu mongowatotia musi monao̒ ? Tahuda lo Eeya mongohi tutumulo ututuulio tutu wau ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ .
43006069	Mongo watotia mapila-lacaya wau yakini deu̒ Eeyaalo utolia tamantali lonto Allahu Taa̒ala . "
43006070	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Wolo diila maa Wau̒ talo lulaotao̒ olimongoli tamo pulaa duulota botie ? Bo ngota towolota limongoli yito lati ! "
43006071	Tapilatuju li Isa yito tei Yudas walae̒e Simon Iskariot . Sababu eleponu tei Yudas ngotaalio lo tamo pulaa duulota muri li Isa , tio mamo hiyanati li Isa .
43007001	Lapatao̒ uito ti Isa malonao̒ ode utoonulalo mao̒ to Galilea . Tio diila lohuto ode madala lo Yudea sababu tahidihima kawasa lo Yahudi mola teto o makusudu momate olio mate-mateelo mao̒ .
43007002	Towakutu boito malembidei Dulahu Buka Wombohe Duungo .
43007003	Yi mongo wutati Isa loloi̒ya mao̒ o-Lio , " Tolailo mao̒ tambati botie wau ponao̒lo ode Yudea , alihu tahidudua̒ ole-Mu mowali momilohe olo kalajaa-Mu .
43007004	Diaaluo taa u mamoluuo̒ wolo u pohutuolio , wonu tio motohilaa mowali otaawa lotaa dadaata . Wonu Yio̒ mohutu susuu-aliyaalo debo odelo uito ngoilanggubu dunia musi motota ! " (
43007005	Sababu mongo wuta-Tio lohihilao olo diila palacaya o-Lio ) .
43007006	" Diipo wakutuulio ola-U̒ , " tahuda mao̒ li Isa ode limongolio , " bo ode limongoli timii̒du wakutu mowali .
43007007	Dunia botie diila pongalo aakali molonui̒ mongoli . Bo Wau̒ memangi lonuo̒ lodunia , sababu Wau̒ laito hemo tahuda ode dunia deu̒ huhutuulio moleeto .
43007008	Ponao̒lo timongoli lohihilao ode lameyangi boito . Wau̒ diila monao̒ sababu diipo wakutuulio ola-U̒ . "
43007009	Oditolo tahuda li Isa ode mongo wuta-Tio , wau Tio olo malo tibiluloa̒ to Galilea .
43007010	Lapatao̒ mongo wuta-Tio lonao̒ ode lameyangi boito , wolo poo̒-poo̒oyo ti Isa malonao̒ lohihilao lou̒ diila ilotaawa lotau .
43007011	Ngotilonggadu lameyangi boito , tahidihima kawasa lo Yahudi hemo lolohe o-Lio wau hemohintu-hintu , " Tou̒toonu Tio ? "
43007012	Dadaata tau mahipo loloohuma tomimbihu o-Lio . Woluo talo loi̒ya , " Tio taa mopiohu . " Waluo poli talo loi̒ya , " Diila ! Tio hemo polapalo totaa dadaata . "
43007013	Bo diaaluo penu boli ngotaa mao̒ tabuheli mobisala juujulu tomimbihu o-Lio sababu timongolio moohe to tahidihima kawasa lo Yahudi .
43007014	Tohuungo lo lameyangi , ti Isa tilumuwoto ode delomo Bele lo Eeya , tulusi lolumulao̒ longaajali .
43007015	Tahidihima kawasa lo Yahudi lolinggolabe daa̒ wau loloi̒ya , " Woloolo mola tau botie malotota odito daatalio , lebe-lebe pomao̒ Tio diipo pee̒enta mao̒ helo sikola ? "
43007016	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " U pilongajali-U̒ botie diila ajalani-U̒ , bo ajalani-Lio lo talolao mai ola-U̒ .
43007017	Taa u mohuto moduduo̒ u otohilaa lo Allahu Taa̒ala , mamotota mao̒ wolo pongajali-U̒ boito dudunggaalio mai monto Allahu Taa̒ala meaambo monto ola-U̒ lohihilao .
43007018	Taa u mongohi ajalanilio lohihilao mololohe ohulumati ode batangalio lohihilao . Bo taa u mololohe ohulumati ode o-Lio tailaolio mai , tau boito juujulu , diaaluo wimbulo to olio .
43007019	Diila tei Musa tamaa longohi mai papaa-lentawalo Allahu Taa̒ala ode olemu ? Bo towolota limongoli diaaluo mao̒ talo dudua̒ papaa-lentawalo boito . Yilongola timongoli ohilaa momate ola-U̒ mate-mateelo mao̒ ? "
43007020	Taa dadaata boito lolametao̒ , " Yio̒ biyongo ! Tatoonu tao̒hilaa momate ole-Mu mate-mateelo mao̒ ? "
43007021	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Bo wambao̒ tuwau kalaja pilohutu-U̒ todulahu Saabati , wau timongoli lolinggolabu .
43007022	Tei Musa longohi mai olimongoli wuu̒du u polunaalo -- eleponu sunati boito otutuulio mao̒ asaliilio mai diila lonto olei Musa bo lonto mongo tiyamo loluuhuru tou̒ dipolulio mai tei Musa . Sababu uito , penu boli todulahu Saabati timongoli ohilaa moluuna tau .
43007023	Wonu timongoli mohutu uito alihu diila mao̒ molambanga wuu̒du lei Musa pasali lou̒ sunati , yilongola timongoli moingo ola-U̒ , sababu lopoo̒luli ngangaa-waa̒lo mao̒ batanga lotau todulahu Saabati ?
43007024	Diila mao̒ pomutoo̒ tau bo dadaasari tou̒ oontonga , bo dadaasari tou̒ aadili . "
43007025	Lapatao̒ woluo dengolo lota taulo Yerusalemu loloi̒ya , " Diila maa Tio botie tau-Lio tahe lolohulo u pateelo mate-mateelo mao̒ ?
43007026	Bilohi mao̒ Tio hemobisala lou̒ bebasi totalu lotaa dadaata , wau diaaluo tamoloi̒ya wolo-wolo to o-Lio ! Wolo tahidihima kawasa to olanto botie tanu malotota lou̒tau deu̒ Tio botie Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua ?
43007027	Bo wonu Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua boito meidungga mai diaaluo penu boli ngotaa mao̒ tamotota monto utoonu asalii-Lio ! Lebe-lebe pomao̒ otaawanto lonto utoonu asalii-Lio lotau botie . "
43007028	Lapatao̒ , tou̒ ti Isa donggo hemo ngaajali todelomo Bele lo Eeya , Tio longibode mola wolo suala daa̒ , " Oditolio otaawa limongoli tatoonu Wau̒ botie , wau lonto utoonu asalii-U̒ ? Wau̒ diila leidungga mai sababu otohilaa-U̒ lohihilao . Wau̒ yilao-Lio mai lo tao̒haku lolao mai ola-U̒ , wau Tio mowali palacayalo . Bo timongoli diila moo̒onuhe o-Lio .
43007029	Wau̒ moo̒onuhe o-Lio , sababu Wau̒ asaliilio mai lonto o-Lio , wau Tiolo talolao mai ola-U̒ . "
43007030	Tou̒ boito timongolio ohilaa moheu̒pa li Isa , bo diaaluo tabuheli modihu o-Lio , sababu diipo leidungga wakutuulio .
43007031	Dadaata towolota lotau-tauwalo boito mapilacaya o-Lio , wau hemoloi̒ya , " Wonu Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua boito meidungga mai , wolo Tio mowali mohutu lebe dadaata mao̒ u moo̒linggolabe wolo tau botie ? "
43007032	Tau-tauwalo Parisi loo̒dungohe woloolo mola taa dadaata boito hipo loloohuma pasali li Isa . Sababu uito pee̒-pee̒enta wolo mongo iimamu tau̒wa , timongolio malo poa̒hu dengolo lota tamoo-kawalia Bele lo Eeya loheu̒pa li Isa .
43007033	Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ totaa dadaata boito todelomo Bele lo Eeya , " Bo ngopee̒ mola wambao̒ Wau̒ donggo pee̒-pee̒enta woli mongoli . Lapatao̒ uito Wau̒ mamuli mohualinga mola ode talolao mai ola-U̒ .
43007034	Timongoli mamo lolohe ola-U̒ , bo diila moo̒dungga ola-U̒ ; sababu timongoli diila moo̒nao̒ mai ode tambati tou̒toonu Wau̒ woluo . "
43007035	Lapatao̒ tahidihima kawasa lo Yahudi malo loi̒ya ngota timongota " Tau botie ohilaa monao̒ ode utoonu tilinggula ito diilalo moo̒dungga o-Lio ? Wolo Tio ohilaa monao̒ ode tau-tauwalo Yahudi tahi biluloa̒awa to bulemengo lipu towolota taulo Yunani , wau mongaajali taulo Yunani ?
43007036	Wolo makusudu-Lio wolo lotahuda deu̒ ito mamololohe o-Lio bo diila moo̒dungga o-Lio wau deu̒ ito diila moo̒nao̒ mai ode tambati tou̒toonu Tio woluo ? "
43007037	Topulito dulahu lo lameyangi boito , deu̒ito-yito dulahu ulaba-labaalo polohuna daa̒ , ti Isa tilimihulao̒ todelomo Bele lo Eeya tulusi longiibode , " Taa u mototoa̒ngo ponao̒lo mai ode ola-U̒ mai mongilu .
43007038	Tomimbihu taa upalacaya to ola-U̒ , tulatulade todelomo Kitabi , ' Monto delomo hilaalio tumolohei totoo-lohuwaalo taluhu u mongohi tutumulo . ' " (
43007039	Ti Isa lotahuda pasali lo Rohullah , u matolimo lotau-tauwalo tapalacaya o-Lio . Sababu tou̒ boito Rohullah diipo yilohi-Lio mai ; sababu ti Isa diipo pilolaio̒ wolo opopate-Lio . )
43007040	Dadaata taa loo̒dungohu wolo upilo tahuda li Isa , wau towolota limongolio woluo talo loi̒ya , " Tau botie maatantu Nabi boito ! "
43007041	Tawewo loloi̒ya , " Utieelo Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua ! " Bo woluo olo talo loi̒ya , " Aa , diila pongalo aakali Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua dudunggaalio mai lonto Galilea ?
43007042	Todelomo Kitabi tulatuladu deu̒ Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua yito wali mai lei Dauda wau mamei dungga monto Betlehemu , deu̒ito-yito kambungu pilohuluta loduhu lei Dauda . "
43007043	Pulitio mao̒ tau-tauwalo mahipo hahaamawa tomimbihu li Isa .
43007044	Woluo tao̒hilaa moheu̒pa o-Lio , bo diaaluo penu boli ngotaa mao̒ tamodihu o-Lio .
43007045	Tou̒ tahi pokawalia Bele lo Eeya taa ilahulalio mota loheu̒pa li Isa luli lohualingai , mongo iimamu tauwa wau tau-tauwalo Parisi boito lohintu mao̒ olimongolio , " Yilongola timongoli diila lodelo mai o-Lio odia ? "
43007046	Tahi pokawalia boito lolametao̒ , " Waa , diipo pee̒enta mao̒ woluo tahelo bisala debo odelo Tio ! "
43007047	" Wolo timongoli olo mapilo lapalo-Lio ? " ualo tau-tauwalo Parisi boito .
43007048	" Wolo woluo tahidihima kawasa lonto olanto meaambo taulo Parisi tapalacaya o-Lio ?
43007049	Bo taa dadaata botie , diila otaawa limongolio butoe̒e Musa , wau penu boli woloolo mola olo timongolio malaa̒-laa̒nati . "
43007050	Tala ngota towolota lotau-tauwalo Parisi boito yito tei Nikodemus tamaa pee̒enta lonao̒ mai odeli Isa . Tei Nikodemus loloi̒ya mao̒ ode tau-tauwalo Parisi wewo ,
43007051	" Modudua̒ butoo̒ , tahingota-ngotaawa diila mowali hukuu-maniyola tou̒ palakalalio diipo dilungohe wau huhutuulio pilalakisa . "
43007052	" Wolo yio̒ olo lonto Galilea ? " tametao̒ limongolio , " Palakisai mao̒ Kitabi ! Yio̒ mamoo̒onto deu̒ diaaluo nabi taa̒saliilio mai lonto Galilea ! " [
43007053	Lapatao̒ uito , ngoa̒amila tau malo hualinga ode bele . ]
43008001	Boti Isa lonao̒ mola ode Huludu Jaitun .
43008002	Loloombulio mola dimodupo Tio lonao̒ mota poli ode Bele lo Eeya , wau dadaata tahe lonao̒ mai ode o-Lio . Ti Isa malo tihuloa̒a mola , tulusi lolumulo longaajali mao̒ olimongolio .
43008003	Tou̒ boito , guguu-ruwaalo agama wau tau-tauwalo Parisi lodelo mai ode o-Lio taabua ngota tai̒lo dungga hemojina . Timongolio lopoa̒hu taabua boito tilimihulo tohuungio ,
43008004	lapatao̒ loloi̒ya mao̒ odeli Isa , " Paaa̒ Guru , taabua botie ilodungga lamiaatia donggo hemojina .
43008005	Todelomo butoe̒e Musa woluo wuu̒du deu̒ taabua debo odelo utie paatuti pai̒yola lobotu tunggula mate . Botia woloolo mola huhama li Paaa̒ ? "
43008006	Timongolio lohintu odito u mohentobe o-Lio , alihu timongolio mowali mopotala o-Lio . Boti Isa wambao̒ dungudungu , wau hemo lulade tohuta wolo tingoongoa lo uluu̒-Lio .
43008007	Tou̒ timongolio tulusi hemo huntula o-Lio , yi Tio malo mintaa̒i lunggo-Ngio wau lotahuda mao̒ olimongolio , " Taa udiila odusa towolota limongoli , huliaalo mao̒ tio tamomai̒ lobotu ode taabua boito . "
43008008	Lapatao̒ uito ti Isa luli lotidungu mola wau luli lolulade tohuta .
43008009	Lapatao̒ loo̒dungohe li Isa lotahuda odito , malo tinao̒nao̒ timongolio lololaa mao̒ tambati boito , ngota-ngota tumulalo mai tahulangio . Pulitio mao̒ bolo ti Isa tutuuwau taleitolaa teto wolo taabua tadonggo tihutihula totambati boito .
43008010	Lapatao̒ ti Isa malo mintaa̒ mola lunggo-Ngio wau lotahuda mao̒ ode taabua boito , " Tou̒toonu timongolio ngoa̒amila ? Diaaluo talo hukuumani olemu ? "
43008011	" Diaaluo , Paaa̒ , " tametio mao̒ . [ " Ooo̒ , " uali Isa , " Wau̒ olo diila mohukuumani mai olemu . Botia ponao̒lo , diilalo pohutu dusa . " ]
43008012	Ti Isa luli lotahuda totaa dadaata , tahuda-Lio mao̒ , " Wau̒lo tilango dunia . Taa u moduduo̒ ola-U̒ diila tamonao̒ tou̒ modio̒lomo , bo o tilango tutumulo . "
43008013	" Botia Yio̒ longohi sakusi pasali lo batanga-Mu lohihilao , " ualo tau-tauwalo Parisi boito to o-Lio , " Sakusi-Mu boito diila otutu . "
43008014	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Eleponu Wau̒ mongohi mai sakusi pasali lo batanga-U̒ lohihilao , sakusi-U̒ boito otutu ; sababu otaawa-U̒ lonto utoonu mai dudunggaa-U̒ wau ode utoonu nonao̒o-U̒ . Diila otaawa limongoli lonto utoonu mai dudunggaa-U̒ , wau ode utoonu nonao̒o-U̒ .
43008015	Timongoli momutoo̒ tau wolo dudelo lomanusia ; Wau̒ diila momutoo̒ penu boli ngotaa mao̒ .
43008016	Bo humayaalio Wau̒ momutoo̒ tau , putuusani-U̒ boito aadili , sababu Wau̒ diila tutuuwau ; Allahu Taa̒ala talolao mai ola-U̒ woluo wola-U̒ .
43008017	Todelomo butoe̒e Musa tulatuladu odie ; ososakusi u otutu yito ososakusi monto taduulota .
43008018	Tamongohi sakusi pasali lo batanga-U̒ woluo duulota Wau̒ wau ti Paapa-U̒ talolao mai ola-U̒ . "
43008019	" Ti Paapa-Mu boito tou̒toonu ? " loi̒ya mao̒ limongolio . Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Timongoli diila moo̒onuhe ola-U̒ meaambo li Paapa-U̒ . Humayaalio timongoli olo moo̒onuhe ola-U̒ , maatantu timongoli moo̒onuhe li Paapa-U̒ . "
43008020	Ngoa̒amilalo botie pilotahuda li Isa tou̒ Tio donggo hemo ngaajali to Bele lo Eeya totili bubuu-luwaalo lodoi podewo . Bo diaaluo penu boli ngotaa mao̒ talo heu̒pa o-Lio , sababu diipo leidungga wakutuulio .
43008021	Ti Isa luli lotahuda mao̒ ode limongolio , " Wau̒ mamonao̒ wau timongoli mamo lolohe ola-U̒ , bo timongoli maamate todelomo dusamu . Ode tambati ponao̒wa-U̒ , diila mowali onao̒wa limongoli . "
43008022	Yi tahidihima kawasa lo Yahudi malo loi̒ya , " Tanu Tio motohilaa motitipate , sababu tio malo tahuda , ' Ode tambati ponao̒wa-U̒ , diila mowali onao̒wa limongoli . ' "
43008023	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ ode limongolio , " Timongoli dungga-dungga mai lonto walungo ; bo Wau̒ dungga-dungga mai lonto yitaato . Timongoli lonto dunia ; Wau̒ diila lonto dunia .
43008024	Uito sababuulio Wau̒ motahuda mai olemu , deu̒ timongoli maamate todelomo duduu-saamu . Wau memangi timongoli maamate todelomo duduu-saamu , wonu diila palacaya deu̒ , ' Wau̒lo Tio tai̒lunte WAU̒ WOLUO ' . "
43008025	" Otutuulio mao̒ tatoonu Yio̒ ? " yilintu mao̒ limongolio . Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Donggo pongoola muli mobisala woli mongoli !
43008026	Donggo dadaata sua̒li tomimbihu olimongoli u ohilaa potahuda-U̒ mai wau pomutoa̒lo . Bo Tio talolao mai ola-U̒ mowali palacayalo . Wau Wau̒ mopoo̒taa ode dunia wolo u ilodungohe-U̒ lonto o-Lio . "
43008027	Timongolio diila mongalati deu̒ Tio donggo hemo bisala toli mongolio pasali li Paapa .
43008028	Sababu uito ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ olimongolio , " De wonu timongoli malo palaio̒ mola Walao̒ Manusia , timongoli mamotota deu̒ ' Wau̒lo Tio tai̒lunte WAU̒ WOLUO ' , wau timongoli mamotota deu̒ diaaluo penu boli tuwau mao̒ u pilohutu-U̒ monto batanga-U̒ lohihilao . Wau̒ bo wambao̒ motahuda wolo upilo ngaajali mai li Paapa ola-U̒ .
43008029	Wau Tio tamalolao mai ola-U̒ woluo wola-U̒ . Diila pee̒enta mao̒ Tio mopoluli ola-U̒ tutuuwau , sababu Wau̒ laito hemohutu wolo umoo̒ sanangi hilaa-Lio . "
43008030	Lapatio mao̒ ti Isa lotahuda u ngoa̒amilalo boito , dadaata taa palacaya o-Lio .
43008031	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda totau-tauwalo Yahudi tamaa pilalacaya o-Lio , " Wonu timongoli tumumulo modudua̒ pongaajali-U̒ otu-otutuulio mao̒ muri-U̒ ,
43008032	yi mao̒onuhe limongoli Allahu Taa̒ala tao̒tutu , wau masababu uito timongoli malopatolo ! "
43008033	" Amiaatia botie wali mai lei Abraham , " uali mongolio . " Diipo pee̒etna mao̒ amiaatia lowali wato penu boli lo tatoonu ! Wolo makusudu-Mu wolo tahuda , ' Timongoli malopatolo ' ? "
43008034	" Otutu banali tahuda-U̒ botie , " tahuda mao̒ li Isa ode limongolio . " Taa u mohutu dusa , taboitolo wato lodusa .
43008035	Wau wato ngota diila otambati utatapu todelomo ungaalaa̒ , hiambola walao̒ u ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ otambati todelomo ungaalaa̒ .
43008036	Sababu uitolo , wonu Walao̒ mopo lopotai olimongoli , timongoli otu-otutuulio mao̒ molopato .
43008037	Memangi otaawa-U̒ timongoli botie wali mai lei Abraham . Bo timongoli motohilaa momate ola-U̒ mate-mateelo mao̒ , sababu timongoli diila mohuto mololimo pongaajali-U̒ .
43008038	Wolo u iloontonga-U̒ toli Paapa-U̒ , uitolo olo upilo tahuda-U̒ mai . Hiambola timongoli mohutu wolo u pilo ngaajali lipaapamu olemu . "
43008039	Timongolio lolametao̒ , " Ti Paapa lamiaatia deu̒ito-yito tei Abraham . " " Humayaalio timongoli tio̒otutua walae̒e Abraham , " tahuda Isa , " tantuulo mao̒ timongoli mohutu wolo u pilohutu lei Abraham .
43008040	Wau̒ mopo tunggulai olemu obobanali u ilodungohe-U̒ lonto Allahu Taa̒ala , bo timongoli ohilaa momate ola-U̒ mate-mateelo mao̒ . Tei Abraham diila lohutu debo odelo uito !
43008041	Timongoli helohutu wolo upilohutu lipaapamu lohihilao . " Tametao̒ limongolio , " Amiaatia diila mongo walao̒ haramu . Ti Paapa lamiaatia bo ngota , deu̒ito-yito Allahu Taa̒ala lohihilao . "
43008042	Lapatao̒ ti Isa lotahuda ode limongolio , " Humayaalio Allahu Taa̒ala boito ti Paapamu , timongoli mamo tolia̒nga ola-U̒ , sababu Wau̒ dungga-dungga mai lonto Allahu Taa̒ala . Wau̒ dungga-dungga mai diila wolo hilaa-U̒ lohihilao , bo Tiolo tamalolao mai ola-U̒ .
43008043	Wolo sababuulio timongoli diila mongalati wolo upilo tahuda-U̒ ? Sababu timongoli diila moo̒ tahangi modungohe pongaajali-U̒ .
43008044	Ibilisi wambao̒ ti paapamu , wau timongoli mohuto modudua̒ u otohilaa lipaapamu . Tumulalo mai bohulio ibilisi boito moomatea mate-mateelo mao̒ . Tio diila pee̒enta mao̒ motiwambao̒ ode u otutu , sababu diaaluo u otutu to olio . Wonu tio mohimbulo , uito mawaajibu , sababu mao̒dito pii̒liilio . Tio mohimbuloa wau bungo lou̒ totoonulalo yimbulo .
43008045	Bo Wau̒ motahuda mai u otutu , wau sababu uitolo timongoli diila palacaya ola-U̒ .
43008046	Tatoonu towolota limongoli mowali mongohi bukuti deu̒ Wau̒ odusa ? Wonu Wau̒ motahuda mai u otutu , yilongola timongoli diila palacaya ola-U̒ ?
43008047	Taa asaliilio mai monto Allahu Taa̒ala , modungohe tahuda lo Allahu Taa̒ala . Bo timongoli diila lonto Allahu Taa̒ala , uitolo sababuulio timongoli diila mohuto modungohu . "
43008048	Tau-tauwalo Yahudi boito lolametao̒ li Isa , " Wolo diila otutu loi̒ya lami botie deu̒ Yio̒ taulo Samaria tai̒lo tuanga lolati ? "
43008049	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Wau̒ diila ilotuanga lolati . Wau̒ hemo hulumati li Paapa-U̒ , bo timongoli lohina ola-U̒ .
43008050	Wau̒ diila hemo lolohe hulumati ode batanga-U̒ lohihilao . Woluo ngota tahemo tolopani mai ohulumati ode ola-U̒ , wau Tiolo tamo mutoa̒i .
43008051	Otutu banali tahuda-U̒ botie , taa u moduduo̒ tahuda-U̒ , ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ diila tamaate . "
43008052	Lapatao̒ tau-tauwalo Yahudi boito loloi̒ya mao̒ odeli Isa , " Botia mai̒lotaawa lami deu̒ yio̒ botie otu-otutuulo mao̒ ilotuanga lolati ! Tei Abraham lohihilao mailate , odito olo ngoa̒amila nabi . Bo Yio̒ malo tahuda , ' Taa u modudua̒ tahuda-Mu , ohiheo-hiheolo mao̒ diila tamaate . '
43008053	Wonu tei Abraham lohihilao mailate , wau mongo nabi ngoa̒amilalo olo mailate , Yio̒ botie tatoonu ? Diila pongalo aakali Yio̒ talebe udaa̒ woli paapa lami tei Abraham ! "
43008054	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Humayaalio Wau̒ mololohe ohulumati ode batanga-U̒ lohihilao , ohulumati boito diaaluo hunalio . Tamo hulumati ola-U̒ yito ti Paapa-U̒ tahe anggapuo limongoli Allahu Taa̒ala limongoli ,
43008055	lebe-lebe pomao̒ timongoli diila moo̒onuhe o-Lio . Bo Wau̒ moo̒onuhe o-Lio . Humayaalio Wau̒ motahuda mai deu̒ Wau̒ diila moo̒onuhe o-Lio , yi Wau̒ ngotaalio lo tamoo-himbulowa , tutuuwauwa debo odelo timongoli . Wau̒ moo̒onuhe o-Lio wau modungohe tahudaa-Lio .
43008056	Ti Paapamu Abraham sanangi daa̒ deu̒ tio mamoo̒onto dulahu-U̒ . Tio maloo̒onto wau tio sanangi ! "
43008057	Lapatao̒ tau-tauwalo Yahudi loloi̒ya mao̒ odeli Isa , " Umulu-Mu diipo limo lopulu lotaunu , wau Yio̒ maloo̒onto olei Abraham ? "
43008058	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Otutu Wau̒ motahuda mai olemu : tou̒ tei Abraham diipo pilotutulio mai , Wau̒ mawoluo . "
43008059	Lapatao̒ tau-tauwalo Yahudi boito lohama botu u pomai̒lio o-Lio ; boti Isa loluuo̒ batanga-Lio , tulusi lonao̒ lololaa mao̒ Bele lo Eeya .
43009001	Tou̒ ti Isa nao̒nao̒ , iloontonga-Lio taa pitoo̒ anggadu pilotutulio mai .
43009002	Tahidudua̒ li Isa lohintu mao̒ odeli Isa , " Paaa̒ Guru , yilongola tau botie pilotutulio mai pitoo̒ ? Wolo kalana tio lohihilao odusa meaalo mongo dulaa̒lio tao̒dusa ? "
43009003	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Tio pitoo̒ diila sababu dusalio lohihilao meaalo dusa lomongo dulaa̒lio , bo alihu tau mowali moo̒onto mao̒ okokawasa lo Allahu Taa̒ala mokalaja todelomo batangalio .
43009004	Ngotilonggadu donggo dulahu , ito musi mokalaja mao̒ kalajaa-Lio lo talolao mai ola-U̒ . Hui mamei dungga , wau penu boli ngotaa mao̒ diila tamowali mokalaja .
43009005	Ngotilonggadu Wau̒ todunia botie , Wau̒lo tinelo dunia . "
43009006	Lapatao̒ lotahuda odito ti Isa lonula loiyohu ode huta , wau longaaheo̒ yiyoo-Hio boito wolo huta . Lapatao̒ piloseka-Lio tomato lotau boito , tulusi lotahuda mao̒ olio ,
43009007	" Ponao̒lo pobelesia mao̒ bayamu to Kulamu Siloam . " ( Siloam boliilio ' Ilutolia ' . ) Yi tau boito malonao̒ wau lopobelesi bayalio . Tou̒ tio lohualingai , tio malowali loo̒onto .
43009008	Mongo tiheedio wau tau-tauwalo tou̒ dipolulio mai loo̒onto olio hemohile-hile , ngoa̒amilalo malo loi̒ya , " Diila bo maatio botie tabiasaalio hulohuloa̒a hemohile-hile ? "
43009009	Woluo talo loi̒ya , " Memangi maatio . " Bo woluo olo talo loi̒ya , " Diila , tio bo ngopee̒e motutuuwau wolo tau boito . " Bo tau boito lohihilao loloi̒ya , " Wawaatiaalo tio . "
43009010	" Woloolo mola waliilio tunggula yio̒ malowali loo̒onto ? " uali mongolio olio .
43009011	Tio lolametao̒ , " Taa ilunte Isa boito lohutu mao̒ latao̒ ngoi̒di tulusi piloseka-Lio mai tomato lowatia wau lotahuda , ' Ponao̒lo pobelesia mao̒ bayamu to Kulamu Siloam . ' Tulusi watia lonao̒ . Wau tou̒ watia hemo pobelesi baya lowatia , watia malowali loo̒onto . "
43009012	" Tou̒toonu tau boito ? " yilintu mao̒ limongolio . Tio lolametao̒ , " Diila otaawa . "
43009013	Todulahu boito dulahu Saabati tou̒ ti Isa longaaheo̒ huta wolo yiyoo-Hio u lohutu taa pitoo̒ boito lowali loo̒onto . Yi taa engontielio pitoo̒ boito dilelolio mota ode tau-tauwalo Parisi .
43009014	
43009015	Timongolio olo lohintu mao̒ olio woloolo mola tio malowali loo̒onto . Tio lolametao̒ , " Tio malodutu mai latao̒ tomato lowatia , lapatao̒ pilobelesi mao̒ lowatia latao̒ boito watia malowali loo̒onto . "
43009016	Dengolo lota towolota tau-tauwalo Parisi boito loloi̒ya , " Diila pongalo aakali taa ulohutu utie asaliilio mai lonto Allahu Taa̒ala , sababu Tio diila momandungi dulahu Saabati . " Bo taa wewo loloi̒ya , " Diila pongalo aakali taa odusa mohutu momoo̒-linggolabeyalo debo odelo utie ? " Lapatao̒ tilumoodulo mola huhama u hihiihede towolota limongolio .
43009017	Yi tau-tauwalo Parisi boito luli lohintu mao̒ totau boito , " Wolo huhamaamu pasalii-Lio lo talohutu mai olemu loo̒onto ? " " Tio nabi . " tametao̒ lotau boito .
43009018	Bo mongo tau̒wa lo Yahudi boito diila lohuto palacaya deu̒ tau boito memangi pitoo̒ tou̒ dipolulio mai wau botia malowali loo̒onto . Sababu uito timongolio malo tianga mongo dulaa̒lio ,
43009019	wau lohintu mao̒ , " Otutu tio botie walau̒mu tahe loi̒yamu pilotutulio mai pitoo̒ ? Woloolo mola tio malowali loo̒onto botia ? "
43009020	Mongo dulaa̒ lotau boito lolametao̒ , " Memangi tio botie walao̒ lamiaatia ; wau tio memangi pitoo̒ anggadu pilotutulio mai .
43009021	Bo woloolo mola tio malowali loo̒onto botia , diila otaawa lamiaatia . Wau tatoonu talohutu olio malowali loo̒onto , uito olo diila otaawa lamiaatia . Yintuwalo olio , tio maleidaa̒ ; tio mowali molameto lohihilao . "
43009022	Mongo dulaa̒ lotau boito loloi̒ya mao̒ odito sababu timongolio moohe tomongo tau̒wa lo Yahudi ; sababu timongolio boito malo heeluma , deu̒ tamo tolongaku mao̒ li Isa debo odelo Olongia Tamoo-poa̒ahua , diilalo mowali tumuwoto ode bele potabiaalo .
43009023	Uito sababuulio mongo dulaa̒ lotau boito loloi̒ya mao̒ , " Tio maleidaa̒ ; yintuwalo olio . "
43009024	Lapatao̒ timongolio luli lotiango taa u engontielio pitoo̒ boito , wau loloi̒ya mao̒ olio , " Potadiaalo mola deu̒ yio̒ mamoloi̒ya mai u otutu . Otaawa lami tau boito taa odusa . "
43009025	" Wolo tio odusa meaalo diila , " tametao̒ lotau boito , " diila otaawa lowatia . Bo tuwau sua̒li u otaawa lowatia ; muloololio mai watia pitoo̒ , botia watia maloo̒onto . "
43009026	Lapatao̒ timongolio luli loloi̒ya mao̒ olio , " Mawolo u pilohutu-Lio olemu ? Woloolo mola Tio lohutu olemu lowali loo̒onto ? "
43009027	Tau boito lolametao̒ , " Mailungguli mai lowatia olimongoli bo timongoli diila mohuto modungohu . Yilongola timongoli ohilaa modungohe poli ? Otanu timongoli ohilaa mowali muri-Lio olo ? "
43009028	Lapatao̒ timongolio malomuayo olio wau loloi̒ya mao̒ , " Yio̒-yio̒olo muri-Lio ; ami diila ! Ami muri lei Musa .
43009029	Otaawa lami deu̒ Allahu Taa̒ala malo tahuda odelei Musa . Bo pasali lotau boito , diila otaawa lami lonto utoonu asalii-Lio . "
43009030	Tau boito lolametao̒ , " Moo̒linggolabe daa̒ deu̒ diila otaawa limongoli lonto utoonu asalii-Lio , hiambola Tio malohutu olaatia lowali loo̒onto .
43009031	Otaawanto deu̒ Allahu Taa̒ala diila modungohe taa odusa , bo taa u mohulumati Allahu Taa̒ala , wau tamohutu kahandaki-Lio .
43009032	Tumulalo mai bohulo dunia diipo pee̒eta mao̒ ilodungohe woluo talohutu tau pilotutulio mai pitoo̒ malowali loo̒onto .
43009033	Wonu tau boito diila monto Allahu Taa̒ala , tio diila mowali mohutu wolo-wolo . "
43009034	Tametao̒ limongolio , " Wolo ? Yio̒ tapolu-polu lodusa anggadu pilotutulio mai , yio̒ mamo ngaajali olami ? " Yi tumulalo mai tou̒ boito tio dilinilio tumuwoto ode bele potabiaalo .
43009035	Ti Isa loo̒dungohe deu̒ tau boito mailinggi limongolio lonto bele potabiaalo . Tio malo lolohe tau boito lapatao̒ lotahuda olio , " Wolo yio̒ palacaya to Walao̒ Manusia ? "
43009036	Tau boito lolametao̒ , " Tatoonu Tio . Tuani ? Tulungia poo̒taa mai alihu watia palacaya o-Lio . "
43009037	" Yio̒ maloo̒onto o-Lio , " tametao̒ li Isa . " Tioolo tamasaatia botie donggo hemobisala wolemu . "
43009038	" Watotia , palacaya , Eeya , " loi̒ya mao̒ lotau boito , lapatao̒ losujudu mola tio totalu li Isa .
43009039	Ti Isa lotahuda mao̒ , " Wau̒ dungga-dungga mai ode dunia botie mai momutoo̒ ; alihu taa pitoo̒ mowali moo̒onto , wau taa moo̒onto , mowali pitoo̒ . "
43009040	Dengolo lota taulo Parisi tawoluo teto loo̒dungohe li Isa lotahuda odito , tulusi timongolio lohintu o-Lio , " Makusudu-Mu ami botie pitoo̒ olo ? "
43009041	Ti Isa lolametao̒ , " Humayaalio timongoli pitoo̒ , timongoli diila odusa . Bo sababu timongoli malo loi̒ya , ' Ami moo̒onto , ' uito boliilio mao̒ timongoli donggo odusa . "
43010001	" Otutu banari tahudaa-U̒ botie : Taa tumuwoto ode delomo lantunga lohimba moli bala , wau diila moli huhebu , bo momia̒ata moli dalalo wewo , tau boito mototao̒wa wau tamoo-lambata .
43010002	Bo taa tumuwoto moli huhebu , tio-tiolo diti lohimba .
